114688.description:
Jigger is a Children’s Game for the Decktet in the vein of “Go Fish”. One Decktet for every 3 players is recommended, so in theory the game can accommodate an unlimited number of players.

Players begin the game with a hand of 5 cards. The lead player calls out “I demand …” naming one of the Decktet’s six suits. Players who are holding cards of this suit must surrender all of them to fulfill the demand. Players who can’t answer the demand holler “Jigger!” and then go fishing from the draw pile until they can give up a card which matches suit. The next player in turn order then makes her demand and play continues in this way until the deck runs out. Cards in players’ takes are then tallied and the player with the most cards wins.
114688.name: Jigger

114689.description:
BITS Mitbringspiel is a smaller version of BITS with similar game play: Each player has a board on which they place single- and double-colored dominoes turn by turn, based on random card draws. Players score or lose points at the end of a round based on the color combinations they create, as determined by random scoring cards that were revealed at the start of that round. For example, one round you want to create "T" shapes of a single color, while avoiding "I" shapes. After three rounds, the game ends and the player with the most points wins.

The rules include a solo variant in which you're challenged to score as many points as possible.

BITS Mitbringspiel differs from BITS as in includes fewer tiles, lasts only three rounds instead of four, and include cardboard tiles instead of plastic ones.
114689.name: BITS Mitbringspiel

114690.name: MercX
114690.description:
User Summary

You are a mercenary, completing various level objectives. A 2d action game, you can run, jump and shoot. You have access to three different weapons. A shotgun, a rocket launcher and a rifle. Each weapon can be upgraded with money found in the levels. You can also increase your health bar with money.

114691.name: Miami Shark
114691.description:
User Summary

Take control of a shark. Swim past Miami and wreck havoc on boats, swimmers, divers, helicopters, planes and the like. Do as much damage within the time limit to get the largest score you can.

114692.name: Microbe Kombat
114692.description:
User Summary

Control a microbe. Gain size and new abilities by eating enemy microbes and proteins. Choose wisely when to split, because it makes you more vulnerable to being eaten. Avoid viruses which will disable actions and kill you. Control movements with mouse.

114693.name: Mindscape
114693.description:
User Summary

Collect all the candies you can in this distorted world. Candy earns you points. Avoid the monkeys, they will harm you. But beware, gravity can and will shift on you unexpectedly as you progress, sometimes without warning.

114694.name: Moby Dick - The Video Game
114694.description:
User Summary

Take control of the great white whale, Moby Dick. You have three bars of concern, air, health, hunger and boost. If the hunger, air or health meters reach zero, you are in danger of dying. When the boost meter is full, you can once again use your boost ability. Try to do as much mayhem to the boats and people as you can to score points. There are also health, air, and growth items underwater.

114695.name: The WatchGuard Sourcebook (2E)
114695.description:
From publisher blurb:

It's FINALLY Here!!

Meet Summit City’s PREMIERE metahuman superteam: WatchGuard!

This sourcebook is the first collection of major characters from the WatchGuard Universe, so you can begin creating adventures, plotting heists, developing your ultimate weapon, or protecting the lives of the innocent & saving the cosmos alongside these fantastic heroes!!

Read through 40-plus character bios!
Discover the early history of Summit City!
Plot your routes in this amazing metropolis with our city map!
Meet heroes of old!
Engage in villainy alongside over a DOZEN bad guys!
Win favor with amazing deities!
...and MORE!




To help you get started right away, this volume includes several adventure scenarios to use as-is, to develop a better approach to adventuring in Summit City, or to incite fantastic new ideas all your own! The sky’s the limit, and even that can be exceeded with comic book physics, so don’t hold back!!

114696.name: The WatchGuard Sourcebook (3E)
114696.description:
From publisher blurb:

It's FINALLY Here!!

Meet Summit City’s PREMIERE metahuman superteam: WatchGuard!

This sourcebook is the first collection of major characters from the WatchGuard Universe, so you can begin creating adventures, plotting heists, developing your ultimate weapon, or protecting the lives of the innocent & saving the cosmos alongside these fantastic heroes!!

Read through 40-plus character bios!
Discover the early history of Summit City!
Plot your routes in this amazing metropolis with our city map!
Meet heroes of old!
Engage in villainy alongside over a DOZEN bad guys!
Win favor with amazing deities!
...and MORE!




To help you get started right away, this volume includes several adventure scenarios to use as-is, to develop a better approach to adventuring in Summit City, or to incite fantastic new ideas all your own! The sky’s the limit, and even that can be exceeded with comic book physics, so don’t hold back!!

114697.name: Moby Dick 2
114697.description:
User Summary

Very similar in gameplay to the first Moby Dick game. You control the white whale and attempt to do as much damage to ships and humans as you can. You still have three bars of concern for health, air and hunger. The boost bar is now at the bottom of the screen. You have more flexibility in upgrading your whale. You get points you can allocate and reallocate as you see fit.

114698.name: Cubic Ninja
114698.description:
Introducing Cubic Ninja™, the Nintendo 3DS™ title that lets you play without ever touching a button. Simply tilt and turn your Nintendo 3DS to solve challenging puzzles, outwit devious enemies, and escape intricate traps.

Cubic Ninja places you in the role of CC, a brave little ninja with a distinctly cubic shape. The princess of your beloved kingdom – plus a few of your ninja friends -- has been abducted. And it’s up to you to save them. To do so, you must tilt and turn your way through over 100 eye-opening levels, defeating adversaries such as Woofbot, Scorchbot, and more. From gravity distortions to raging infernos to elemental forces of wind and water, your enemies will do whatever it takes to stop you.

But you won’t be stopped. If you have to tumble till you’re dizzy, or survive raging waters just to rescue the princess, then you will. Because you’re Cubic Ninja. And that’s how you roll.

Source: The Publisher Website.

114699.name: Apollo Character Sheet
114699.description:
From publisher blurb:

This character sheet has been fully licensed & approved by Andy Smith -- creator & artist of Image Comics' Firstman comic book.
Apollo is an amazing powerhouse of stellar energy -- he has massive strength levels, powerful energy blasts, superior flight capabilities, and much more! At PL18, he's affordable enough to play him in most existing M&M adventures. Pit Apollo against your most vile, wretched cosmic conquerors, and watch him explode through with victory!

Features:

Beautifully rendered art by comics great Andy Smith!
Fully loaded stats, powers & feats!
Brief, concise history written by the Firstman comics creator, Andy Smith!
Alter-Ego stats!

114700.name: Asa
114700.description:
From publisher blurb:

Meet ASA -- heroic elemental sorceror, and near-immortal savior of our world! Can he stop the vile Loki in time? Will Asa protect our world once again? YOU decide!

114701.name: Battalion
114701.description:
From publisher blurb:

Meet Battalion -- enigmatic assassin for the metahuman villainous team, BlackGuard! Battalion, the deadly, duplicating, double-barreled diablo can now be a part of your next M&M 3E adventure!

114702.name: Captain Victory
114702.description:
From publisher blurb:

Introducing that 1940s phenom CAPTAIN VICTORY!! Captain Victory is one of the first metahumans to gain public prominence, and it came at a great time for our heroes in the War! A symbol of strength, hope, and Western morals during an age of dictatorial defiance, Captain Victory stands as the bar to which heroes are measured.

114703.name: Damocles
114703.description:
From publisher blurb:

Here's DAMOCLES -- perhaps the most altruistic, and most powerful, being in the entire WatchGuard Universe! Learn more about this empowering individual today!

114704.name: Loki
114704.description:
From publisher blurb:

Meet the villian LOKI -- a dark mage, twisted and bent on world domination. Power is his ultimate goal, and there is no end to the menace he would create to achieve his goal!

114705.name: Lynx
114705.description:
From publisher blurb:

Introducing the 1940s Canadian super-heroine LYNX!! Shortly after the public debut of Captain Victory, Canada introduced her own metahuman adventurer -- Lynx! Lynx fought alongside Captain Victory, as well as Deacon and Spanish national hero El Capitan, during World War II. Check out this amazing national hero!

114706.name: MechaMan
114706.description:
From publisher blurb:

Meet the West Coast hero MECHAMAN!! MechaMan is the heroic geek inside us all: mechanical prodigy, brilliant businessman, and exceptional activist! Using his intellect to save lives, improve human welfare, and enjoy the thrills of adrenaline-laced action as a costumed "meta", MechaMan can do it all!

114707.name: Sentinel
114707.description:
From publisher blurb:

Here come SENTINEL, defender of liberty, justice, mercy, and equity! This patriotic hero isn't a political mercenary or partisan playtoy -- he lives to serve the American people as a hero for the common good of all. A former Marine and Secret Service field agent, Sentinel has now serves the people by fightest with the highest of ideals without compromise. As WatchGuard's field officer & tactician, Sentinel can be viewed as "gruff", but that belies his intentions to protect his teammates while ensuring their efficiency.

114708.name: Tailgator
114708.description:
From publisher blurb:

Introducing TAILGATOR--hulking, nasty, villainous member of the metahuman team of criminals known as BlackGuard! Opposing WatchGuard is first on his list of "to-do's"!

114709.name: Teen Force Five
114709.description:
From publisher blurb:

Introducing TEEN FORCE 5! This set of five character sheets provides the full bios for each of the members of Teen Force 5.

114710.name: Voyager
114710.description:
From publisher blurb:

Meet VOYAGER -- heroic scientific-explorer, and leader of WatchGuard!!!

114711.name: Der Zyklus der Zwei Welten
114711.description:
User Summary:

In 2004 Pegasus Press releases this boxed set of the campaign Zyklus von den zwei Welten, containing all four adventures of the campaign:


Ein Hauch von Heiligkeit
Legion der Verdammten
Das Graue Konzil
Die schwarze Sphäre

114712.name: Momentum Missile Mayhem
114712.description:
User Summary

Control a gravity launcher that shoots energy projectiles against oncoming waves of enemies. You lose a life for each enemy that gets past you. Bounce your projectile against the walls and the enemies. Upgrade you weapon as you choose.

Four modes of play: Scenario, Survival, Survival Extreme and Armageddon.

114713.name: Neon Rider World
114713.description:
User Summary

Control a racing bike. You can accelerate, brake and tilt forward or backwards. You will also be able to change colors. The four different colors of your bike can be supported by their corresponding lines. Start the level over with space bar.

114714.name: Weißer Wolf und Seelenfresser (Midgard 4th Edition)
114714.description:
User Summary:

In 2008 Midgard Press released a PDF Version of Weißer Wolf und Seelenfresser updated to the 4th Edition of Midgard. Included in the PDF is also a short story by Alexander Huiskes about the background of the adventure: Schwarzer Wolf und Weiße Fähe (Black Wolf and White She-Wolf)

114715.name: Momentum Missile Mayhem 2
114715.description:
User Summary

The second game in the series includes additional modes as well as a feature to create your own game mode. The upgrade options have changed as well, you can now build structures for example. You also have the ability to place your gravity launcher in one of three different positions and to choose where the enemy waves come from.

114716.name: Sugoro Quest: Dice no Senshi Tachi
114716.description:
User Summary
Sugoro Quest: Dice no Senshi Tachi is a hybrid game that is part RPG and boardgame. Your character moves by rolling dice and along a set board. Spaces on the board cause encounters, healing, story progression and move.

114717.name: Carmine: A Role Playing Game of Alchemical Fantasy
114717.description:
From publisher blurb:

In a world of alchemy, airships, swords and firearms, there are many secrets. Secrets to fight for and some to die for. Factions battle for supremacy and control, as wars rage on all around them. Some are so caught up in the political squabbling that they forget the imminent dangers around them; for you see, all is not well. Carmine is circled by a veil of mist that seemingly protects the world from an all-consuming void. Terrible monsters and half-humans emerge from the darkness to wreak havoc on the general populous. Is Carmine the last bastion of humanity or do other worlds exist beyond the void? This and many questions remain unanswered. Will you be the one to uncover the mysteries of the world or will you fall to its many dangers?

Carmine features an ever-growing setting that can meet the needs of most RPG fans. High fantasy, steam punk, horror and espionage merge in a single setting. Come and join the world of Carmine today and create your own alchemical fantasy.

114718.name: Göttliches Spiel (Midgard 4th Edition)
114718.description:
User Summary:

In 2009 Midgard Press released a PDF Version of Göttliches Spiel (Midgard 3rd Edition) updated to the 4th Edition of Midgard. The additional 13 pages of the PDF are for a gaming board and tokens for it.

114720.name: Das Land, das nicht sein darf
114720.description:
From the back of the book:

Vampire müssen nicht länger die Macht der Sonne fürchten und gehen in Moravod - und bald überall? - am helllichten Tag auf die Jagd. Auf der Suche nach Hinweisen, wie man dieser Plage begegnen kann, müssen die Abenteurer das Rätsel des Sehenden Schlüssels lösen und sich ihm anvertrauen. Er führt sie von Geltin zu den Belogora, wo die ehemalige Hauptstadt Kuz Alhadur des Königreichs unter den Weißen Bergen verborgen liegt. Seit Jahrtausenden lebt hier keine Zwergenseele mehr, doch irgendwo soll es ein uraltes Archiv geben, in dem die Weisheit der Ahnen gesammelt ist. Doch so verwaist sind die Ruinen nicht, und die Gefährten sehen sich uralten Mächten gegenüber aus einer Zeit, als Elfen und Zwerge noch verbündet und die Götter der Menschen jung waren.

Von der Zwergenstadt führt der Weg die Abenteurer auf den Spuren eines Gottes und seines auserwählten Volkes in die Wildnis des fernen Nahuatlan, wo sie in der dreimal gebauten Stadt das Rätsel der Chalpeca lösen können. Dort erfahren sie vom Land, das nicht sein darf, in dem der Herr der Zeit mit den Schicksalen der Sterblichen spielt. Nur mit seiner Hilfe können sie ungeschehen machen, was einst die Vampire vom Fluch der Sonne befreite.

Das Land, das nicht sein darf gibt den Abenteurern Gelegenheit, die in Was Fürsten wollen sichtbar gewordenen Gefahren zu bannen und ganz Midgard vor der wachsenden Macht der Vampire zu retten. Im Laufe der Geschichte begegnen sie Wesen, die tief in der Vergangenheit Midgards verwurzelt sind: einem der ältesten Geschöpfe des Anarchen, einer der mächtigsten Kreaturen des Vampirgottes Camasotz, dem huatlantischen Windgott Ahuatl, einem Weißen und einem Dunklen Seemeister und dem letzten König von Nahuatlan.
Dieses Heft enthält ein Rollenspiel-Abenteuer für hochgradige Spielerfiguren, das die epische Geschichte um die Zerstörung des Sonnensteins zu einem glücklichen Ende bringt.


Translation:

Vampires no longer need to fear the power of the sun and go hunting in Moravod - and soon everywhere? - in broad daylight. Looking for clues on how to tackle this scourge, the adventurer must solve the mystery of the Seeing Key and trust in him. He takes them from the Geltin to the Belogora, where Kuz Alhadur the former capital of the Kingdom lies hidden under the White Mountains. For thousands of years no dwarven soul has lived here, but somewhere there should be an age-old library, where the wisdom of the ancestors has been collected. But the ruins are not that orphaned, and the companions stand against ancient powers from a time when elves and dwarves were still allied and the human gods were young.

From the dwarven city the path leads the adventurers on the footsteps of a God and his chosen people into the wilderness of the far Nahuatlan, where they can solve the riddle of Chalpeca in the thrice-built city. There they learn of the country that may not be in which the Lord of time plays with the fate of mortals. Only with his help they can undo what once freed the vampires from the curse of the sun.

The country that may not be gives the adventurers the opportunity to avert what has become visible in What princes wish and to rescue all of Midgard from the growing power of the vampires. Throughout the story they encounter beings who are deeply rooted in the past of Midgard: one of the oldest creatures of the anarch, one of the most powerful creatures of the Vampire God Camasotz, the huatlantian wind god Ahuatl, one white and one dark Seemeister and the last king of Nahuatlan.
This booklet contains a role-playing adventure for high-level player characters, which brings the epic story of the destruction of the sun stone to a happy end.

114721.name: Suitors & Suitability
114721.description:
A card game based on the works of Jane Austen. Players take the role of young women from the stories, trying to get married to a suitor of good social standing.

Gameplay consists of players playing cards to raise and lower the social standing of different characters.

114722.name: Momentum Missile Mayhem 3
114722.description:
User Summary

The third game in the series. This game includes four different weapons with dramatically different uses: Mobile Gravity Manipulator, Singularity Cannon, Gravity Disc and Artillery.

114723.name: Momentum Missile Mayhem 4
114723.description:
User Summary

The fourth game in the series. This game simplifies the options somewhat in that there are three modes to choose from: Campaign, Survival and Armageddon. Within Survival and Armageddon you can select the terrain type you will be fighting on. There is only one type of weapon in this game. You have a mobile unit, with a certain amount of shield power which fires a projectile at enemy units. Do not leave the play area, or die or you will lose.

114724.name: Alba: Für Clan und Krone! (Midgard 4th Edition)
114724.description:
From the back of the book:

Albas Wurzeln liegen in grauer Vorzeit, wo Druidenkönige Seite an Seite mit Elfen und Zwergen gegen die Mächte des Chaos kämpften. Später lockte der Reichtum der Wälder valianische Siedler, und waelische Seeräuber errichteten ihre Stützpunkte an den Küsten, während die Zwerge des Artross verbissen ihre Unabhängigkeit verteidigten. Zuletzt kamen die Clans aus dem geheimnisvollen Toquine und formten aus all diesen Einflüssen ein neues Reich: Alba!

Für Clan und Krone: dieser Wahlspruch spiegelt den Zwiespalt wider, in dem das albische Volk lebt und der immer wieder Anlass für Streit bietet - von Machtkämpfen im Hohen Rat über heimtückische Intrigen und Meuchelmorde bis zur offenen und blutigen Fehde. Alter Clanadel widersetzt sich den vom König ernannten neuen Feudalherren, machtbewusste Kirchenfürsten neiden der Bruderschaft des Träumers ihren Einfluss, reiche Städte streben nach mehr Unabhängigkeit, und alle buhlen um die Gunst des jungen Königs - oder hoffen auf seinen vorzeitigen Tod.

Doch nicht nur die Streitigkeiten der Mächtigen bietet Stoff für Abenteuer. Abseits der Städte und der wohlhabenden Fürstentümer gibt es wilde und ungezähmte Orte in Alba - in der Einsamkeit des Hochlands und der Sümpfe, in den schroffen Grenzgebirgen und in den Tiefen des Waldes, vor allem des Zauberwaldes Broceliande mit seinen Elfenreichen und seinen dunklen, von wilder Magie durchzogenen Winkeln. Dort können sich fahrende Ritter und heldenmütige Abenteurer mit Geistern wie der Grona oder den Hohlmenschen, mit Ungeheuern wie dem Seeoger oder dem Sumpfkraken und mit Unholden wie dem Trollkönig, dem Riesen vom Maedenstor oder der Schwarzen Annis messen und so selbst Teil der vielen Sagen und Mythen werden, die die Barden an albischen Höfen erzählen.
Dieses Quellenbuch enthält Hintergrundmaterial zum Königreich Alba. Neben der Beschreibung von Land und Leuten, ihren Sitten und Gebräuchen und ihrem Glauben bietet das Buch landestypische Abenteurer und magische Artefakte, wichtige Persönlichkeiten, ein umfangreiches Kapitel über das Halfdal und die Lebensweise der Halblinge Midgards. Eine Farbkarte von Alba liegt bei.


Translation:

Alba's roots lie in the distant past, where druids kings fought side by side with elves and dwarves against the forces of chaos. Later, the wealth of the forests attracted Valian settlers, and waelian pirates built their bases on the coasts, while the dwarfs and Artross doggedly defended their independence. Finally, the clans came from the mysterious Toquin and formed from all these influences, a new realm: Alba!

For Clan and Crown: this motto reflects the discord in the lives of the albian people and is a source of controversy - of struggles for power in the council over treacherous intrigues and assassinations to open and bloody feud. Old clan nobility opposes the new feudal lords appointed by the king, powerful princes of the church envy the Brotherhood of the dreamer's influence, rich cities strive for more independence, and all compete for the favor of the young king - or hope to his untimely death.

But not only disputes of the powerful feature adventures. Away from the cities and the wealthy principalities there are wild and untamed places in Alba - in the solitude of the highlands and swamps, in the rugged border mountains, and in the depths of the forest, especially the magic forest Broceliande his elven kingdoms and his dark corners, crossed by wild magic. There knights errant and heroic adventurers can compete against ghosts as the Grona or the hollow man, with monsters like the Seeoger or swamp octopus and villains such as the Troll King, the giant of Maedenstor or Black Annis and thus become part of the many legends and myths the bards will tell at the albian courts.
This source book contains background material on the Kingdom of Alba. Besides the description of land and its people, their habits and customs and their beliefs, the book provides typical adventurers and magical artifacts, important personalities, an extensive chapter on the Halfdal and the lifestyle of the Halflings of Midgard. A color map of Alba is attached.

114726.name: Monster Evolution
114726.description:
User Summary

You control a monster which can evolve to higher abilities. Try and destroy as many people and machines as you can. You can also evolve to a monster on the same level (rather than higher up the tree) to increase health, but once a monster has been used you cannot return to it.

114727.name: Monster Island
114727.description:
User Summary

Throw minis to destroy the monsters threatening Monster Island. Choose your trajectory and velocity. Each mini has it's own characteristics, as you progress in the game you can choose which mini to use and when.

114728.name: Fantazyn (Issue 4 - Nov 2005)
114728.description:
Fourth issue of the short-lived RPG e-zin/magazine.

articles to be added

114729.name: Monster Slayers
114729.description:
User Summary

Create a team of fighting units. Each unit can be upgraded independently. Hire up to five units in four clasess: swordsmen, spearmen, archers and lancer. Control your units as a group to march forward, defend, fall back or attack. Pick up rewards with you mouse. Multiplayer gives you the ability to battle against another person team.

114730.name: Shadowrun Gamemaster Screen Limited Edition
114730.description:
User summary:
Heavyweight limited Edition GM Screen

114731.name: Monster Trucks Attack
114731.description:
User Summary

A defensive game. You can pick up the monster trucks as they move forward. Throw them against the ground with as much speed as you can to destroy them. Defend the city!

114732.name: Fantazyn (Issue 5 - Mar 2006)
114732.description:
Fifth issue of Fantazyn, and at the same time first issue that wasn't fanzine.

articles to be added

114733.name: Morplee
114733.description:
User Summary

A minigame tower. Complete one level to move to the next one. You have one minute to complete each level. In addition, there are aliens descending which need to be clicked on.

114734.name: Museum of Science Fiction
114734.description:
User Summary

You visit a museum, and find yourself part of an experiment. Waking up deep underground with heavy weapons, you must uncover the secrets of this laboratory. What has happened to you?

114735.name: Sea War
114735.description:
Reign over the oceans with a FREE naval battle strategy game. Position your ships carefully to avoid detection. Launch counterstrikes and send your opponent to a watery graveyard.

Source: The Game Website.

An online version of the calssic board game Battleship.

114736.name: Bingo
114736.description:
Bingo Online captures all the fun of the thrilling game right in your web browser! With a little bit of luck, you'll be screaming out, "Bingo!" with this dazzling version of the classic favorite. Featuring great graphics and sound effects.

Source: The Game Website.

114737.name: Monster Truck Demolisher
114737.description:
Smash and bash your way to victory in Monster Truck Demolisher, a free action game for all ages.

- Crush pathetic automobiles.
- Select from five monster trucks and clear 24 challenging levels.
- Smash through barriers, climb ramps, rampage over rooftops, and more.
- Use nitro boosts to finish faster and get higher scores.

Source: The Game Website.

114738.name: Mushroom Madness
114738.description:
User Summary

Protect your mushrooms against animals such as hedgehogs and bears. Use your fly swatter to attack, or bombs, traps and guns. You fly swatter has unlimited usage, the bombs traps and guns are limited. Your fly swatter can be upgraded, bombs can be upgraded to have larger explosions, guns to have more ammunition, and traps to reset.

114739.name: Savage Worlds Test Drive Version 3.0
114739.description:
From Introduction:

Hi! And welcome to Savage Worlds: Test Drive!, a basic version of Pinnacle Entertainment Group's new super-simple game system for any roleplaying or miniatures setting! Here you’ll find everything you need to give the game a quick spin and see if it’s something you like—absolutely free!

114740.name: Savage Worlds Test Drive Version 4
114740.description:
From Introduction:

Hi! And welcome to Savage Worlds: Test Drive!, a basic version of Pinnacle Entertainment Group's new super-simple game system for any roleplaying or miniatures setting! Here you’ll find everything you need to give the game a quick spin and see if it’s something you like—absolutely free!

Includes the adventure, "The Beast:" The following tale takes place in the post-apocalyptic world of Hell on Earth. If you’re unfamiliar with Pinnacle's award winning setting, don’t sweat it. The adventure works just as well as "generic" post-nuke fantasy. It takes place in and around Butte, Montana, but can easily be moved most anywhere that has mountains or even high hills.

114741.name: Hitman: Absolution

videogamehonor.32844: 2013 British Academy Game Awards Best Action Game of the Year Nominee

114741.description:
Hitman: Absolution is an action-adventure stealth game developed by IO Interactive and published by Square Enix. It is the fifth entry in the Hitman game series, and will run on IO Interactive's proprietary Glacier 2 game engine.

The game takes place in the United States, and features an online option. In addition, the game features "instinct mode" which allows 47 to predict enemy patrol routes, much like the "sonar vision" that was featured in Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Conviction, "Eagle Vision" in Assassins Creed: Revelations, "Dark Vision" in Dishonored and "Detective mode" in Batman: Arkham Asylum. Hitman is known for allowing players to create their own narratives within the sandbox levels.

Source: Wikipedia, "Hitman Absolution", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

114742.name: Labirynt  (Issue 5)
114742.description:
Issue was devoted to Warhammer Fantasy Role Play.

articles to be added

114743.name: Raptor Rage
114743.description:
Turn back the clock and help the dinosaurs rule once again in Raptor Rage.

- Join the dinosaur revolution in this free arcade shooting game.
- Help Ricky the Raptor battle the likes of Black Sheep, Top Croc, and KillaGorilla.
- Shoot your way through over 50 fun and challenging levels.
- Use power-ups and battle bosses in exciting encounters.

Source: The Game Website.

114744.name: Savage Worlds Test Drive Version 5.1
114744.description:
From Introduction:

Hi! And welcome to Savage Worlds: Test Drive!, a basic version of Pinnacle Entertainment Group's new super-simple game system for any roleplaying or miniatures setting! Here you’ll find everything you need to give the game a quick spin and see if it’s something you like—absolutely free!

114745.name: Box Mama
114745.description:
User Summary

Box Mama is a compilation of 17 different minigames involving boxes. The graphics are simple, stylized drawings. The app has continued support so that more games can be added in the future.

114746.name: Cannon Duel
114746.description:
User Summary

Cannon Duel is turn-based, artillery game. The objective of the game is to bombard the enemy tank until it is destroyed.

114747.name: Labirynt (Issue 6)
114747.description:
Issue was devoted to Call of Cthulhu.

articles to be added

114748.name: Mushroom Madness 3
114748.description:
User Summary

Defend your mushrooms against animals such as bears and hedgehogs. Increased menu for upgrading your abilities with money. You can replay levels you have already completed to attempt to get special bonuses, or just for more money.

114749.name: Mayan Puzzle
114749.description:
A variant of match 3 puzzle game like no other. Includes 4 game modes (classic, time trial, challenge, marathon). The action takes place in a beautiful Mayan surrounding spiced up with a lot of special FX and original Mayan soundtrack.

Depending on the mode selected it's a mind-boggling action/puzzle game which will keep you on your feet, but it can also be a tough brain challenge in a classic/strategic mode. It's a MUST-HAVE for a serious competitor. Be the first to complete all 50 levels in classic mode.

Source: The Developer Website.

114750.name: Ancient Secrets
114750.description:
Discover a rich world filled with incredible fun in Ancient Secrets, a bold new adventure for all ages. Long ago, before the ancient Tekka tribe vanished into history, the tribal elders locked away the treasures of this once glorious people in a secret location and scattered the pieces of the key across the world. Over time, the Tekka became a memory and the key fragments became the stuff of legends and myths.

Join Kate, a young archaeologist, on the adventure of her life as she picks up where her father left off on the search for the ancient secrets of the Tekka. Use your keen eye for detail to solve intricate hidden object challenges, bend your brain with unique puzzles, and explore a vibrant world full of helpful characters, exotic locations, and surprises at every turn in Ancient Secrets.

Source: The Game Website.

114751.name: Mushroom Madness 2
114751.description:
User Summary

Destroy the animals before they eat your mushrooms.
More enemies and options than in Mushroom Madness one, fewer than in 3. You can replay levels as in 3.

114752.name: Outsmart
114752.description:
"Outsmart is a simple but highly addictive board game which is easy to learn but hard to master. Play on your iPhone, iPod Touch or iPad. Play alone, with a friend, or with anyone in the world via Game Center. Can you take on the world and become an Outsmart legend ?

Fully optimised for iPhone 4 retina display, iPod Touch and iPad.

Outsmart is a simple strategy board game for two players.

The game is played on a 4x4 board with each player having 8 tiles numbered from 1-8.

Players agree to an even number of rounds to play and which colour tile plays first, then alternate who starts each subsequent round.

The game begins when player 1 places a tile anywhere on the board. Player 2 then places their tile on any free square.

Play continues with each player taking turns placing their tiles until either all tiles have been played or until a player Outsmarts their opponent by achieving four counters in a row vertically, horizontally or diagonally.

Outsmart is the ultimate win and any player who Outsmarts their opponent in a round automatically wins the entire game regardless of the number of rounds played or scores up to that point. Feel free to let your friends on FaceBook or Twitter know how amazing you are when you Outsmart your opponent!

If a round is completed without an Outsmart then the round is scored by the sum of the face value of any three tiles in a row vertically, horizontally or diagonally. Tiles can score multiple times if they are within more than one row of three.

Scores will accumulate over multiple rounds and if all rounds are completed without an Outsmart then the player with the most points wins the game.

Can you deliver the knockout blow and Outsmart your opponent with four in a row and be the ultimate winner?"

Source: The Developer Website.

114753.name: Sentinel: Mars Defense
114753.description:
"You are commander of the dropship Sentinel. You must defend a distant colony from the alien hordes in this stunning new evolution of tower defense.

Protect key structures which block the enemies' path as the aliens smash their way towards your stronghold. Utilize an array of advanced technology including upgradeable towers and droids which can repair buildings or harvest resources."

Source: The Developer Website.

114754.name: Sentinel 3: Homeworld
114754.description:
"Sentinel 3: Homeworld - the third instalment of the highly acclaimed Sentinel sci-fi tower defense series!

Take the fight to the alien homeworld and unleash a massive arsenal of weaponry!

Get up close and personal on the battlefield in your power armor to execute devastating attacks and support your defenses!"

Source: The Developer Website.

114755.name: ONE2TEN

468.name: The United States Playing Card Company

114755.description:
FROM THE BOX: Correctly guess how other players rate a variety of items on a scale of 1 to 10 and be the first player to reach 10 points.

One2Ten is a fun and often times hilarious social card game that exposes how players feel about certain items (including things about themselves and other players) on a rating scale from 1 to 10. It is a fun way to get to know new people and an even more fun way to get to know those you THOUGHT you already knew... your closest friends and family!

EXAMPLE ITEMS (On a scale of 1-10 how do I rate...)
The taste of green olives
My breath right now
My enjoyment of this game
My interest in going camping
My sense of humor
My ability to dance
The outfit of the person sitting to my left

There are OVER 400 items included in the game and a unique randomizer makes it so that no two games are ever the same! To view the complete instructions visit the game's website (see link below)

ONE2TEN: How well do you know your friends?

114756.name: Space Survival
114756.description:
User Summary

In Space Survival you have to evade the asteroids using the accelerometer to control your ship.

114757.name: Cheepers
114757.description:
Bump your way to victory in Cheepers, a free and cute game of skill.

Shoot to win and clear the Cheepers from the board but it will take cunning and skill to clear them all. Select a color, then shoot it against a similar color, but watch out, because more will appear. How quickly can you shoot them to meet the goal before time runs out?

Try your best in 25 wonderful levels that get tougher along the way. The more you hit at once, or the more you can hit in a row increases your score. But remember, if you take too long, the game is over.

Source: The Game Website.

114758.name: Werewolf - Curse of Pandora
114758.description:
User Summary

Werewolf - Curse of Pandora is a remake of the classic party game Werewolf now for the Ipad.

You receive a secret character card, each character has a different ability, you can be a villager or a werewolf and the object of the game for the villagers is to discover and kill all the werewolves, if you are a werewolf your goal is to kill all the villagers, the problem is you don´t know who to trust. This is a great party game.

Werewolf - Curse of Pandora also offers objects that you can trade, they give the players different powers and options.

114759.name: Cyberia
114759.description:
"Cyberia is a science fiction action adventure video game originally released for MS-DOS in January 1994, and released two years later on the PlayStation, Sega Saturn, and 3DO consoles.

Cyberia is set in the near future of the year 2027, five years after a global economic collapse. The world is under the dominion of two opposing superpowers, the First World Alliance in the west and the Cartel in the east. Devlin, the leader of the FWA, receives word that a devastating weapon is being produced in a secret base in Siberia, referred to as the Cyberia Complex. Curious to unravel the mysteries of this weapon, Devlin pardons a cyber-hacker named Zebulon Pike (Zak) and charges him with the task of infiltrating the Complex and retrieving intel on the weapon being produced there."

Source: Wikipedia, "Cyberia (video game)", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

114760.name: Egypt Explore
114760.description:
Find wondrous treasures hidden within the great pyramids of Egypt in Egypt Explore, a free game that blends action and strategy.

The pyramids of Egypt are known to hide many valuable surprises and you've been chosen to collect them. Move your character left or right to catch them as they fall. The more you collect, the higher your score will be.

But watch out because magical stones act as protective devices and are looking to squash you. Only by positioning yourself in the correct place, can you make it through their danger. Move left, move right, and stop! How long can you survive as each level becomes tougher?

Source: The Game Website.

114762.name: Insurgo
114762.description:
Build your own stairway to heaven with Insurgo, a FREE game involving strategy and real-time physics.

So you say you want to build skyscrapers; Stack them so high that you could touch the clouds… well, here's your chance. Let's see how well you do because when you go so high, many things can happen that can turn your beautiful construction into a mess of rubble.

Construct triangles one by one and stack them to build your skyscraper. Be careful how you attach them however, because they can easily be put off balance. Enjoy infinite possibilities and watch the real-time ragdoll physics as your tower reaches new heights and sways back and forth, to ultimately come crashing down.

Source: The Game Website.

114763.name: Magia i Miecz (Issue 1 - 1993)
114763.description:
User Summary:
First issue of the first RPG magazine in Poland.

articles to be added

114764.name: Asuka 120% Final BURNING Fest.

videogameversion.140907: JP PlayStation Network PSOne Classics version

114764.description:
User Summary

Asuka 120% Final BURNING Fest. is the fifth game in the Asuka 120% series of Japanese Bishojo fighting games.

This installment of the series featured all of the enhancements from the Sega Saturn version of the game (Limited) and one additional character: Ichiko Furutachi (Journalism Club).

During the development of Final the original development team behind the series had very little input in the creation of this title. This game was largely created by a new development team.

114765.name: Magia i Miecz (Issue 2 - 1993)

rpgissuearticle.69418: Charakter postaci a specyfika sytuacji w RPG

114765.description:
Second issue of first RPG magazine in Poland.

articles to be added

114766.name: Strider (1989)
114766.description:
Strider, released in Japan as Strider Hiryū (ストライダー飛竜?) is a 1989 side-scrolling platform game released for the CP System arcade hardware by Capcom. It became one of Capcom's early hits before Street Fighter II, revered for its innovative gameplay and multilingual voice clips during cutscenes (presented in English, Japanese, Mandarin, Russian and Spanish).

Strider is set in a dystopian future in the year 2048, where a mysterious dictator known as the "Grandmaster" rules over the world. Hiryu, the youngest ever Super A Ranked member of a organization of high-tech ninja-like agents known as the "Striders", is alone tasked with the Grandmaster's assassination. Hiryu begins his mission by infiltrating the Grandmaster's capital at the Kazakh Soviet Socialist Republic.

Source: Wikipedia, "Strider (arcade game)", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

114767.name: Alpha Mission II
114767.description:
ASO II: Last Guardian (also known as Alpha Mission II) is a vertically scrolling full screen shoot 'em up released by SNK in 1991 for the Neo Geo arcade and home systems. It was later released for the Neo Geo CD in 1994 and for the PlayStation 3 in 2010.

The player controls a fighter spacecraft (Armored Scrum Object) and can shoot enemies in the air, bomb enemies on the ground, collect power-ups, and defeat bosses to advance levels.

Source: Wikipedia, "ASO II: Last Guardian", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

114768.name: Wagan Land 2
114768.description:
The second installment of the series, released for the Family Computer on December 14, 1990. The sequel adds new features such as power-up items for the action scenes and special stages set on lakes and clouds. New mini-games includes "number searching", "noise breakdown", and a panel-based rock, paper, scissors. With the exception of the number searching game, none of the new mini-games introduced in this installment were brought back in the succeeding games. The story takes place several years after the other Wagan Land games (but before Wagan Paradise), in which the player takes control of Wagan II, the son of the original Wagan. The final battle theme in this game would later be used as the final battle theme in Super Wagan Land. The boss introduction theme would be used in Super Wagan Land as well. The boss battle theme was used in Super Wagan Land, as well as in the later DS sequel.

Like in the original game, some stages will have two different exits at the end, allowing the player to slightly alter their course. This was the last game in the series to retain this feature.

Source: Wikipedia, "Wagan Land", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

114769.name: Wagan Land 3
114769.description:
The third and final installment of the series for the Family Computer, released on December 8, 1992. The location of the game's setting is changed from Wagan Land, the location in preceding installments, to a space city where the "Hisopiso family", a distant relative of the Wagan family, lives. Because of the change of setting to space, Wagan's jumping ability is increased and there are stages where the player can walk upside down under the ceiling. This installment also introduces a 2-player versus mode where the player can control any of the boss characters. The ending of this game serves as a cliffhanger to the next installment, Super Wagan Land 2.

Source: Wikipedia, "Wagan Land", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

114770.name: Super Wagan Land 2
114770.description:
The second installment of the series for the Super Famicom, released on March 25, 1993. The story continues from where Wagan Land 3 left off. This installment introduced various elements, such as the inclusion of special equipments and the ability to revisit previously completed stages. In addition to the gravity stages introduced in Wagan Land 3, this installment introduces a variety of other stages such as flying stages where Wagan must fly through the sky using a rocket booster while avoiding enemies, underwater stages where Wagan must proceed by equipping an undersea rotor, and stages where the player must control a tiny character. The new mini-games introduced in this installment includes a Latin alphabet guessing game and a faster version of the shiritori game. This installment is the only game where Dr. Devil becomes an ally of the player. The game features a standard route that the player takes, as well as an alternate hidden route, making this installment a bit closer to the first two Famicom installments. The player must complete both routes in order to see the real ending.

Source: Wikipedia, "Wagan Land", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

114771.name: Wagan Paradise
114771.description:
The third and final installment for the Super Famicom, released on December 16, 1994. The story several years after the events of Wagan Land 2. The main characters this time are a pair of siblings named Takuto (a male Wagan) and Karin (a female Wagan), who must against the Nummers clan, who are citizens from an underground civilization. Story sequences are now added between stages which shows the two siblings investigating a series of strange events on Wagan Land. In contrast to the first two Super Famicom games, the game's graphics is composed of characters with black outlines on pastel-colored background that employed light hues. The designs of Takuto and Karin are also rounder compared to the previous incarnations of the Wagan character. The mini-games are all completely new and now resemble IQ testing puzzles which the player must solve under the allotted time.

Source: Wikipedia, "Wagan Land", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

114772.name: Hirameki Action: Chibikko Wagan no Ōkina Bōken
114772.description:
The first completely new installment of the series since Wagan Paradise, Hirameki Action: Chibikko Wagan no Ōkina Bōken ("Flashing Action: The Big Adventure of Little Wagan") was released for the Nintendo DS on January 29, 2009. The action segments are not much different from previous installments, but the game now includes puzzles which utilizes the DS's touch screen. The game's soundtrack consists of new versions of the previous games' music. Wagan and Dr. Devil are featured in this game, along with several new characters.

Source: Wikipedia, "Wagan Land", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

114773.name: Backcountry
114773.description:
Backcountry takes the thrill of a big mountain event and transforms it into a fun and exciting board game for the kids to share with friends and family. Take on the role of one of four unique characters, and compete in the uncharted backcountry of the mountain for ultimate bragging rights. With five cards in hand, can you devise the best strategy to cross the finish line with the most points and claim victory over your friends, and the mountain? A simple yet fun game, with high levels of social interaction, make for a great experience for anyone ages 7 & up.

Basic Game Play:

Roll dice
Move piece
Play cards, if available




Types of cards:

Trick - Single action; double combos are possible for 5 extra points; triple combos can be done for 10 extra points.
Grab
Spin
Flip

Knockdown - Opposing player looses a turn and you get the space; can be used to defend against Knockdown card and both players loose a turn.
Boost - Advance down the track the indicated number of spaces.




How to win:

Total Trick Points (consider combos) + Points per place finished = Total Points
Highest total wins.

114774.description:
From Publisher Website

Scout saucers. Crop circles, Fighter jets. And new kaiju of every description.

The Monster Island series of tabletop fighting games continues to expand. Keep up with the Monster Island Battle Pack, featuring printable color figures and counters for all the latest additions to the game, from deadly monsters to new human military units and alien invaders. Also includes complete dossiers and figures for five brand-new monsters created by Patrick Sweeney and Rob Miller, plus, for your reprinting needs, the original figure sheets from Monster Island and Escape from Monster Island.

You must have Monster Island: The Game of Giant Monster Combat to use this product.

This is a PDF product.
114774.name: Monster Island Battle Pack

114775.description:
From Publisher Website

It's time to rumble in the Bronx - giant-monster style!

This 10-page PDF sequel in the acclaimed Monster Island series of tabletop fighting games by Firefly Games presents New York City for your kaiju rampages. Battlegrounds: New York City covers the history, ayout, boroughs, key buildings, landmarks, and defenders of the Big Apple. Featuring art by Richard Cox, this product also includes expansion rules for battles set in the 1930s. You must have Monster Island and Escape from Monster Island to use this product, and Invasion of Monster Island and Revenge of Monster Island are recommended.
114775.name: Battlegrounds: New York City

114776.description:
From Publisher Website

Flatten freeways, hammer Hollywood, or crush City Hall – it's up to you!

This 8-page PDF sequel in the acclaimed Monster Island series of tabletop fighting games by Firefly Games presents Los Angeles for your kaiju rampages. Battlegrounds: Los Angeles covers the history, layout, neighborhoods, key buildings, landmarks, and defenders of the city. Featuring art by Richard Cox, this product also includes a new guardian kaiju for the city.

You must have Monster Island and Escape from Monster Island to use this product, and Invasion of Monster Island and Revenge of Monster Island are recommended.
114776.name: Battlegrounds: Los Angeles

114777.description:
From Publisher Website

Attack Alcatraz, bash the Bay Bridge, or trample the TransAmerica Tower – it's up to you!

This 7-page PDF sequel in the acclaimed Monster Island series of tabletop fighting games by Firefly Games presents San Francisco for your kaiju rampages. Battlegrounds: San Francisco covers the history, layout, neighborhoods, key buildings, landmarks, and defenders of the Golden Gate. Featuring art by Richard Cox, this product also includes a new guardian kaiju for the city – the fierce Chinese Dragon. You must have Monster Island and Escape from Monster Island to use this product, and Invasion of Monster Island and Revenge of Monster Island are recommended.
114777.name: Battlegrounds: San Francisco

114778.name: Bullet Time HD
114778.description:
Welcome to the universe of Bullet Time – an epic action adventure story like no-other in the App Store!

Play through multiple campaigns delving deeper into the story of Bullet Time or join the action online, as players take part in three-player co-op multiplayer against the vicious mutated hordes!

Experience a large, living 3d-world with multiple quests and hidden secrets along the way. Retina and HD graphics optimized for iPad 2 & iPhone 4S.

Survive a depraved, distant future where dangers lurk around every corner and only a few human survivors are living scattered throughout the wilderness.

Customize your character uniquely and upgrade every weapon in extensive ways.

Unleash the power of destructive boosts as the mutant armies attempt to take John Irish down.

Compete along with your friends to reach number one on the GameCenter leaderboards and unlock exquisite achievements deep within the world of Bullet Time!

Source: The Game Website.

114779.name: Call of Mini: Double Shot
114779.description:
User Summary

The town of Lakeside is infested by zombies. You and your buddy (a truck driver and a cop) have stumbled across the infestation. Thank goodness you have a create of weapons and a huge pile of ammo nearby.

Call of Mini: Double Shot, the latest in the Call of Mini series, is a dual-stick third-person shooter in which you control one of two characters to defeat waves of zombies. Up to two players can play across the network at a time in a cooperative mode. Defeat waves to earn coins and points and get yourself even more powerful weapons.

114780.name: Tiny Fish
114780.description:
Tiny Fish is a cartoon action game where you have to tilt your device in order to guide the fish and survive. Tiny Fish must escape from the toxic ocean! Eat cookies, avoid toxic particles and escape from looming predators like the urchin fish or the deadly black fish. Survive in these lethal waters!

Game Mechanics

Tilt the device to control Tiny Fish. Eat cookies to gain health and avoid the toxic particles as they take away his energy. Complete the objectives of the levels (survive for a period of time, clear checkpoints follow a path of rings, get energy points) and be aware of the black fish and the urchin fish as they take more energy than the toxic particles.

In arcade mode, try to survive as long as you can before the health points reach 0. The difficulty will increase as time passes (number of toxic elements, lack of cookies, presence of the black fish, etc.).

Features
★ Intuitive tilt-based controls
★ 20 levels with different challenges (survive, clear checkpoints, follow rings, etc...)
★ 3 star performance score on each level
★ Game Center achievements and leader boards
★ 2 arcade survival levels
★ Cartoonish and colorful Retina Display graphics
★ Atmospheric and entertaining soundtrack and sounds
★ Tilt calibration controls (normal, tap down and auto)

Source: The Game Website.

114781.name: KnightyKnight
114781.description:
Enter Ye Olde Tournament upon your trusty steed in this 3D, medieval themed, jousting video game for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch. Compete alone or put a friend to the sword via Bluetooth, all the while enjoying the quips and banter from the digital combatants.

Ah, the middle ages, harking back to yore. A time of honour, chivalry and brutal, gladiatorial combat!

Enter the jousting arena and sample the joys of thrusting a variety of finely crafted, period* armaments into the face of thine enemies, safe in the knowledge that it’s merely a whimsical videogame.

Little negative side effects (beyond the infrequent urge to cry “have at thee” at random strangers before galloping toward them in the manor of Arthur, King of the Britons) will befall thee.

Put thy friends to the sword as well!

Designed to be enjoyed together, challenge thy friends to a Bluetooth mêlée. Laugh at the amusing dialogue together, marvel at the spectacle of ye olde tournament together, all while attempting to bludgeon each other in the face…

(For legal reasons we’re obliged to emphasise that any bludgeoning should be performed in game, Billy Goat Entertainment Ltd does not endorse violence preformed outside the digital interactive medium.)

Source: The Game Website.

114782.name: I'm Destroyer
114782.description:
The game is adapted from "Totem Destroyer" -- classical physics engine game.

Your task is to bomb various obstacles but at the same time you should be careful to not let the small robot fall to the ground, or the task fail.

How to play

Wooden box, tires and balloons can be bombed. Click the item to bomb it.
Black iron can't be bombed. It is safe for robot to fall on it.
Be careful, you have fixed number of bombs. After you used all bombs and the robot doesn't fall to the ground, you pass the level. Or you fail.




Features

200 levels. Enjoy the process of game.
You can try different ways to complete the task.
Beautiful game background and dynamic game music.
You can choose any level to begin.
Human interface description and game tips.




Source: The Game Website.

114783.name: I'm Destroyer 2
114783.description:
The game is adapted from Totem Destroyer -- classical physics engine game.

Your task is to bomb various obstacles but at the same time you should be careful to not let the small robot fall to the ground, or the task fail.

How to play

Wooden box, tires and balloons can be bombed. Click the item to bomb it.
Black iron can't be bombed. It is safe for robot to fall on it.
Be careful, you have fixed number of bombs. After you used all bombs and the robot doesn't fall to the ground, you pass the level. Or you fail.




Features

200 levels. Enjoy the process of game.
You can try different ways to complete the task.
Beautiful game background and dynamic game music.
You can choose any level to begin.
Human interface description and game tips.




Source: The Game Website.

114784.name: Rhein: River Trade
114784.description:
The Rhein is one of the longest rivers in Europe. Its path has represented a vital route for commerce and transport since ancient times, taking ships from the heart of the continent across various countries all the way to the North Sea. Every day, its slow but tireless flow accompanies planes, trains, ships and trucks in a close-knit network of connections between major cities.

Rhein: River Trade is an absorbing game of commerce and transportation for 2-5 industrious players 12 years of age and up. The most important companies in Basel receive, assess, and acquire goods orders from the various cities located on or near the Rhine, and even as far away as London. Each order defines the destination and the number of containers, the delivery time, the agreed price, and the possible penalty. Using shared planes, trains and ships and their own trucks, the players must arrange these shipments, limiting the costs and making sure that delivery times are respected. The player who earns the most money wins.

114785.name: CryptRover
114785.description:
You are an archaeologist trapped in an underground crypt with a limited supply of air. You must survive long enough to reach the crypt's exit.

Be too rash - and the arachnids will nibble you to death.
Be too wary - and your air supply will run out.
Luckily, the ancients have left behind med packs, air cans and batteries in the crypt - use them wisely!

Source: The Game Website.

114786.name: LocoRoco Midnight Carnival

videogamehonor.32766: 2010 British Academy Game Awards Best Handheld/Mobile Game of the Year Nominee

114786.description:
LocoRoco Midnight Carnival is the last game in the LocoRoco series for the PlayStation Portable. The game is a spin-off that continues the story of LocoRoco 2 and features a new move called "Boing!". This was released for Halloween.
LocoRoco Midnight Carnival is based on a secret carnival-like base, created by the BuiBui, a red, mischievous version of the MuiMui. The title shows that the LocoRoco were quietly sleeping, while in the background, a BuiBui pulls on a nearby star (cleverly designed to just look like a star), opening a trapdoor under the LocoRoco, sending them into a chute, taking them into a cannon, which shows the LocoRoco "Boing!" power. The cannon sends the LocoRoco into the BuiBui's secret base, the midnight carnival.

Source: Wikipedia, "LocoRoco Midnight Carnival", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

114787.name: Arc the Lad: End of Darkness
114787.description:
Arc the Lad: End of Darkness, known in Japan as Arc the Lad Generation, is a video game developed by Cattle Call for the PlayStation 2. It is last game from the Arc the Lad series on the console, the first being Arc the Lad: Twilight of the Spirits.
This is the only Arc game to, instead of a tactics-style battle system, feature a more of a real-time battle, online-play battle system. Generally, this was viewed as a step backwards for the series.

The basic mode of play requires the player to go to guilds around the world, taking on missions. To advance the story however, the player must speak to NPCs around the towns. The game features a real-time battle system new to the series.

Source: Wikipedia, "Arc the Lad: End of Darkness", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

114788.name: Scarab of Ra
114788.description:
A sandstorm has uncovered the Great Pyramid of Ra. The player, a lowly archaeology student, decides to learn its secrets and tell of its wonders. After securing food and a lantern on short notice, the player enters the pyramid with hopes of finding additional equipment abandoned by earlier expeditions.
Gameplay is that of a simplified roguelike game. Each new game is randomized, and the player can only save by quitting. Death is frequent and quick, forcing players to make the most of their skills and careful use of all items they come across. Many items have several uses that the player must either discover through experimentation or use of an in-game hint system.
In order to complete the game, one must gather three major treasures: the Crown, Staff, and Scarab of Ra. Once this task is accomplished, an exit is revealed, yet players can choose to continue playing if they wish to risk death and increase their scores. Once a player picks up the Scarab, mummy-like Guardians immediately began their hunt, delivering an electrifying shock upon contact.

Source: Wikipedia, "Scarab of Ra", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

114789.description:
A memory game for 2 - 4 eager players with dribbling skills.

Soccer heroes move forward! This memory game requires not only excellent footwork but also sharp minds. The player who remembers where his own dinosaurs stand will be able to make the best passes and score the most goals. Hold on! When the referee blows the whistle, the dinosaurs are rearranged causing the players to get into puzzle trouble and test their memories.

(from rulebook)
114789.name: Fußball: Dinos

114790.description:
The captain of Les Jaeger, Kerberos, also known among his subordinates as the God of Blood, is an inhuman creature that feeds on death to satisfy his immortal appetite. He regularly competes with the Colonel for the position of primacy amongst Azur Alliance agents. He comes out on top much of the time due to his monstrous powers and millennia of experience.

Dark Azur Alliance Warrior - Lv. 50

At 5 | Dm 4 | Df 9 | Ar 1 | LP 15 | Re 10 | Mo 8/12 | AP 3/4

Independent: Kerberos can't receive Arbiter Orders.
Blood Puppets: If Kerberos is in your group, Azur Agents receive +1 attack. If Kerberos dies, all Azur Agents are automatically removed as casualties.

oo - Bloody Wings (Special, Movement)
Kerberos moves 16 in. in a straight line. During this movement he is considered to have Flight. This consumes one Blood Counter.

ooo - Midnight Bless (Ki, Attack)

+ 6 Attack. Consumes one Blood Counter.

ooo - Sanguinis Vitae (Ki, Attack)

+ 3 Attack. If this deals damage, put two additional Blood Counters on Kerberos.

KERBEROS Lord Of Blood.

Blood Counter: At the beginning of the game, put a Blood Counter on Kerberos.

The Power of Blood: Before any Attack or Defense roll (normal or special) you may spend a Blood Counter to roll an additional die and choose the result you prefer

Regeneration: During Kerberos' activation you may choose to exchange a Blood Counter for Healing Lv. 1

Blood Absorption: If Kerberos damages an enemy after an attack or charge, he obtains a Blood Counter. This ability doesn't affect Gears, Summons or Undead.
114790.name: Anima Tactics: Kerberos

114791.description:
The beautiful and silent assassin of Les Jaeger, Kirsten is an enigma. Gifted with the ability to throw any object as a lethal weapon, she is a sinful angel of death on the battlefield.

Neutral Azur Alliance Prowler - Lv. 40

At 5 | Dm 3 | Df 9 | Ar 0 | LP 12 | Re 10 | Mo 8/12 | AP 3/4

Innate Abilities: Ranged Attack (16 Inches).
Poison Essence: All of Kirsten's attacks cause Poison Lv. 2. Effect 14.

o - Vodka (Subterfuge, Ranged Attack, Reactive)
Vodka may only be activated when an enemy unit declares a charge against Kirsten. At this moment, and before the enemy unit moves, she may make a Ranged Attack against that unit.

ooo - Sake (Subterfuge, Ranged Attack)
Ranged Attack (16 Inches). Kirsten makes two consecutive attacks. Each attack must be against separate targets.

oooo - Martini (Subterfuge, Ranged Attack)
Kirsten makes a Ranged Attack against all enemy units within 12 Inches and that she has Line of Sight with. Each attack must be rolled separately. Limit: Once per game.

o - Champagne (Subterfuge, Movement)
Kirsten moves 3 Inches. This movement may be made even if she has already moved this Turn. Limit: Once per Turn.

A part of Team Les Jaeger along with The Colonel, Kyler and Reindhold.
114791.name: Anima Tactics: Kirsten

114792.name: Upidee
114792.description:
Horse racing game. Looks lovely but it is just a roll and moove game.

The board is unusual, consisting of cards which, if laid out in the correct order, form a track.

Each player is given a supply of counters (not included in the game). 5 counters per player are placed into the Pool. This will be the prize if you reach the end first. When you move, if you land on a picture space, then you must obey the instructions. Some are the usual Miss a Turn variety but some make you add more counters to the Pool or, maybe, take some counters out of the Pool. The winner of the race i.e. reaches the last space on the board first, collects the Pool and the real winner is the player that has the most counters.

114793.description:
Some people born with innate aptitudes for arts… and others for death. However, in Colonel's own words, there are very few able to perform assassination as a fine art. Kyler is one of those chosen ones. Remodeled using Lost Logias and turned into a psychotic killing machine, this Les Jaeger agent has become one of the most prominent killers in the whole world.

Dark Azur Alliance Prowler - Lv. 40

At 5 | Dm 4 | Df 8 | Ar 1 | LP: 13 | Re 10 | Mo 8/12 | AP 3/4

Death Dancer: Kyler gains +1 Defense for each enemy unit he is engaged with.

oo - Stealth (Subterfuge, Effect)
Kyler becomes Hidden. Upkeep: o

oo - Oblidiom (Subterfuge, Attack)

+ 4 Attack / +3 Damage. This skill can be used only if Kyler is Hidden.

o - Dancing Mad (Ki, Attack)
-1 Attack / -2 Damage.

A part of Team Les Jaeger along with Kirsten, The Colonel and Reindhold.
114793.name: Anima Tactics: Kyler

114794.description:
The colossal Ligori, personal executioner of the High Arbiter Alastor, is a personification of war. This unstoppable killing machine has roamed the greatest battlefields of Gaïa, as one of the most powerful fighters of the Azur Alliance.

Dark Azur Alliance Warrior - Lv. 45

At 5 | Dm 8 | Df 8 | Ar 1 | LP: 20 | Re 9 | Mo 6/10 | AP 2/4

Innate abilities: Critical Mastery
Addicted to Pain: Every time that Maximo suffers Damage in hand-to-hand combat he recovers an Action Point.

ooo - Raxxor Slayer (Ki, Attack)
If Raxxor Slayer obtains a Critical hit, the defender suffers double damage.

ooo - Executor Gale (Ki, Attack)
Ligori attacks all enemy units within base to base contact with him.
114794.name: Anima Tactics: Maximo Ligori

114795.description:
Lord Alfred Reinhold, descendant of one of the oldest and most influential noble houses of Togarini, is one of the most important members of Les Jaeger. Gifted with powerful psychic powers, this old man is able to move mountains with the power of his mind.

Neutral Azur Alliance Mystic - Lv. 45

At 5 | Dm 3 | Df 8 | Ar 1 | LP: 13 | Re 10 | Mo 8/12 | AP 3/4

oo - Telekinetic Impact (Magic, Ranged Attack)
Distance (16 inches). +1 Damage. Throw.

oo+ - Obliteration (Magic, Effect)
An enemy unit within Reindhold's Control Zone loses 4 Life Points. Each additional Action Point adds +1 to the Effect and 1 additional loss of a Life Point. Effect 14.

oo - Organic Psychokinesis (Magic, Effect)
Reindhold may displace an unit inside his Control Zone up to 4 inches. This skill can not move a unit engaged in Hand-to-hand combat. Effect 15 (against enemies only).

ooo - Telekinetic Hold (Magic, Effect)
Cast Lv. 1 Paralyze on an enemy unit within Reindhold's Control Zone. Effect 15.

oooo - Terrain Control (Magic, Effect)
Displaces up to 4 inches one Scenery feature inside Reindhold's Control Zone. Characters inside those Scenery features are displaced as well. If during this movement the Scenery crashes against a unit it is also displaced. Difficulty: 4+

A part of Team Les Jaeger along with Kirsten, Kyler and The Colonel.
114795.name: Anima Tactics: Reindhold

114796.description:
Even in Les Jaeger there is a person whose mere mention produces both veneration and terror, a man whose power and influence extends across the entire world. He is an enigma. Those who know his true name can be counted on the fingers of one hand. For the rest, he is simply The Colonel.

Dark Azur Alliance Warrior - Lv. 50

At 5 | Dm 5 | Df 9 | Ar 1 | LP 14 | Re 10 | Mo 8/12 | AP 3/4

Innate Abilities: Initiative
Chain of Command: The Colonel may use his Action Points as Order Points to use any Arbiter Command of any Arbiter he is playing with. His Influence Zone is Equal to his Control Zone.

ooo - Hephastios Crest (Ki, Attack)

+ 3 Attack / +3 Damage.

ooo - Ifrit Awakening (Ki, Ranged Attack)
Distance (12 Inch).

o - Soul Steal (Magic, Effect)
A friendly unit inside The Colonel's Control Zone loses d5 LP. The Colonel recovers double the Life Points lost.

o - Absolute Superiority (Ki, Effect, Reactive)
When an enemy unit declares an attack against The Colonel, the attack fails automatically unless the attacking unit passes an Effect 14. This skill must be used before any die rolls are made.

A part of Team Les Jaeger along with Kirsten, Kyler and Reindhold.
114796.name: Anima Tactics: The Colonel

114797.description:
In the Supreme Archon’s crusade to gain complete control over Gaïa, he has surrounded himself with the most unusual of players and servants. These people, endowed with exceptional abilities and powers, make up his private army, the forces with which he plans to extend his power beyond the limits of man’s understanding.

Dark Azur Alliance Prowler - Lv. 20+

At 4 | Dm 4 | Df 8 | Ar 0 | LP: 11 | Re 8 | Mo 6/10 | AP 2/4

Agent: Azur Agents are not unique characters and you may include 1 for every 150 Levels in an Azur Alliance Party. For example, a party of 300 levels could include up to two Azur Agents.

oo - Stealth (Subterfuge, Effect)
The Azur Agent becomes Hidden. Upkeep: o

oo - Murder Attack (Subterfuge, Attack)

+ 3 Attack / +2 Damage. The Azur Agent must be Hidden to perform this attack.

AZUR AGENT Skill Card

An Azur Agent can possess any combination of the following options, as long the added levels do not take their total level above 40. Any option cannot be chosen more than once.

The Agent's Speed is increased to 12/16. Lv: +10
The Agent recovers one more Action point per turn. Lv: +10
The Agent's Speed is increased to 8/12. Lv: +5
The Agent gets Infiltration and Open Movement. Lv: +5
The Agent gets the Innate Ability Ranged Attack, Distance (12 inch). Lv: +5
Murder Attack is increased to +4 Attack / +4 Damage. Lv: +5
If the Agent deals damage with a normal attack or a special attack, he causes Poison Lv: 2 Effect 14. Lv +5
The Agent gets +1 Attack. Lv: +5
The Agent gets +1 Defense. Lv: +5
The Agent gets +4 Life Points. Lv: +5
The Agent gets the following ability: Lv: +5
ooo - Kaiser (Ki, Attack)

+ 4 Attack.
114797.name: Anima Tactics: Azur Agent

114798.name: Piet Piraat: Naar de haaien
114798.description:
In this children's game, the players attempt to steal their opponents treasure by rolling a cannon ball (a marble) off a slope. At the bottom of the slope, their are several treasure chest space. If the marble lands in a treasure chest space containing an opponent's treasure, they get to steal it.

However, the players get to protect their treasures by placing obstacles (sharks) on the slope, which may deflect the cannon ball.

114799.name: Goniec Imperialny (Issue 1 - Fall 2001)
114799.description:
First issue of Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay fanzine.

articles to be added

114800.name: Rune Wars
114800.description:
The rune wars is a board game for 2 players in which players are invited to make combinations of rune cards to perform attacks on their opponents. Each player has 3 actions on each turn and he can use either their own cards or his opponenτ's cards.

But be careful, the wounded opponent will have the opportunity to activate a Magic powerful Rune and the battle will be changed forever...

Winner will be the player who eliminate his opponent.

114802.name: Goniec Imperialny (Issue 2 - Spring 2002)
114802.description:
Second and the last issue of Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay fanzine.

articles to be added

114803.name: On an adventure with Geronimo Stilton: the game
114803.description:
Have you never dreamed of travelling in the Kingdom of Fantasy? Together with Geronimo Stilton and Trinket Scribbler on the back of the Rainbow Dragon and fly back to Fantasia, the world full of imagination. Geronimo Stilton finds a lovely music box in the attic with a very important message in Fantastic Script. “Help Florina the fairy queen, she is in great danger!” That is where Geronimo Stilton's adventure starts. Travel together with him through the 6 fantastic realms of Fantasia, where you will have to carry out an instruction in each one of them. Trinket Scribbler will help you in this. In this way, you will collect the 6 coloured Emeralds, which ultimately give you access to Florissant, the fairy kingdom. And above all, don't forget the music box…

In this game, Geronimo Stilton travels though the realms of Fantasia. On their turn, players move the Geronimo pawn and will answer questions and carry out assignments. The first player to complete an assignment in each realm wins the game.

114804.name: Die schöne Schweiz
114804.description:
Objective:
be the first to pass finish line: field 80 (Rhine Falls at Schaffhausen)
- moving by turn/'Roll & Move' game -
each player rolls the die moving foreward according thrown number;
landing on a marked area follow instructions printed cover inside

game was published during the 1920's

114805.name: Stardrone
114805.description:
StarDrone is a high-speed action thriller with a mix of arcade action, pinball, breakout, physics and collect-the-objects. The game features over 50 levels of unparalleled gaming experience and extraordinary replay value.

Cause your attackers to crash with rapid speed while collecting gems and power-up enhancements. Overcome perilous hazards and elude zillions of enemies in an effort to complete each stage with a record score. With simple one-button controls and unique, intuitive game play mechanics, StarDrone is friendly to beginners, at the same time challenging enough to bring you back for more and more.

Source: The Game Website.

114806.name: Avengers (1987)
114806.description:
User summary:

Punch and kick your way through Paradise City. Kick over garbage cans for power-ups, weapons, and other items. A martial arts button smasher along the lines of Smash TV.

114807.name: 1941: Counter Attack
114807.description:
User summary:

Take control of a bomber and destroy the enemy. Collect power-ups, new weapons, and devastating bombs. The graphics aren't authentic to WWII, but this action packed shooter has a lot of great airplane designs.

114808.name: Block Block
114808.description:
User summary:

You know those games where you control a platform and must bounce the ball up to destroy blocks? That's this game, but with all kinds of twists. First, you move VERY quickly, unlock all kinds of power-ups and point bonuses, and even access pinball-like levels.

114809.name: Last Duel
114809.description:
User Summary:

Race down the track, shooting obstacles and enemies. You can't crash, but you can fall down holes. Collect power-ups, shoot and roll to dodge!

114811.name: Speed Rumbler
114811.description:
User summary:

Rid the town of bandits. Get in and out of your car to interact with your environment. Drive, shoot, and don't forget to run over enemies on foot!

114812.name: Varth: Operation Thunderstorm
114812.description:
User summary:

Grab your bomber and scour the floating highway of enemies. Attack and unleash M. Crashes against the enemy! Gather special weapons and increase the power of your offensive/defensive pods!

114813.name: La Febbre dell'Oro
114813.description:
La Febbre dell'Oro (Gold Rush) is a fun game and is set during the Wild West where the search for gold had become a "fever".

The game board has 72 boxes, game of goose style, and the players move their horse through a wheel numbered from 1 to 12. Some boxes (for example, the railroad, the saloon, the emporium, the river, etc.) can be bought to guarantee an income to the owner when another player will occupy the box.
When a player reaches the box #72 has the chance to enter the gold mine (and win) if he gets 13 points using twice the wheel numbered.

114814.name: Camelia's Locket: The Tale of Dead Jim Cane
114814.description:
Help Dead Jim Cane find the lost locket of his love Camelia so these lovers can rest for eternity. Set sail across the seas, blasting cannonballs, and collecting treasures with the aide of your colorful crew! A family friendly adventure, Camelia's Locket features wild power-ups, gorgeous 3D graphics, and over 100 levels of puzzling challenges. Matey beware there is all sorts of nasties awaitin' Ye demise.


Over 100 Puzzling Levels
Love and Loss on the High Seas
Unique Power-Ups and bonuses
Collect Gold, Medal and Trophies
Incredible 3D Graphics


Source: The Developer Website.

114815.description:
Objective: be the first passing finish line (field 100 ==> Baltic sea spa Zoppot)
- moving by turn/'Roll and Move' game -
each player starts at 'Bischofsberg' and throws the die moving foreward according rolled number;
landing on a marked area follow instructions printed on cover inside
similar to 'Game of Goose', but linking all places in and around Gdansk before WW II
should be published during 1930's; the game can be classified as a 'children game' due to mechanics, but very often these types of games were played by adults combined with more or less high wagers for each participant;
winner usually got 50% of total amount, 2nd and 3rd the rest
114815.name: Danziger Heimat-Spiel

114816.name: Mae Q'West and the Sign of the Stars
114816.description:
Mae Q’West is a widow and single mother of two children. She lost her husband Jack, a fisherman in the Pacific Northwest, to a boating accident of which no remains were ever found. One summer morning, Mae sends her children off to their annual camp trip and plans a relaxing week of antiquing and spa treatments. The same morning over coffee Mae reads her horoscope. The message feels oddly written for her and sends Mae on a mysterious adventure through Washington’s Puget Sound. With help from the stars, Mae soon starts to uncover the truth of Jack’s disappearance. Visit Mae's Blog!


14 multi-level chapters of game play.
3 mini-games; including Wonderword, Leapfrog and Game Buddy.
Collectable stars for unlockable bonus level.
"Mae Q’West and the Sign of the Stars" 30 page novella included with the game.


Source: The Developer Website.

114817.name: Gozoku (Issue 1 - Oct  2004)

rpg.963: Legend of the Five Rings (1st Edition)

114817.description:
Table of contents:

News
Co to jest L5R? - Andrzej Chwalisz
