Wrath of the Emperor - Andrzej Chwalisz
Wrath of the Emperor - James Donninthorne-Tait
Konspiracja - Shawn Carman
Wywiad z Shawnem Carmanem
GenCon 2004
Strategie: Wrath of the Emperor
Galeria WotE
Czym jest Warlord? - Todd Rowland
Warlord: Sneak Attack - Todd Rowland
Spycraft - Andrzej Chwalisz
Czym jest VETO! - Krzysztof Schechtel
Troja - Michał Stachyra
Vampire: The Requiem

114818.name: Gozoku (Issue 2 - Jan  2005)
114818.description:
Table of Contents:

Dawn of the Empire: Sztuka... Sztuki... - Jim Pinto
Web of Lies - klan Feniksa - James Donnithorne-Tait
Wywiad z Davidem Lepporem
It's only Magic - Marcel Zaborski
Kamigawa: Kataną w ducha - Janek Żyła
We're All Spirits - Janek Żyła
Pierwsze okrzyki - Krzysztof Rowiński
Nie bić, a zabijać... czyli czym się rządzi discard/slaughter - Krzysztof Rowiński
Warlord: Śmiertelna tranzakcja - Todd Rowland
Warlord: Powrót Elfów - Todd Rowland
Warlord: Uthamonki - Todd Rowland
Call of Cthulhu - Robert Kucharski
Paradox - Patrick Kapera
V:tES - 10 lat wojny wampirzej - Rafał Błaszczak
World of Darknes - Dariusz Hołda
Crystalicum - Mateusz Wielgosz
Monastyr - Marcin Blacha
O Stadnickim rzecz złowieszcza - Krzysztof Schechtel
Jak złożyć talię do Veto! Na poziomie mistrzowskim - Mikołaj Kamiński
Wywiad: Bakemono - Jarosław Orządała
Smoki jeszcze nie wymarły - Patryk Adamski
Accordlands - Todd Rowland
Poltergeist - Maciej Dzierżek

114819.name: Assalto alla Jac Bank
114819.description:
Assault on Jac Bank is a game set in the Far West.
The game board is divided into two paths (game of goose style), each of 30 squares. A path is runned from the players who personify the good guys (the sheriff and the cowboy) and the other path is runned from players who personify the bad guys, the gunslingers.
The aim of the sheriff and the cowboy will be to prevent the robbery that the bad guys will try to accomplish in the Jac Bank (located in the center of the game board). At the end the players will have to compete in a duel with the use of the cards to determine the winner.

114820.name: Prinzenhochzeit
114820.description:
Publisher Blurb:

In Nansur erhalten die Abenteurer die Aufgabe, den von Piraten gefangenen Sohn des Kalifen von Mokattam zu befreien. Dazu folgen sie Tadir, dem Boten, der die Lösegeldforderung der Piraten überbracht hat, nach Nagpur. Doch ihr Schiff wird von dem berühmten Seeräuber Hoschad aufgebracht. Die Abenteurer können nur weiterkommen, wenn sie Tadir befreien, der sie dann zum Versteck des Prinzen bringt. Nach dessen Befreiung führt der Fluchtweg die Gefährten durch eine in den Berg gehauene Festung aus valianischer Zeit, wo sie es mit einigen unangenehmen Fallen und noch unangenehmeren Bewohnern zu tun bekommen, bis sie schließlich wieder an das Tageslicht zurückkehren.

Auf ihrer Flucht wird die Gruppe schließlich von einem vom Kalifen ausgesandten Schiff aufgenommen, das den Prinzen zu seiner Hochzeit nach Mangalwar bringen soll. Doch die Händler Nagpurs in Gestalt von Kapitän Selim und der Thaumaturg Thaloram haben andere Pläne. Während der eine die intrigante Rolle der Kalifenfrau bei der Befreiung Musis vertuschen möchte, möchte der andere ihren Verrat öffentlich machen. Aber dazu benötigen beide ein Schreiben, das Tadir in seinem Gefängnis auf der Pirateninsel zurück gelassen hat ...

Das Abenteuer ist für eine Gruppe von 3 bis 5 Spielerfiguren mit einer Gradsumme zwischen 25 und 35 vorgesehen.


Translation:

In Nansur the adventurers get the task of freeing the son of the Caliph of Mokattam who has been captured by pirates. Thereto they follow the messenger Tadir, who delivered the ransom of the pirates, to Nagpur. But their ship is brought up by the famous pirate Hoschad. The adventurers can progress only if they free Tadir, who then takes them to the hiding place of the prince. After his liberation the escape route of the companions leads through a fortress of Valian time cut into the mountain where they have to deal with some unpleasant traps and even less pleasant inhabitants, until they are free to return to the daylight.

During their flight, the group will eventually picked up by a ship sent out by the caliph, which is to bring the prince to his wedding in Mangalwar. But the dealers of Nagpur in the shape of Captain Selim and Thaumaturg Thaloram have other plans. While one of them wants to cover up the intriguing role of the caliphs women in the liberation of Mushi, the other wants to make her betrayal public. But for that both require a letter Tadir has left in his prison on the island of pirates ...

The adventure is designed for a group of 3 to 5 player characters with a level sum between 25 and 35.

114821.name: Doctor Who: War Games
114821.description:
War Games is a strategy board game based on the Doctor Who series of the same name, which originally aired in 1969. Players take the roles of War Lords, a race of aliens who have abducted human soldiers from across time in order to build an army to conquer the universe. One player controls the Doctor, who is striving to foil their plans. Players fight each other, capture territory, and form alliances through an engaging, card-based combat system that emphasizes skill and strategy over luck. Eventually though, the Time Lords have to be called in, and the game changes into a fast-paced capture the flag style race to get to the TARDIS and escape before they arrive.

Each turn, players take three actions by playing a card for each action. Playing cards in this way allows players to move, attack other generals and their bases, fortify their bases, or use strong utility actions or delayed tactical responses. The Doctor can influence zone bases to join the Resistance and otherwise interfere with the general's plans.

During play there are several War Chief cards that provide environmental effects when they are face-up. These cards become face-up or face-down due to actions in the game such as forcing another player to be your lieutenant or capturing zones. The game proceeds to the second phase when one player controls the majority of zones or all the War Chief cards are face-up or face-down.

In the second phase of the game, action is faster, as each player plays one action at a time and moves, and doesn't draw any cards to replace their hand. Players fight over the key to the TARDIS and race to escape the world they're on before the Time Lords arrive.

videogameversion.140995: UK ZX Spectrum Tape Cassette release

114822.description:
User Summary

Puzzle where the player must fill up a 10x10 board (hence it's name) with numbers. Movement is by the chess 'knight jump'. So on the first spot, it's 1, then knight-jump to another field: 2. etc. Puzzle starts to get hard once the board fills up. But this is only a 1 level game; only one board to fill (which is hard enough, mind you!)

114823.description:
User Summary

Simple dice rolling gamble game featuring 5 dice and 2 AI opponents

114824.name: 100 Kilometri

videogameversion.140999: Italian ZX Spectrum Tape Cassette release

114824.description:
User Summary

Simple arcade bicycle racing game. View is top down, control by the keyboard.

114826.name: Punter
114826.description:
A horse racing themed card game.

One player is the Bookie and will offer odds on each race. Those odds are determined by how many cards of each colour are randomly drawn before the race starts. If only one red card is drawn, the odds will be better than a colour that has no cards drawn. If 2 are drawn for one colour, the odds increase. And so on. The odds reflect the fact that there are less cards in the deck for that colour to win.

Having established the odds and all bets are placed, the race begins. The Bookie turns over a card and that colour advances one card length. A horse needs to be moved 7 card lengths first to win.

There are some wild cards that have certain effects. They tend to affect the race of the next card to be revealed. For example, if you drew a Blue Horse Stumbles card, the Blue horse is moved forward as usual. But the next colour card drawn has to suffer the effects of having stumbled.

The winner at the end of the evening is the player with the most cash. I would suggest you might end it after every player has had one turn of being the Bookie.

114827.description:
"300 all'Ora: il vero gioco delle corse automobilistiche" is a simple board game focused on the Formula 1 races. The movement of the cars is determined by the throw of two dice and the winner will be the player who first complete all the laps of the circuit.

The game is played in two phases.
The first step is to take a ride in the track "Collaudo", collecting many coins every time with the throw of double dices you stoped over a box with a wheel icon.
This coins permit every player to move an extra space over the dices in the second phase of the game.

The second phase is played in the race track 8-shaped.
You throw two dices and you must move your car as the result of the dice.
The first one that turns 3 rounds of the track wins.
114827.name: 300 all'Ora

114828.name: Fuzion: 2300 AD
114828.description:
User summary:

Recommendations for running a 2300 AD game using the Fuzion ruleset.

114829.name: Fuzion: Appleseed
114829.description:
From Introduction:

These rules assume the character is generating a human, nonbioroid, and non-cyborg character. These rules also use the same mechanics presented in the standard Fuzion core rules, and therefore will gloss over rules that remain the same and material that does not differ.

Note: These rules assume the use of the 3d6 dice mechanic, and the 10-point DT bonuses have already been integrated into the DTs of mechanics listed in this RPG. To allow for the 1d10 dice mechanic, simply subtract 10 from all DTs. Also note that in all cases; refer to the standard Fuzion rules except where they are contradicted in these plug-ins and rulings.

114830.name: Babylon 5 Fuzion
114830.description:
From Introduction:

This documents covers everything necessary to run a Babylon 5 campaign under the Fuzion rules system. The Fuzion rules presented herein are taken directly from the Fuzion HTML document, Kit Version 5.0 with some rewriting. The telepath rules are adapted from the Atomik Psioniks Plug-In by Mark Chase.

114831.name: Basic Fuzion
114831.description:
From Introduction:

Welcome to Basic Fuzion. This is an abbreviated version of the Fuzion Core Rules rules. For greater flexibility, refer to the Fuzion Core Rules rules mentioned above. These rules can be easily expanded using any of the existing plug-ins for Fuzion.

114832.name: Crosslets
114832.description:
Described as "A Game for the Black-Out", so that dates it to the early 1940's.

It is for two players. Each player gets a board with a 5 x 5 grid on it. The first player selects a letter from the 250 provided and announces it. Both players must now write it into one of the 25 squares on their board. Then the next player draws a tile and both players must now fit that into their grid. Once a letter is placed, it cannot be changed.

The object is to score the most points. Points are rewarded with a specific score, which increase as the length of the word increases. A perfect game would be 5 five-letter words across and 5 five-letter words downwards. I suspect, that would have an absolutely zero chance of happening.

Back to the box - it also says "More Entertaining than Crosswords" and "An Ideal Fireside Game".

114833.name: Der Stab der drei Jahreszeiten
114833.description:
From the back of the book:

Drei große Gefahren sah der Seher von Prioresse für Alba voraus: die Bestie aus der Wildnis, den toten Riesen und den Schatten unter den Bergen. Auch wenn die Bedeutung unklar ist, ist es an der Zeit, sich der machtvollen Reliquien aus alter Zeit zu erinnern und sich mit ihnen gegen dämonische Mächte und andere übernatürliche Feinde zu rüsten. Eine von ihnen ist der Stab der drei Jahreszeiten, mit denen der Heilige Esbern einst den Larneforst im Süden Albas von Ogern, Hexen, Schreckenswürmer und anderen Ungeheuern säuberte.

Das Abenteuer führt die Gefährten in das idyllische Dorf Arkendale, wo vor Jahrhunderten ein Kloster von einem Erdrutsch verschüttet wurde - und dessen letzter Abt der Hüter der gesuchten Reliquie war. Leider sind die Dorfbewohner nicht gut auf Fremde zu sprechen, besonders nicht auf solche, die nach den Schätzen des reichen Klosters graben wollen, und das mit gutem Grund. Vor einer Generation weckte eine Gruppe von Abenteurern etwas, das besser ungestört geblieben wäre, und das war nicht nur ihr Verderben. Das ganze Dorf hatte unter den Folgen zu leiden, bis die albische Kirgh sich des Problems annahm und den Einstieg in die Unterwelt versiegelte.

Den Gefährten bleibt aber nichts anderes übrig, als das Siegel zu brechen und sich den Gefahren der Unterwelt zu stellen. Vorher sollten sie aber versuchen, das Vertrauen der Einwohner von Arkendale zu gewinnen und herauszufinden, wer ihnen wohl gesonnen ist und wer ihnen übel will. Denn Gefahren lauern überall!

Dieses mit dem Spielleiterschirm ausgelieferte Abenteuer konfrontiert Spielerfiguren mit einem mächtigen Hexenzirkel im Dienst des Grünen Jägers und dient gleichzeitig als Vorbereitung für Ereignisse um Gefahren, die ganz Alba bedrohen.


Translation:

Three major hazards the seer of Prioresse foresaw for Alba: the beast out of the wilderness, the dead giants, and the shadows of the mountains. Even if the meaning is unclear, it is time to remember the powerful relics from ancient times and to arm yourself with them against demonic powers and other supernatural foes. One of them is the staff of the three seasons, with which the Holy Esbern once cleaned the forest of Larne in the south of Alba of ogres, witches, horror worms and other monsters.

The adventure leads the Fellowship in the idyllic village of Arkendale, where centuries ago a monastery was buried by a landslide - and whos last abbot was the guardian of the relic sought. Unfortunately, the villagers do not speak fond of foreigners, especially about those who want to dig for the treasures of the rich monastery, and with good reason. A generation ago, a group of adventurers awakened something that should have stayed undisturbed, and that not only was their undoing. The whole village had to suffer the consequences until the albian Kirgh took care of the problem and sealed the entrance to the underworld.

But the companions have no other choice than to break the seal and to face the dangers of the underworld. Before that, they should try to win the trust of the people of Arkendale and find out who is sympathetic to them and anyone who wishes them ill. Because danger lurks everywhere!

This adventure provided with the gamemaster screen confronts the player cahracters with a powerful coven in the service of the Green Hunter and serves as a preparation for events about dangers that threaten all of Alba.

114834.name: I Shoot Randy!
114834.description:
I Shoot Randy is a card game for 2 to 6 players ages 13 and up with average length of playtime between 10-15 minutes.

One player takes on the role of Randy and must survive the onslaught of attacks from the other players by countering the effects of their played cards.

If Randy's health is reduced to 0, the player in the role of Randy looses the game. However, if Randy survives all valid attacks from the other players, then he wins the game.

114835.name: Geister der Vergangenheit (Midgard)
114835.description:
User Summary:

This adventure book contains two adventures set in different parts of Midgard:


Eine verhängnisvolle Erbschaft - A fatal heritage by Jürgen E. Franke set in Alba
Ziegenspuren - Traces of goats by Florian Wagner set in the Coastal States north of Eschar.

114836.name: Nano Ninja
114836.description:
User Summary

Control a ninja as you climb a tower. One button controls all the action, the response changes depending on the level. For example it may cause the ninja to walk, stop walking, jump, climb the wall etc... When you die you start on the same level. It is also possible to fall from a higher level to a lower level in some cases. Try to beat it in the least time.

114837.name: CyberFuzion Drugs
114837.description:
From Introduction:

This is a set of rules concerning the use and affects of drugs for use in Fuzion games. These rules are intended primarily for use within a Cyberpunk setting, and drugs from Cyberpunk 2020 are included as examples.

114838.name: CyberFuzion Netrunner
114838.description:
From Introduction:

This is a system of rules expanding the hacking rules for Fuzion and Interlock. These rules draw heavily on Cyberpunk 2020's Netrunning rules and are intended to be native in a Cyberpunk environment where neural cyberinterfaces are standard, though they are written generically enough to be useable in a modern setting as well.

These rules were designed to use existing Cyberpunk 2020 equipment and software with little modification. There are several differences from the original rules, however, that are intended to speed play and optimize simplicity. First, these rules lack a grid. Movement within the virtual environment of cyberspace is conceptual. To convert applications that give "ranges", simply apply a percentage chance of effectiveness based on range. Second, these rules incorporate the Power attribute from other Fuzion games, essentially the equivalent to a computer's Intelligence from CP2020. Third, the number of CPUs a system uses is irrelevant to these rules and is considered background information.

Although these rules are written for one type of interface (manual or cybernetic), a GM can mix the two by simply specifying which is the standard and apply a -2 to all manual rolls if cybernetic is standard or +2 to all cybernetic rolls if manual is the standard. In addition, these rules assume a 3d6 die-rolling mechanic option of Fuzion. If you're playing Interlock, or the Fuzion option of 1d10, simply replace the 3d6 with a 1d10 die roll and replace all +10 with +d10. You won't achieve the same kind of bell curve, but the results will be sufficiently randomized.

114839.name: CyberFuzion
114839.description:
From Introduction:

Cyberpunk by R.Talsorian Games has been around since 1988. Cyberpunk used a variation of the Interlock system introduced for R.Talsorian's other game, Mekton II. In 1990, the second edition of Cyberpunk, called Cyberpunk 2020, made several changes to its version of Interlock. Almost all of the rules were completely redone and retooled.

R.Talsorian has promised a third edition of Cyberpunk, and with it further changes to the rules. This time around, the rules have also changed names. The Interlock system is now called the Fuzion system, so-named because it introduces elements from another popular game system, the HERO system, and "fuses" the two together. Fuzion, itself, has undergone several variations, similar to its previous Interlock incarnation. Each Fuzion variant is as similar to, and as different from, each other as the Interlock-based as Cyberpunk, Mekton, and Cybergeneration variations of Interlock were. Fuzion offers a lot of customizable options. Using a system of "switches", allowing certain rules to be "on" or "off"; "dials", allowing settings to be changed from genre to genre; and "plug-ins", entire rules-sets that may be used in a game at a GM's discretion.

This built-in customization allows Fuzion to be molded, adapted, and modified to fit any genre. The "Core" Fuzion rules, without customization, can do a good job of approximating the feel of most genres, but not very well. Therefore, each Fuzion game must be customized to fit its genre and setting.

CyberFuzion is my attempt to provide a sneak preview of the kinds of changes, modifications, and customizations to expect from the upcoming new edition. This is in an attempt to assuage the fears a lot of Cyberpunk fans have that the next edition will be ruined, and to dispel a lot of misconceptions some have about Fuzion based on rash judgments and plain old stubbornness.

114840.name: Fists of Fuzion
114840.description:
From Introduction:

This is a system provided for players to design there own or modify existing martial art maneuvers. Players must always consult Game Masters before modifying or purchasing any custom maneuver. This plug-in will attempt to cover all possible types of HTH and melee combat but every case and nuance can not be addressed without writing a novel. Many of the premade maneuvers have been created by STUDiO187 and probably don’t exist but do reflect the concept of the art it’s self. As this is a free download we cannot take the time to do a modern martial art system complete with all the maneuvers it has. As there are over 300 schools of Wushu in China alone, each with their own nuances. However, this system should provide you with everything you need to develop a martial art intensive environment. At the end of this plug-in we list several links to credible and well-detailed martial art sights, should your gaming needs require more information. This system has been devised to accommodate and readily adapt new martial art information into the Fuzion system. So, even if you have developed your own new martial arts or if you have a character that wishes to do so, this is the system for you. Especially if you have recently downloaded Atomik Alienz and you wish to create an alien martial art.

114841.name: NINJA
114841.description:
User Summary

An evil samurai master has set fire to your village, and taken many villagers captive. It is up to you to prevent him from taking over the world. Fight as a ninja, unlock new combos, gain levels and allocate bonuses to strength, speed or armor. Buy new weapons including single use items such as bombs, shuriken and healing potions. You can also unlock new playable characters.

114842.name: Das Grüne Sigill
114842.description:
From the back of the book:

In Alba fürchten sich die Menschen oft grundlos vor den Wycca, bei denen es sich meist nur um weise Frauen voll Kräuterweisheit und Heilkraft handelt. Aber es gibt unter ihnen in der Tat auch Dienerinnen dämonischer Mächte, die voller Bosheit schreckliche Flüche verhängen. Zu bestimmten unheiligen Zeiten kommen sie zusammen, um ihrem Meister Samiel zu huldigen. Niemand ahnt, dass Schwarze Hexen aus dem Zirkel des Grünen Sigills ihren finsteren Schatten auf das abgelegene Städtchen Thame werfen und bereits zahlreiche Anhänger gefunden haben!

Dieser Band enthält zwei locker miteinander verknüpfte Abenteuer in Thame und in den Wäldern der Umgebung:

Thame, die kleine Stadt im rauen Norden Albas, ist ein guter Ort für Abenteurer, die sich im Winter lieber in der warmen Stube ausruhen als in Eis und Schnee das Abenteuer zu suchen. Zur Vertreibung der Langeweile kommen euch die Nöte einer angesehenen Kauffrau gerade gelegen, die von einem unheimlichen Feind verfolgt wird: ihrem eigenen Schatten, der unter dem Einfluss finsterer Mächte zu einem lebendigen Wesen geworden ist. Die Frau ohne Schatten braucht euren Schutz, will sie die dunkle Jahreszeit überleben und mit eurer Hilfe ihren Fluch überwinden. Doch seid gewarnt: auf den Jahrmärkten und in den Straßen Thames verfängt man sich nur zu leicht in den Fallstricken eines Feindes, dessen wahres Gesicht lange verborgen bleibt.

Nach Ende des Winters erwacht nicht nur die Natur, sondern auch die Jagdlust im albischen Volk, vom einfachen Waldläufer über die gestandenen Mitglieder der Thamer Schützenschaft des Heiligen Maldrin bis zum Landesherrn persönlich. Durch Vermittlung eines Freundes wird euch die Ehre zuteil, an einer Jagdgesellschaft des Fürsten teilzunehmen und das lustige Lagerleben inmitten des Waldes zu genießen. Durch Zufall erfahrt ihr hier von einem Anschlag, den finstere Mächte auf ein angesehenes Mitglied der Thamer Gesellschaft planen. Der Pfeil des Jägers soll von der Hand Samiels gelenkt seinem Leben ein vorzeitiges Ende bereiten. Doch wo steckt das verfluchte Geschoss, wer ist der nichts ahnende Schütze, und wer ist das Opfer? Unter Zeitdruck müsst ihr in Thame und Umgebung nach Spuren suchen, um diese Fragen zu beantworten und den feigen Anschlag zu verhindern.


Translation:

In Alba, people often fear the Wycca for no reason, who usually are only women full of herbal wisdom and healing power. But there are among them, in fact, servants of demonic powers, who, full of wickedness, impose the power of terrible curses. At certain unholy times they come together to pay homage to their master Samiel. Nobody knows that black witches of the circle of the Green Sigil cast their dark shadows on the remote town of Thame and have already found many followers!

This volume contains two loosely linked adventures in Thame and the surrounding woods:

Thame, a small town in the rugged north of Alba, is a good place for adventurers who prefer to relax in the winter in a warm room than in ice and snow in search of an adventure. To drive out the boredom the hardships of a respected businesswoman, which is pursued by a sinister enemy, are coming handy: her own shadow, which has become under the influence of dark powers became a living being. The woman without a shadow needs your protection, if she wants to survive the dark season and with your help overcome her curse. But be warned: at fairs and in the streets of Thames it is all too easy to get caught in the snares of an enemy whose true face will remain hidden for long.

After the end of winter, not only nature but also the pleasure in hunting among the albian people awakens, from simple Rangers on the seasoned members of the marksman guild of the Holy Maldrin in Thame up to the sovereign himself. Through the intervention of a friend you will be given the honor to join a hunting party of the princes and enjoy camp life in the midst of the forest. By chance, you learn about an assault on a respected member of the society of Thame, that dark forces are planning. The arrow of the hunter, guided by the hand SAMIEL, should prematurly end his life. But where's the damn projectile, who the unsuspecting shooter, and who is the victim? Under time pressure you have to look for clues in Thame and the surrounding area to answer these questions and to prevent the assault.

114843.name: Ninja - Pirate Cave Raid
114843.description:
User Summary

A line drawn action game. You are a ninja that has infiltrated a pirate cave. You can run left and right as well as jump. Attacking takes place automatically when near an enemy. Collect all the gold coins and treasure chests you can and beat the level before time runs out.

114844.name: Fuzion Bloks
114844.description:
From Introduction:

Character Creation for Fuzion Bloks is a little bit different than your regular Fuzion. It's mostly user friendly which is important to new players. Instead of using Character Points and Option Points, we are now using a Building Block process and Fuzion Points. In order to build a character you simply follow the Blocks and build your character from there

114845.name: G.I. Joe: the RPG
114845.description:
From Introduction:

GI Joe is the codename for American's daring, highly trained special mission force. It's purpose, to defend human freedom against Cobra a ruthless, terrorist organization determined to rule the world.

This game can be played two ways: Cartoon style and Comic Book style.
In the cartoon style all shooting weapons do STUN Damage, because bullets now turn to lasers. No one dies. This is great for kids who want to play.
In the Comic Book version all weapons play as presented in this PDF. This is more for those die hard military gamers and collectors.

114846.name: Star Wars Fuzion Bloks
114846.description:
User summary:

An adaptation of Star Wars material for the Fuzion ruleset.

114847.name: Der Grüne Jäger
114847.description:
From the back of the book:

Samiel oder der Grüne Jäger ist einer der faszinierendsten unter den Dämonenfürsten Midgards. Zu seiner Gefolgschaft gehören nicht nur mächtige Hexen und Finstermagier, sondern auch viele einfache Leute, die sich ihm in der Hoffnung auf ein besseres Leben verschrieben haben. In Alba findet man seine Anhänger traditionell in der Einsamkeit der Wälder, Sümpfe und Heidelandschaften, aber in jüngster Zeit macht er sich auch in den aufstrebenden Städten bemerkbar. Erst kürzlich wurde Thame durch den feigen Mordanschlag auf den Meister des Sonnenordens in Aufregung versetzt, in dessen Folge mit dem Grünen Sigill ein gefährlicher Kreis von Hexen zerschlagen wurde. So wollen es wenigstens der Stadtrat und die Vertreter der Kirgh glauben. Aber vielleicht haben ja einige Samielsjünger die Hexenjagd überstanden, und selbst, wenn sie alle aufgespürt wurden: das Netz des Grünen Jägers ist weit gespannt, und seine Macht ist ungebrochen.

Dieses Quellenbuch enthält Hintergrundmaterial zu Samiel und den ihm verfallenen Hexen. Es beschreibt den Aufbau und das Treiben der Hexenzirkel, an deren Spitze die geheimnisvollen Drei und die sinistre Schattengestalt stehen. Mächtige Zauber der Ritualmagie helfen dem Spielleiter, schwarzen Hexenzirkel in Alba und auch andernorts in Szene zu setzen und sie zu Gegenspielern aufzubauen, mit denen die Abenteurer es immer wieder zu tun bekommen.

Das Abenteuer Die Brut der Kröte wirft ein Schlaglicht auf eine Gruppe von Samielsjüngern, die in einem abgelegenen Winkel der Gwinelberge insgeheim ihr Unwesen treiben und die Bevölkerung eines Bergmannsdorfes unterjochen. Die Abenteurer stoßen auf ihr übles Treiben, während sie nach ein paar vermissten Mönchen suchen, die eine heilige Schrift nach Thame bringen sollten. Das Abenteuer steht in lockerem Zusammenhang mit dem Band Das Grüne Sigill.


Translation:

Samiel or the Green Hunter is one of the most intriguing among the Demon Lords of Midgard. To his followers belong not only powerful witches and dark magicians, but also many ordinary people who have succumbed to it in the hope of a better life. In Alba his traditional supporters are found in the solitude of the forests, marshes and moors, but recently he is also noticeable in the emerging cities. Thame was recently alarmed by the cowardly assassination attempt on the master of the Blazing Sun, as a result the Green Sigil, a dangerous circle of witches, was smashed. So it will at least believe the City Council and the representatives of Kirgh. But maybe some followers of Samiel have survived the witch hunt, and even if they were all tracked down: the web of the green hunter is wide, and his power is undiminished.

This source book contains background material on Samiel and the witches captivated by him. It describes the structure and the doings of the covens, which are headed by the mysterious three and the sinister, shadowy figure. Powerful spells and ritual magic help the gamemaster, to set the stage for black coven in Alba and elsewhere and to build up opposing forces, with whom the adventurers will have to deal over and over again.

The adventure the breed of the toad throws a spotlight on a group of followers of Samiel who secretly make mischief in a remote corner of the Gwinel Mountains and subjugate the population of a mountain man village. The adventurers encounter their evil doings, while they search for a few missing monks who should bring a holy book to Thame. The adventure is loosely connected with the band The Green Sigil.

114848.name: Heroic Vehicles
114848.description:
From Introduction:

This is a Plug-In system for the Fuzion game system, which essentially adapts the Vehicle rules for the HERO System into Fuzion. This Plug-In also utilizes a few of the rules options presented in The Ultimate Vehicle, or at least uses mechanics which make options from TUV usable, making that book much more relevant to the Fuzion system.

Because of its generic nature, the Heroic Vehicle Plug-In should be usable for all types of vehicles, from automobiles to starships, from flying carpets to giant robots, and from flying skateboards to the Death Star, from motorboats to time machines. Even all-new vehicle types, never before seen, can be created. The scope is really limited only by the user’s imagination.

However, it should be noted that only the vehicle itself is detailed in this Plug-In. Weapons and other equipment should be built with a Powers Plug-In, as noted below.

114849.name: Ninja Hamsters vs Robots
114849.description:
User Summary

Evil robots are on the attack, and stealing all the sushi! You must defeat the robots to recover the recipes for the sushi chef. Click on the screen to attack at that location, many upgrades are available, increase your attack power, increase your combos, increase the likelihood of sushi appearing, increase your defense and recovery time to name a few. Spend sushi to gain these upgrades. Avoid projectiles and saws.

114850.name: Fuzion Jazz
114850.description:
From Introduction:

Fuzion Jazz is a variant of the Fuzion role-playing game system. Fuzion is the FUZION Labs Group trademark for its multigenre game system. Fuzion Jazz differs from its parent system in that the number of characteristics has been reduced, the manner in which damage is inflicted has been simplified, and the Powers section has been considerably expanded (largely adapted from Hero System, one of the parent systems of Fuzion and a wonderful game system in its own right).

114851.name: Card Tower: The House of Cards
114851.description:
"Build a House of Cards using multi-touch technology on your iPhone and/or iPod Touch. The game features 3D environment, real physics. You can make screenshots of your Card Towers and share with your friends!

With a good technique and a little bit of patience, you can build a three or four story (or even higher) card tower with our very addictive and interesting iPhone and iPod Touch game. Now you can explore your inner architect in the comfort of your palm of the hand. No more winds, pets, or family members to destroy your creations!

With more than two decks of cards and unlimited time, you can compete with people around the world (online score submission will be added in the future versions) for now — top ranking with screenshots available now.

Beautifully designed game, with accurate physic rules and an undo feature to give you a chance to correct small mistakes not to ruin an entire tower you’ve spent hours to build."

Source: The Developer Website.

114852.name: Ninja Katana
114852.description:
User Summary

Cycore, a major PMC player has gone rogue, and is threatening the globe.
Fight as the ninja warrior Marseilles. Fight your way through a number of different levels. You can upgrade your blade, armor and projectile weapons. Use combos to kill enemies to get points for upgrades. Better combos earn more points.

114853.name: Insanity
114853.description:
"Insanity is a quick "no fuss" puzzle game on the iphone & ipod touch that will keep you perplexed for weeks! Whether you have just a couple of minutes or a spare hour you will find yourself coming back for more"

Source: The Developer Website.

114854.name: Delicious: Emily's True Love
114854.description:
Share in Emily's search for true happiness with Delicious - Emily's True Love Premium Edition, a wonderful new chapter in the amazing series.

A year after Emily opens her own restaurant, business continues to boom though her personal life is completely non-existent. Shades of promise appear when she receives a rose, but she is too shy to act on it. Then one day an old love letter from a summer romance arrives that turns Emily's world upside down. Will she act upon either of these to find her true love?

Find out as you follow Emily on this all-new romantic journey. Work your way through Emily's Place and all the way to Paris helping customers and learning more about the one that got away. Complete all-new wonderful games, slink your way through awkward situations, and meet fantastic new friends around the world. With exhilarating tasks, endearing surprises, rewarding trophies, and fabulous upgrades, Delicious - Emily's True Love is destined to become your favorite.

Source: The Game Website.

114855.name: Jason vs Zombies
114855.description:
User Summary

Jason vs Zombies is a First Person Shooter, you have to save the world kiling all the zombies you can. The game has 5 different levels and lots of guns.

114856.name: Doodle Army 2: Mini Militia
114856.description:
User Summary

In Doodle Army 2 : Mini Militia you can enjoy killing your opponents with 14 different weapons. It is a combat game for the Iphone and Ipad and supports up to 6 players online.

114857.name: Dougram Simulation Manual
114857.description:
Tactical level wargame based on Japanese anime animation "Fang of the Sun Dougram".
This game issue with Dual Magazine #2 to #5. Each edition can play separately and later game added another terrain, new units and scenarios.

Players control small troop of either Earth Federation Army or People's Liberation Army.
The game play is course of alternately player turns, but there are opponent defensive combat phase between the movement and combat phase. Combat is resolved in the two steps of accuracy and armor penetration.

The game contains several scenarios based on the story. Victory conditions are different for each scenario.

114858.name: Ping vs Pong
114858.description:
User Summary

Ping vs Pong is a recharged Ping-Pong game. It support up to 4 players in the same device and it offers a multitude of power ups that radically changes the game.

114859.name: Mortimer Beckett and the Crimson Thief
114859.description:
Join Mortimer on his most challenging adventure yet in Mortimer Beckett and the Crimson Thief.

Finally home after his astounding journey, Mortimer resumes his simple life and peruses the daily newspaper. One by one, famous artifacts from museums and private collections around the world are missing. The person claiming responsibility for the thefts goes by the moniker - the Crimson Thief, a ghost that the police can do nothing about. Mortimer however, jumps on the case and is determined to find the stolen goods while bringing the thief to justice.

Follow Mortimer around the world to recover the stolen items. Visit Paris, Rio, London, and other fabulous destinations where you will search for useful items, solve whimsical puzzles, and meet helpful locals. There's much more to this new mystery than meets the eye. Are the artifacts connected in any way? Can Mortimer piece together the clues to finding them all? Who is the Crimson Thief?

Source: The Game Website.

114860.name: Wings of Genesis
114860.description:
Set in the same universe with the Original Ge.ne.sis game, Wings of Genesis is a side-scrolling shooting game with a heavy touch of RPG influence. Players can pick one of the 3 main characters to begin the adventure and blast through waves of bosses and enemies!

Source: The Game Website.

114861.name: Die Straße zur Hölle
114861.description:
From the back of the book:

Die alten Götter der KanThai sind im Osten fast vergessen und durch die Dunkle Dreiheit verdrängt worden. Dank ihrer treuen Anhänger im TsaiChen-Tal herrschen sie aber immer noch in alter Stärke über den kanthanischen Himmel und mischen sich gerne in die Belange der Sterblichen ein. Diese Geschichte handelt von zwei Schwertern, die die Himmelskönigin, die Weiße Tigerin, vor langer Zeit in die Obhut zweier Adelsfamilien gegeben hat. Jede Klinge ist für sich eine herausragende magische Waffe, aber zusammen könnten die Himmelsschwerter sogar den Göttern selbst gefährlich werden. Die Schwarzen Adepten würden nur zu gerne in den Besitz dieser mächtigen Artefakte gelangen, aber sie sind seit langem verschollen.

Das Abenteuer verschlägt die Gefährten an das Ufer des Schattenmeeres, und da trifft es sich gut, dass sie die geplante Rückreise über KuenKung mit einem einfachen, aber lohnenden Auftrag verbinden können: das Überbringen von Geschenken an den Fürsten dieser Hafenstadt. Schon bald geraten sie in Verdacht, eines der Himmelsschwerter zu transportieren, und werden zu Gejagten, die sich abseits der großen Straßen durch das Land schlagen müssen, um den Häschern der Schwarzen Adepten zu entgehen. Auf ihrer Reise bekommen sie es mit verzogenen Fürstensöhnen, ehrlichen Räubern, mörderischen Wirtsleuten, Geistern der alten KanThai, einem außergewöhnlichen Maultier und einem echten Feenmädchen der Himmelskönigin zu tun. Und zu allem Überfluss spinnen die Dämonen der kanthanischen Hölle, von denen viele mit den Schwarzen Adepten im Bunde sind, ihre eigenen Netze. Schaffen es die Gefährten, das Rätsel um die beiden Himmelsschwerter zu lösen und sie dem Zugriff der Hölle zu entziehen?

Dieses Heft enthält ein episches Rollenspiel-Abenteuer, das hochgradige Spielerfiguren bis in die Hölle führt und dabei die kämpferischen wie auch die rollenspielerischen Fähigkeiten ihrer Spieler fordert.


Translation:

The old gods of the KanThai are almost forgotten in the east and were driven out by the Dark Trinity. Thanks to their loyal supporters in the Valley TsaiChen they still rule in full force over the Kanthan sky and like to interfere in the affairs of mortals. This story is about two swords, the Queen of Heaven, the white tigress has given long ago into the custody of two noble families. Each blade is excellent for a magical weapon, but together the sky swords could be dangerous even for the gods themselves. The Black Adepts were only too happy to get these powerful artifacts into thire hands, but they have disappeared long ago.

The adventure lets the companions end up at the shore of the Sea of Shadows, and it is fortunate that the planned return journey over KuenKung can be combined with a simple, but rewarding job: The making of gifts to the prince of this port city. Soon they fall under suspicion of carrying one of the swords of heaven, and become the hunted, who must struggle along through the countryside, away from the major roads to escape the bloodhounds of the Black Adepts. On their journey they have to deal with spoiled sons of princes, honest robbers, homicidal innkeepers, ghosts of the old KanThai, a mule and a truly exceptional faerie girl of the Queen of Heaven. And to make matters worse, the demons of the Kanthan hell, of which many are in alliance with the Black Adepts, spin their own webs. Do the companions manage to solve the mystery of the two celestial and to escape the clutches of hell?

This booklet contains an epic role-playing adventure that leads high level player characters to hell and that challenges the fighting skills as well as the role-playing skills of your players.

114862.name: Martial Arts Plug-In
114862.description:
From Introduction:

Martial Arts. Kung Fu kicks, Karate chops — or, at the most esoteric and powerful levels, Ki strikes that slam an opponent with the force of the master’s sheer will. As a Martial Artist, you have had training in a specialized Martial Art, allowing you to use Martial Arts techniques, as well as perhaps building your own Martial Arts style of combat with new techniques if your GM (and campaign) permits.

114863.name: Ragami
114863.description:
In all cultures there are mythical characters that protect people and help them to solve their problems. Those characters often take the human form with wings and we call them Guardian Angels or RAGAMI.

In this game, each player will play the role of a RAGAMI, winged human form, that travels around inside a city - the board. In this city, there are always people with problems, with their own internal conflicts, that need your help. There are also holy men and demons that can help or oppose to solving these conflicts.

The objective of the game is to achieve the highest possible number of Virtue Points (VP). There are several ways to get VP, and consequently there are several strategies one can follow to win the game: solve conflicts, cause demons to disappear, help other RAGAMI, to be the RAGAMI who has solved the highest number of conflicts, etc.

But helping people to solve their conflicts is what worths more VPs, and for this you need to have Points of Strength. As many as the strength of the conflict you're trying to solve, which can go from 1 to 6. There are several ways to get Points of Strength: white cubes, cards, holy men, the help of another RAGAMI, or a die.

There are Action Dies (which allow to execute a certain number of actions, and it's placement will be made by the last player in the turn order) and there are Action Cards (that may be acquired during the game). In his play, Player can do one of the following actions: move his RAGAMI, move the holy men and the demons, pick cards or solve conflicts.

Game ends in the turn when the places of conflicts ends or when a player hit's the 30 points score mark.

Game to 2 to 4 players, 10 years up, 60 - 90 min.

114864.name: Matrix Magic Plug-In for Fuzion
114864.description:
From Introduction:

This is a Plug-In system for the Fuzion game system, based on a magic system I had in a home-brew game system I cooked up many years ago (the early 1980s). The system was called Fantastic Adventure, but I initially decided to call this the Tran Magic Plug-In, after the world in which that game was set.

Tra (pronounced TEE-rah) was a world vaguely similar to Earth, though it was decidedly different in many ways. Somewhere in the distant past, some 3000 years ago, an Occurrence had taken place that had altered certain geographical features, destroyed much of the high-tech civilization that existed at the time, and unleashed magic on the world. Those are, in fact, the only details of the Occurrence which survived to the time of the PCs. Elves, Dwarves, and similar people lived among men, as did a number of sentient species that would look to use like anthropomorphized animals. This was a rough-and-tumble world, with as much post-Apocalypse and Wild West to its atmosphere as high fantasy.

And it had its own method for doing magic — one which cried out for its own system.

At the time, the only way I could see to use such a unique magic system was to create my own game system from the ground up. As it turned out, most of that game’s systems stank; only the action-management system (which used an extension of the concepts behind Hero’s SPD chart) and the magic system were smooth enough to warrant continued survival.

Now, with Fuzion, one can build sub-systems (aka Plug-Ins) as needed. This, at last, was an opportunity for the Fantastic Adventure magic system to be resurrected without re-launching (not to mention re-creating) the entire system. Of course, some of the specifics needed to be drawn from existing Fuzion plug-ins; where they wouldn’t disrupt the "feel" of Tran magic, rules have been adapted from existing magic and powers Plug-Ins (such as the Power Plug-In from Champions New Millennium, Jason Dour's Heroic Abilities Plug-In, Mark Chase's Atomik Magick, or even the HERO System Rulesbook Fourth Edition!).

Since its origin (and its posting in Beta Format), this Plug-In has been adapted for use in other fantasy worlds, and so a new name has been called for. Part of the original concept was that a "spell" is referred to as a "matrix" (even though in this text it's still called a "spell"), and so this Plug-In is called the Matrix Magic Plug-In.

114865.name: Collapse! Blast
114865.description:
Challenge your friends with the fast action fun of Collapse! Blast, a Facebook-connected version of the classic hit game.

The blockbusting excitement of Collapse! gets even more explosive now that you can challenge your Facebook friends. Enjoy this one minute color-matching frenzy as you go for the highest score possible. Simply click on like-colored groups of blocks to destroy them, but be quick before they reach the top!

Add more rows to create bigger groups and earn massive points. The more you score, the quicker you can rise in experience levels to open up all new possibilities for fun, including the use of fantastic power-ups. Continuous updates ensure that you will always have a fun new challenge to meet, and with Facebook integration, you can invite friends, use Facebook credits, and compete in weekly tournaments with fabulous surprises!

Source: The Game Website.

114866.name: Die Treppe zum Himmel
114866.description:
From the back of the book:

Vor langer Zeit hat die Himmelskönigin, die Weiße Tigerin, zwei Himmelsschwerter geschaffen, die sogar den Göttern selbst gefährlich werden können. Jetzt ist das legendäre Klingenpaar wieder aufgetaucht. Die einzige Möglichkeit, es dauerhaft dem Zugriff der Schwarzen Adepten zu entziehen und das Überleben der Götter zu sichern, ist es, die Waffen zurück in den Himmel zu bringen. Doch bevor die Gefährten es wagen können, der Himmelskönigin von Angesicht zu Angesicht gegenüber zu treten, müssen sie erst das Rätsel der Purpurnen Treppe lösen, über die Sterbliche in den kanthanischen Himmel gelangen können.

Zuerst müssen die Abenteurer das Geheimnis um das Unrecht in der Gegenwart und das Unrecht in der Vergangenheit lüften und einen Mord sowie eine böse Intrige aufdecken, deren Opfer der Erste Kaiser und seine Anverwandten waren. Dabei geraten die Abenteurer einem unsterblichen und Jahrtausende alten Magier in die Quere, der sich die Himmelsschwerter aneignen und mit ihnen selbst zum Gott werden will. Um seine Pläne zu durchkreuzen, müssen sie nach FengDu, der Höllenstadt, reisen und sich dort mit Dämonen und den auf ihre Wiedergeburt wartenden Seelen auseinandersetzen, um die verlorene Kinderseele des rechtmäßigen Nachfolgers des Ersten Kaisers zu finden. In FengDu finden sie auch heraus, um was es sich bei der Purpurtreppe handelt. Jetzt gilt es nur noch, mit den Himmelsschwertern den Aufstieg in den Garten der Himmelskönigin zu bewältigen, sich im Gespräch mit dieser launischen und mächtigen Dame zu beweisen und sie vor ihrem verräterischen Liebhaber zu retten.

Dieses Heft enthält ein episches Abenteuer, in dem hochgradige Spielerfiguren sich mit den himmlischen und höllischen Mächten KanThaiPans messen müssen und das ihre kämpferischen und rollenspielerischen Fähigkeiten fordert.


Translation:

Long ago, the Queen of Heaven, the White Tigress, has created two swords of heaven, which can be dangerous even to the gods themselves. Now the legendary pair of blades has reappeared. The only way to remove them permanently from the access of the Black Adepts and to ensure the survival of the gods, is to bring the weapons back into the heaven. But before the Fellowship can dare to face the Queen of Heaven face to face, they must first solve the mystery of the purple stairs, over which the mortals can enter the Kanthan heaven.

First the adventurers have to solve the mystery surrounding the injustice in the present and the wrongs in the past and uncover a murder and unravel an evil plot, whose victims the First Emperor and his relatives were. Doing that the adventurers get in the way of a thousand years old immortal magician, who wants to get the sky swords for himself to become a god himself with their help. To thwart his plans, they must travel to FengDu, the city of hell, and there deal with demons and souls waiting for their rebirth to find the lost child soul of the rightful successor of the First Emperor. In FengDu they also find out about what the purple stairs are. Now they only have to ascent with the swords of heaven into the garden of the Queen of Heaven, stand their ground while talking to this whimsical and powerful woman and save her before her treacherous lover.

This booklet contains an epic adventure in which high-level player characters have to compete with the celestial and infernal powers of KanThaiPan and which challenges their combative and role-playing skills.

114867.name: Freelancer Hexxagon
114867.description:
user summary

The reality has cracked.

This are the core rules together with the adventure campaign about the evil mage Hexxagon. The player slip into one of the 13 heros and doing a quest through Cologne, germany.
Become a freelancer!

... and go down into the Cologne catacombs under the cathedral. Enjoy a nostalgic dungeon crawl.

114868.name: Bloody Sunset
114868.description:
Survive the night while battling hordes of monsters in Bloody Sunset.

Zombies, aliens and other creatures of the night are out to get you after taking an enchanted skull from the wrong burial ground. Protect your home and self at all costs in 25 action-packed waves of bullets, mayhem, and destruction.

Each level gets tougher and tougher to clear, so you will have to fire fast to survive. With each wave, you can purchase new weapons and items to fortify your home base. Buy a turret, upgrade your shooting skills, or repair damage to your house. It's your choice how to deal with the rushing monsters. Can you survive till the breaking dawn?

Source: The Game Website.

114869.name: Agent 079
114869.description:
Escape the machinations of the evil Dr. Nemesis in Agent 079, a free point-and-click adventure.

Agent 079 is called to a distant island to track the whereabouts of his dastardly foe, Dr. Nemesis. Unfortunately, this is only a ruse to get the agent out there and the Dr. is well aware of his arrival. Now, the unsuspecting agent has fallen right into his trap.

Help Agent 079 solve the elaborate riddle that has been set up to toy with him by the notorious villain. Explore inside the diabolical infinity chamber, with a maze of eight rooms that stack, shift, shuffle and move. Gain control of the rooms to connect them to each other in a myriad of ways by solving all of the puzzles. Search for items, solve puzzles, decipher riddles and follow the clues to escape certain doom!

Source: The Game Website.

114870.name: Tic-Tac Bingo Game
114870.description:
Tic Tac Bingo Game: Preschoolers can either play Tic Tac Toe or Bingo. For Bingo, one player drops both the color and character dice through the dice tower. All players simultaneously try to match the correct color and character on their player card by placing a chip on the correct space. The first player to get Bingo, wins. For Tic Tac Toe, one player drops the character die through the dice tower and only that player tries to match the character on their player card by placing a chip on the correct space. The next player takes a turn. The first player to get Tic Tac Toe, wins.

Contents:

4 Double-Sided Game Boards
56 Game Chips (4 Different Colors)
2 Dice
1 Dice Tower

boardgamehonor.20117: 2012 Golden Geek Best Abstract Board Game Nominee

114871.description:
Overview

For The Win is an abstract strategy game in which each player gets ten tiles, two of each character representing Monkeys, Zombies, Pirates, Aliens, and Ninjas. The objective is to connect five (or more) of one's tiles, including at least one of each type, together (sides and corners count). Additionally, all five (or more) tiles must be face-up, or unactivated. The game ends immediately when a player achieves this goal. Each character type has a specific ability to help you toward the objective.


Gameplay

Players take turns using either 1 or 2 actions within 5 action rounds. Once one player's actions are consumed for a round, the other player(s) get to use any of their remaining 5 actions at once. Judicious action management is key; if one budgets one's actions wisely, one can play several actions in a row for game-winning combinations. The available actions are as follows:


Add a tile to the Grid
Move one of one's tiles
Refresh or flip a tile face up
Shove a tile or column/row of tiles
Activate an ability (the chosen tile turns face down; see below)



Characters & abilities


Alien — The Alien uses her tractor beam to pull any tile in the Grid to a space that is adjacent to her.
Monkey — The mischievous Monkey uses a banana peel to flip over all of the tiles it is touching.
Ninja — The sneaky Ninja can move from his current spot to any other unoccupied space in the Grid.
Pirate — The Pirate uses his trusty cannon to blast an adjacent tile to any unoccupied space in the Grid.
Zombie — The Zombie can infect any adjacent tile. The infected tile is removed from the Grid and replaced with a Zombie tile that has not yet been added to the Grid. If all of the Zombie tiles have already been added to the Grid, the Zombie may choose one adjacent tile and deactivate it (that is, flip it face down).
114871.name: For The Win

114872.name: Monster Fuzion
114872.description:
From Introduction:

Jason was not sure what to expect. His world had changed so much that he was thoroughly confused. He used to watch horror movies about vampires, demons, and various other monster types. Now he was seeing them. How could this happen?

Fortunately there were others like him. Normal humans that had never seen or knew of anything like what was after him now. Jason also wondered who could help him out of this situation.

The demon tracked his pray with smell and hearing. This human was a little crafty and had managed to hurt him. Now he had to die.

Welcome to Monster Fuzion. This is a role-playing game using the Instant Fuzion System. The time frame can be any that you like, but the recommendation is to be played in current times.

Why Monsters?
Why not monsters? Just imagine what a real vampire would have to go through in today’s society. What would Eddie Munster do today? Or even Pugsly and Wednesday Addams?

114873.name: Garden Panic
114873.description:
Protect your strawberry patch from gluttonous invaders in Garden Panic, an action-packed game of strategy.

You've just grown the most wonderful and tasty strawberries in your little old garden but insects have quickly taken noticed. Now, they are launching an all-out attack to feast on your fruit but they are unaware that you have the perfect defenses planned for them. Can you keep these marauding insects from eating up your strawberries?

Set up your protective plants to take out the bugs as they make their way to your strawberries. Purchase from five different varieties and watch them shell out destruction in many ways. Watch as they gain experience, then upgrade them to do even more damage to the oncoming insect invasion. Plan carefully and set them up strategically, or else your strawberries are history.

Source: The Game Website.

114874.name: Unter den Nebelbergen (Midgard 4th Edition)
114874.description:
User Summary:

In 2010 a true classic among the adventures of Midgard has returned as a PDF: Unter den Nebelbergen (Under the Misty Mountains) has been released in an modified version updated to the 4th Edition of Midgard.

114875.name: Ninja Rinseout
114875.description:
User Summary

Play as a ninja attempting to rescue a princess. Use stealth and your wits to defeat enemies, preferably without being seen. To assist you the enemies have remarkably poor vision, and do not see each others bodies. Controls are running left and right, jumping, climbing walls and attacking. Levels can be replayed if killed.

114876.name: Knopf Mau Mau
114876.description: The buttons are having a party, they always pair up in twos, either with the same colour or the same shape. One white button is strung onto the bracelet, all other buttons go into the bag. All players in turn draw buttons from the bag until they have five, one button is placed in the middle of the table. In your turn you may discard a button when it has the same shape or the same color as the button in the middle. The old button is taken out of the game. If you have no button to discard, you draw a button from the bag and may try to feel for the shape beforehand. White Lucky Buttons can be placed anytime. If you are the first to discard all your buttons you win and get the bracelet to wear, if you win the next round, you win the game.

114877.name: The Outpost
114877.description:
Save your space station from marauding invaders in The Outpost.

You are the commander of an outpost far off in space. With little warning, it's come under attack from mysterious invaders. Can you survive their onslaught long enough for reinforcements to arrive?

Protect your base from the invaders in this exciting Tower Defense game. Confront 10 enemy types, plus Bosses, and shoot them out of the sky with your weapons. Purchase special structures that allow for upgrades and other bonuses. Can you make it through 10 levels of destruction and then challenge 9 optional levels to make it through?

Source: The Game Website.

114878.name: Ninjufo
114878.description:
User Summary

Play as an alien, in a UFO. You can move in all four directions, and fire a shuriken which boomerangs back to you in the direction you are facing. You must infiltrate an enemy warehouse to collect crates. Killing enemies earns you money, dying costs you money, and the longer you take the more money you lose.

114879.name: Cursed Treasure - Don't Touch My Gems
114879.description:
Stop an encroaching army of heroes from taking your plundered riches in 'Cursed Treasure - Don't Touch My Gems'.

You've pillaged and plundered to build a mass of wealth but now a bunch of heroic do-gooders are intent on taking it and restoring piece to their land. As an evil lord, you are in no mood for their trifling and need to put a stop to this.

Build dens, crypts and temples to prevent them from carrying off with your gems in 15 action levels. Place them strategically to mow down the invaders with their firing turrets. Use earned money to upgrade your towers and place them on Mana spots to earn even more powerful attacks. Stop them from taking your treasure!

Source: The Game Website.

114880.name: SpaceCraft
114880.description:
Conquer the galaxy one battle at a time in SpaceCraft.

The year is 2525 and Earth is destroyed by decades of war. The survivors build huge motherships and depart for a journey to the stars, yet they learn that they are not alone as they encounter dreadful and mysterious enemies at every turn. Can you help humanity in one last chance for survival?

Grab control of a huge mothership and conquer the enemies to keep humanity safe. Build 21 different ships, each with its own special abilities. Use 15 different mothership specials, unlock bonus levels and special achievements, and choose from over 100 upgrades throughout the game to strengthen your military. It's one fascinating and challenging real-time strategy game that will keep you hooked for hours.

Source: The Game Website.

114881.name: Nuclear Eagle
114881.description:
User Summary

Control a giant eagle trying to feed it's babies. You can pick up many objects and throw them at the ground or in your nest. Feed your eaglets people, and destroy other objects.

114882.name: Power Core Beta V2
114882.description:
From Introduction:

With these powers I could be a Super Hero! That’s right, and it all begins with deciding where those magnificent powers of yours are going to come from. You must first decide what gives you those amazing abilities; you must choose your Power Core. Next, you must decide what you can do with this engine. And lastly you must decide how far you can take it and what direction it’s going to take you.

114883.name: Bubble Bee
114883.description:
Help a little bee clear the honeycombs in Bubble Bee, a free shooting game made for the whole family.

The little bee needs to gather honey from the honeycombs but they aren't cooperating. Instead, they are making it more difficult. See what you can do to help out the bee so it can collect the yummy honey.

Move and shoot your way around eight wonderful levels as the honeycombs move in many strange ways. Be careful not to get hit by the honey drips, or else you'll lose one of your lives, and once all three of them are gone, the game is over. See how long you can last, or try to make it to the very end.

Source: The Game Website.

114884.name: BalliesShoot
114884.description:
Shoot your way to the top of the leader boards in BalliesShoot, a free game based on classic arcade shooters.

The Ballies are attacking and it's up to you to take them down! Use your own monster Ballie to get back at them, then catch all of the yummy fruit for massive points. But watch out, because all Ballies take different amounts of shots to destroy, can swoop down on you, or shoot back!

Move your Ballie left or right then watch as the fruit rains down. Catch special items and unlock powerful power-ups such as a three-way shot, a laser shot, exploding bombs, and more. Get through all 30 levels, including bonus point levels, and then take on the biggest Ballie of them all! It's a simple and fun shooter for the whole family to enjoy.

Source: The Game Website.

114885.name: Slot Car Gran Prix
114885.description:
Put your slot car on the tracks and push the pedal to the metal in Slot Car Gran Prix, a fast and furious FREE racing game.

Burn rubber and reach the finish line before your opponent. With a click of your mouse, you're off as the green light strikes. But watch out for those curves, because if you hit them too fast, you'll fly off the track and lose valuable time, and ground.

Select from five fabulous cars and fifteen outrageous racetracks as you drive for total domination. It takes a steady hand and nerves of steel. Can you come out on top and claim the winner's circle?

Source: The Game Website.

114886.name: One Button Arthur
114886.description:
User Summary

Control Arthur with one button. Depending on the level you can make him act in different ways: attack with sword, jump, run, stand still to name a few. Some levels are puzzles to figure how to get through, some are straightforward but must be executed well.

114887.name: Lin Chung Combat
114887.description:
Defeat High Roller and his evil minions in Lin Chung Combat, a FREE intense rhythm action game!

When High Roller and his evil minions launch their attack on Big Green, Lin Chung is the only champion who stands in their way. As the most accomplished, skilled warrior in all of the village, it's up to Lin Chung to save the day!

Use the arrow keys on your keyboard to guide our hero through a series of devastating martial arts moves as he fights his way through 14 levels of intense play. Keep the beat as you press the keys in this exciting music-based combat game, but be quick about it! This is a game that requires lightning-fast reflexes and nimble fingers. Play through all the stages as you master the various challenges to save Big Green from your enemies! Do you have the skills it takes to defeat High Roller and his crew? Play Lin Chung Combat now and find out!

Source: The Game Website.

114888.name: Back Home
114888.description:
Save Max the robot from the recycling plant in Back Home, a free online platform adventure for all ages.

Max worked in a restaurant as a waiter but the time came when he was too old to do much, so his boss bought a new robot to replace him. Max was then shipped off to the recycling plant and prepared to be turned into spare parts, when he decided he didn't want any part of that. Now, Max is on a mission to escape and find his way back home.

Join Max on this fun journey to break out of the recycling plant. Travel through 15 maze-like levels battling harvesters, finding keys, and locating the exit. Collect to upgrade Max, locate batteries for extra energy, and use portals as shortcuts. Can you make your way out of this tricky dilemma?

Source: The Game Website.

114889.name: Oozing Forever
114889.description:
User Summary

You were taken by scientists and stored in a cage, and they sold your ooze! Now you have escaped and want revenge. You can control where you move, and jump with the mouse. Gather slime and electricity to become more powerful, avoid light as it evaporates your ooze.

114890.name: Power Core
114890.description:
From Introduction:

It has taken over a year to compile this book and it is an ideal add on for any Fuzion campaign. It is geared towards Cyber Punk gaming in the Dark Millennium setting but can easily be used for any genre. Fantasy and Sci-Fi would be perfect genres to plug Power Core into, especially with the Spell Designer and the Item Designer.

We made several key decisions that Fuzion gamers should be aware of:

First and foremost, you need to read this entire chapter before using the book. It details all of the changes to Classic Fuzion.

We do not discuss the dialing aspect but you may convert as you wish. For example, we speak of Hexes as being yards and have geared the powers in that fashion. You may use meters if you’re more comfortable with the metric system but you may have to do a little of your own math.

We use a relative cost system for power modifiers rather than an add/subtract system. In this first chapter you will find two other easy conversions to Classic Fuzion and a Hero-Like style of cost modification.

114891.name: Operation BlackKnife
114891.description:
User Summary

Your team is losing the war, and you are their last hope. Outfitted with an experimental X1 Delta fighter it is up to you to change the course of the war. Upgrade your ship, destroy enemies, and most of all don't die!

114892.name: The Bad Man
114892.description:
From the introduction:

A Don’t Rest Your Head convention scenario about children overcoming their very real, very deadly Nightmares and their first time in the Mad City.

114893.name: KaijuD¡ce!
114893.description:
A game of rampage, you take control of a Kaiju Monster and score points by rampaging the city.
This game is a print and play game for 2 to 4 players from 4 to 104 years old.
All you need are some D6. The first player of the turn throw some D6, and picks one to move his kaiju monster, if the monster ends in a square with a building, it's a rampage ! The building is destroyed. The next player picks one of the remaining D6 and so on... The next turn, the player to the left becomes the first player.
When all the building are destroyed, each player scores one point for one building destroyed by his monster. Players with the higher scores are the winners.

114894.name: Freelancer Reenact 2332
114894.description:
user summary

Players Handbook for the Reeanct 2332 campaign

Tokio, tomorrow in a year. You the freelancers are the only one who can defend the monsters that are destroying everything. This Cypermachine build out of harmless gadgetry came out of the blue and no one can stop them. While finding out that those Monster have powers similarly to those of the freelancer the players beginn to understand whats going on.

Weapons and Visions

Along the campaign this book also contains Updates to the equipment of the freelancers, rules for the cyperwar, an introducing adventure, tips for the roleplay and a great monsterlist.

114896.name: Freelancer Reenact 2332: Cyber Space
114896.description:
user summary

Freelancer Reenact 2332: Cyber Space

This is the gamemaster handbook for the Reenact 2332 campagin

114897.name: Orbital Decay
114897.description:
User Summary

You control a huge space vessel, the Radiant Star. Earn points by destroy enemy units that can be used to upgrade your ship. There are many areas in the ship that can be upgraded, customize your ship as you want. You will be fighting many space ships, and have no maneuverability whatsoever, all your fighting capacity comes from your upgrades, and the main turret that you control.

114898.name: Freelancer Core Rules
114898.description: This is the free downloadable Set of rules as pdf.

114899.name: Powers (Fuzion)
114899.description:
From Introduction:

Powers are abilities far beyond those of mortal men, for example, flying or firing energy bolts. The listed here can be used to simulate the powers of a superhero, the spells of a sorcerer, or the abilities of an alien.

Not all characters ill have Powers. A modern spy or a fantasy swordsman can be built by buying only Characteristics, Skills, and Talents. On the other hand, a superhero or a fantasy magic user can have many different Powers.

114900.name: Prime
114900.description:
From Introduction:

I started work on PRIME in November 1998. Ever since than I began working on it for about a few hours every few months. I don't know when I will finish this work, most probably never.

PRIME is my futuristic role-playing world. I was inspired by many sci-fi stories and you often can guess which parts are "stolen" from other sources. I do not hide this fact, because nothing in the world is perfectly new and everything is a modification or variation of an older idea, it sometimes just takes longer to identify the origins. Why then did I write a new role-playing background? I do own Battlelords of the 23rd Century, Battletech: Mechwarrior, Mutant Chronicles, Heavy Gear, Shadowrun, Bubblegum Crisis (and others..), I've seen movies like 5th Element, Star Wars, Star Trek and many more, and every world has its ideas, but none was absolutely what I was looking for.

So what am I looking for? In sci-fi I enjoy aliens, a lot of playable alien races, space pirates hiding in asteroid belts, multilateral politics and diplomacy, giant space battles, heroism and adventure. It's LowTech Sci-Fi and Space Opera, not as dark as Fading Suns, not as specialised as Space Gothic. What's LowTech and Space Opera in my eyes: I want a crew right from a curiosity show. I want the ship to be as old as methusalem and as reliable as Winxxxxx5. I want the ship's engineer to take a hammer, slam it against the 'proton-pulse drive', and, whoarr.., it work's. He's the engineer, he knows his job. No tech-talk.

But my main problem was the scale of sci-fi worlds/universes. Did you ever imagine how a space vessel full of pirates should hide in space? By scaling down the gaming world to one star system I feel this problem partly solved. Spaceships do not have to travel light-years to their destiny and by setting several planets into the sun's orbits a ship may as well be intercepted from asteroid fields or nearby planets.

The gaming rules I choose are from the Fuzion system. I did not want to put extra energy in the creation of a new system if there is the perfect one for free. Fuzion is in my opinion the perfect choice for science fiction and action based role playing.

114901.name: Freelancer: Operation Kölnfels
114901.description:
user summary

OPERATION KÖLNFELS

This is the free downloadable adventure as pdf.
This is a adventure/mission for the Cologne Setting. This adventure was designed as intruduction of the Cologne campaign.

The players have to clear an island on the river rhine and free all hostages. This pdf includes maps and 7 complete characters ready for play.

114902.name: The Night of the Yule Cat
114902.description:
From the PDF:

This is a short scenario based on the old Icelandic myth of the Yule Cat, the huge and monstrous black cat that eats children who don’t have new clothes to wear at Christmas eve.

The story takes place during the Pagan Commonwealth period of Icelandic history, before the Christian conversion in the year 1000. As the story starts, the pagan player characters are preparing to celebrate the mid-winter festival of Yule ("Jól" in Icelandic), which is described in Grettis Saga as being a time of "greatest mirth and joyance among men."

boardgamehonor.41170: 2014 UK Games Expo Best Abstract Game Winner

114903.description:
In Castellan, two players work together to build a castle. Finely-detailed wall and tower pieces link together to form courtyards, and the player who finishes a courtyard claims it with a Keep, scoring points for that courtyard equal to the number of tower pieces surrounding it.

In more detail, each player starts the game with two decks of cards: a wall deck and a tower deck. Each card allows a player to play the components shown on it, with the wall deck cards always depicting at least one wall (and some combination of walls/towers) and the tower deck cards always depicting at least one tower (and again some combination of walls/towers). On a turn, a player can play as many cards as she wants, but she draws only one card at the end of her turn. The goal is to create courtyards – and subdivide existing courtyards – while keeping your opponent from doing the same. Players have the same cards in their decks, so the challenge is all about what to use when. The game ends when all the castle pieces are used up, and the player with the most points wins.

Two different pairs of Keep colors are available in the two versions of Castellan, so with two copies of the game – and the right combination of bits – up to four players can play.
114903.name: Castellan

114904.name: Tekeli-li!
114904.description:
From Introduction:

"The universe is not only queerer than we imagined, it is queerer than we can imagine." —J. B. S. Haldane

This is a supplement for using Fuzion to run Lovecraftian horror, such as one gets with Call of Cthulhu, in either its Chaosium or D20 incarnation. Horror games, in other words, but a particular kind of horror: something slow, insidious, and wrong. It is not mad slashers chasing nubile teenagers; it is encounters with things that drive humans mad, and risking insanity to banish those things.

In H.P. Lovecraft’s fiction, Earth is an exception. The laws here are not the same as the laws Out There, and we, who have evolved in this benign environment, cannot stand the harsh light of reality.

Oh — Tekeli-li! was the cry of the strange beings that lived "At The Mountains Of Madness."

114905.name: Out of this World
114905.description:
User Summary

Out of this World features a romantic, old world quality. You and your love must fight through multiple levels, such as a shootemup level, a falling level, and platformer. But beware, you will be lost without her, and must try to recover your missing sweetheart.

114906.description:
"Discover the World" in English
Trivia game with questions about a nature.
You must answer correctly to advance on the game board and collect all the profit from the first part. A question is read aloud along with three possible answers, the players put in their opinion, the correct prediction chip face down on the table. Who has been right moves on the board in front of a field may turn around the chip and win the corresponding part. For higher income parts players have to move higher by answering further questions, but falls back on the base part with a wrong answer. Who first had all the pieces turned on the colored side wins.
114906.name: Entdecke die Welt

114907.description:
"Discover the animals" in English
Trivia game with questions about a nature.
You must answer correctly to advance on the game board and collect all the profit from the first part. A question is read aloud along with three possible answers, the players put in their opinion, the correct prediction chip face down on the table. Who has been right moves on the board in front of a field may turn around the chip and win the corresponding part. For higher income parts players have to move higher by answering further questions, but falls back on the base part with a wrong answer. Who first had all the pieces turned on the colored side wins.
114907.name: Entdecke die Tiere

114908.description:
"Discover the nature" in English
Trivia game with questions about a nature.
You must answer correctly to advance on the game board and collect all the profit from the first part. A question is read aloud along with three possible answers, the players put in their opinion, the correct prediction chip face down on the table. Who has been right moves on the board in front of a field may turn around the chip and win the corresponding part. For higher income parts players have to move higher by answering further questions, but falls back on the base part with a wrong answer. Who first had all the pieces turned on the colored side wins.
114908.name: Entdecke die Natur

114909.name: The Naughty Tentacles Sourcebook Appendix H: Inu Yasha
114909.description:
