oo - Stealth (Subterfuge, Effect)
Frey becomes Hidden. Upkeep: o
ooo - Fimbulvetr (Subterfuge, Charge)
+4 Attack. This Charge cannot be intercepted. If this Charge causes damage, the enemy Unit loses all of its Action Points. Effect 14.
Frey may only use this Charge if she is Hidden.
ooo - Unbound Beast (Ki, Charge)
+3 Damage. Frey can only use this Charge if she is Berserk. If this Charge deals damage to an enemy Unit, remove 1 Berserk counter from Frey.
A part of Team Puppet Master along with Adolf and Freya.
114516.name: Anima Tactics: Frey

114517.description:
Adolf Brunner’s twin daughters, Frey and Freya have been raised as living weapons whose sole purpose is destroying Adolf’s enemies. Inheriting bestial spirit power from their mother Tuan Dalyr and modified with enhanced physical abilities due to their father’s experiments, they are terrifyingly inhuman predators. Frey and Freya aren’t driven by evil and cruelty, sadly depravity and death is all they have ever known.

Dark Azur Alliance Prowler - Lv. 40
At 5 | Dm 3 | Df 10 | Ar 0 | LP: 12 | Re 10 | Mo 12/16 | AP 3/4
Innate abilities: Open Movement
Unbound: At the end of the Maintenance phase roll a dice.
On 6+, Freya suffers Berserk Lvl 1.
oo - Stealth (Subterfuge, Effect)
Freya becomes Hidden. Upkeep: o
oo - Ragnarok (Subterfuge, Attack)
+4 Attack / +2 Damage. This Attack affects all enemy Units within 2 inches of Freya. Freya may only use this attack if she is Hidden.
ooo - Unbound Beast (Ki, Charge)
+3 Damage. Freya can only use this Charge if she is Berserk. If this Charge deals damage to an enemy Unit, remove 1 Berserk counter from Freya.
A part of Team Puppet Master along with Adolf and Frey.
114517.name: Anima Tactics: Freya

114518.name: OPFOR Full Spectrum War
114518.description:
Warfare is no longer just guns and bombs. It incorporates all types of Political Power. The army calls this PMESII (Political, Military, Economic, Social, Infrastructure, and Information), or FULL SPECTRUM WARFARE.
In this simulation, you will see some of the factors that commanders now must contend with to beat win a FSW (Full Spectrum War).

The game is played with 3 decks; a terrain deck, an OPFOR political power deck and a BLUFOR political power deck. Nine territories are drawn to be contended for. Players play cards out of their hand one at a time, to vie for the terrain and it's victory points. In this unique system, the different political power cards (Military, Commerce, World Opinion, etc) have different values depending on the territory being contested.

The first player to win over half of the territorial points is the victor.

114519.name: Fruit Ninja: Slice of Life Game
114519.description:
From the Manufacturer
Fruit Ninja: Slice of Life Game - Based on the top-selling Apple iOS and Android app, the Fruit Ninja Slide of Life action game turns the fun of the digital app into fast and frenetic physical play. Both kids and adults alike love the app's addictive action of chopping and slicing flying fruit while avoiding the bombs, and now they can do it for real on either the table top or the floor. With two toy ninja swords, 20 physical fruit and bomb pieces, and 40 Fruit Ninja mission cards, this exciting skill and action game allows players to race to physically slash and splatter fruit pieces like true ninja warriors. Fruit Ninja Slice of Life is a two-player game in which the object of the game is to be the first player to complete each fruit mission card and earn the accompanying points. The player with the most points wins and is dubbed the ultimate Fruit Ninja.

114520.name: Deutschland  Reise für Kinder
114520.description:
Objective: be the first entering the choosen theme park -
learn more about Germany (read documentation on rear side of the cards)

- acting/moving by turn -
1. draw a card out of theme park pile (destination for all players)
2. draw a card out of city card pile (starting point for all players)
3. each player draws 5 city cards (unique route)
4. plan your route
5. throw the die and move - follow your route and discard your five city cards travelling through

114521.description:
Hel is Jerome's sister and last member of the Three People in the Abyss. As only a young child, Hel displayed an unnatural faculty to kill people with a mere brush of her skin, a power which cast her from her clan. After the encounter of the siblings with Dead Moon Hel and Jerome were fascinated by Pirate Queen's lifestyle, Hel was able to polish her skills, transforming her into one of the most feared assassins of the seas.

Dark Azur Alliance Warrior/Prowler - Lv. 40
At 5 | Dm 3 | Df 9 | Ar 0 | LP 12 | Re 10 | Mo 8/12 | AP 3/4
Jigoku no Musume: If any unit (friendly or enemy) dies inside Hel's Control Zone, Hel recovers an action point. If Hel's Action Bar is already full, she recovers 3 Life Points instead.
ooo - Gates of Hell (Ki, Attack)
+2 Attack. If Gates of Hell causes damage, target unit must pass a Resistance Control or target unit is removed from the game. Effect 14. Put a lvl 1 Doom counter on Hel after using Gates of Hell.
ooo - Hell Calling (Ki, Attack)
+4 Attack
A part of Team Lords of the Abyss along with Jerome and Deadmoon.
114521.name: Anima Tactics: Hel

114522.description:
There is no power in the Azur Alliance greater than that of High Arbiter Aizen, the Arbiter of Shadows. To most who meet him in battle, he is death incarnate. This ancient creature absorbs the power of all those he has defeated, becoming a vessel full of souls lost in the dark.
Dark Azur Alliance Leader Warrior/Prowler - Lv. 90
At 6 | Dm 4 | Df 10 | Ar 3 | LP 16 | Re 10 | Mo 12/16 | AP 3/5
Master of the Shadows: Aizen is always treated as though he is in Cover when a Seek roll is made.
Master Murderer: If Aizen kills a character with an attack while hidden, he remains hidden instead of being revealed by that attack.
Stealing Shadows: During the Upkeep Phase, Aizen can replace his Special Abilities with the Special Abilities of any Character that that he has previously destroyed. At the beginning of subsequent Upkeep Phases, Aizen can continue to have the Special Abilities of the dead character, or can revert to his own Special Abilities.
OO Stealth (Subterfuge, Effect)
Aizen becomes Hidden. Upkeep: O
OO Murderer of Gods (Subterfuge, Attack)
+5 Attack / +5 Damage. This Attack can only be used if Aizen is Hidden.
OOO Shadow Attack (Subterfuge, Attack, Movement)
Put Aizen in contact with an enemy unit, then Aizen attacks them.
This Attack can only be used if Aizen is Hidden.
OOO The Faceless God (Ki, Attack)
+6 Attack.

+++ ARBITER AIZEN Arbiter Orders


Orders per Turn: 3
Influence Zone: 12 inches
Limitations: Aizen’s Arbiter Orders don’t affect Characters of equal or greater level, other Arbiters, or Summoned Characters.
oo - Opugnis (Special, Attack)
A friendly unit within Aizen’s Influence Zone makes a free hand-to-hand Attack.
oo - Obsidia (Special, Effect)
A friendly unit, that isn’t within an enemy unit’s Control Zone, within Aizen’s Influence Zone becomes Hidden until the end of the turn.
oo - Mortis (Special, Effect, Reactive)
Immediately after a friendly unit within Aizen’s Influence Zone destroys an enemy unit, they recover 1 Action Point.
114522.name: Anima Tactics: High Arbiter Aizen

114523.description:
High Arbiter Alastor is the Arbiter of Demons, the Dark Master of the War. There are many names for someone who has forgotten his own. As a high power under the direct command of the High Archon, Alastor has been unleashed upon the world to destroy the pillars than sustain it.

Dark Azur Alliance Leader Warrior - Lv. 80
At 6 | Dm 6 | Df 9 | Ar 4 | LP 18 | Re 11 | Mo 6/10 | AP 3/5
Innate Abilities: Critical Mastery
ooo - Ignis (Ki, Attack)
+2 Attack / +2 Damage.
ooo - Pandemonium (Ki, Attack)
+6 Damage.

ARBITER ALASTOR Arbiter Orders
Orders per Turn: 3
Influence Zone: 12 inches.
Limitation: Alastor’s Arbiter Orders do not affect Characters of equal or greater level, other Arbiters, or Summoned creatures.
o - Motum (Special, Effect)
Move one friendly unit within Alastor's Influence Zone 2 inches. This does not count as a Movement. Motum may not be used more than once on the same Character in a Turn.
oo - Terminus (Special, Attack)
A friendly Unit within Alastor's Influence Zone makes a free hand-to-hand Attack with +3 Attack / +3 Damage. The character who makes this attack is removed from play after it is resolved.
oo - Opugnis (Special Attack)
A friendly Unit within Alastor's Influence Zone makes a free hand-to-hand Attack.
114523.name: Anima Tactics: High Arbiter Alastor

114524.name: BIG-Bobby Car und seine Freunde
114524.description:
Objective: bet on the car which is going to be the first to pass finish line
- moving by turn -
very simple 'Roll & Move' game
choose a die to roll with - depending on age - colours/numbers
bet on one of three cars
move - by choice - one of the 3 bobby cars according your roll

114525.name: Medieval Moves: Deadmund's Quest
114525.description:
From the case:
Medieval Moves seamlessly combines swordfighting, archery, and throwing stars for an ACTION -PACKED ADVENTURE made for the PlayStation Move!

Swing you sword to attack an enemy, reach for an arrow to fire an accurate shot or toss a barrage of throwing stars with true motion that is only available on PlayStation Move.

Play with family & friends online or side-by-side in competitive and co-op challenges.

114526.name: Carnival Island
114526.description:
User summary:
A Carnival-based family friendly environment with sub games. Move controller(s) required. Great for parties and casual gaming.

114528.description: This uses the same Rules, playing pieces and colour cards as Ticket To Ride Europe (TTRE), but is played on a new map of Britain and Ireland. It has two new features - Junctions, and Branch Lines - which enable players to 'change trains' en route. The goal is to gain the most points by a combination of completed journeys, completed Routes (as determined by chosen or assigned Route Cards), bonus points and penalties, as in the original TTRE.
114528.name: Britain & Ireland (fan expansion to Ticket To Ride: Europe)

114529.description:
Who will best overcome the traffic and get to the end of the road?
Vroom! The winner is the first player to get two motorbikes to the end of a high-density roadway. The result is unpredictable since other players can block your way or bump you onto another lane at any throw of dice! This game is not for the faint-hearted...Do you have the makings of a champion?
114529.name: Vroom!

114530.description:
Volume VIII introduces several new features to the core series rules in order to portray the unique aspects of Indian combat in the 18th century.

Newtown includes a three-tiered movement system that simulates the individual nature of Indian warfare. Small war parties often acted according to their own will rather then following orders from “commanding officers.”

The game includes two decks of opportunity cards. Each player starts the game with one card and, while the Indian player can “earn” one more by actions taken in the game, the American player may use momentum to “purchase” additional cards throughout the game.

Pre-game Indian Enhancement and limited American intelligence help provide play balance to an outnumbered Indian army. Optional Indian reinforcements are also available.

Newtown also includes rules for Indian honor, resolve under artillery fire, ferocity and evasion.

In Oriskany, the Indian player’s secret pre-game selection of the ambush hex and the American player’s turn-by-turn choice for Herkimer’s rate of march will have profound effect on the course of play. Proximity to Ft. Stanwix is not the only thing that must be taken into account. If the column is ambushed while moving at an accelerated rate the ambushing Indians receive advantages. On the other hand, if Herkimer approaches cautiously he can better defend against an ambush but risks losing army morale for progressing too slowly with the rescue effort.

Herkimer’s Tryon County Militia is made up of special 2-step, 1-strength point units permitting each unit to take a step loss and continue to fight. This expedient is used to reflect the intensity of the fighting that occurred between the two forces. Militia at Oriskany fought like veteran line units, giving and asking no quarter, for nearly six straight hours.

Oriskany also includes pre and post-ambush Sequences of Play and rules for laagering and limbering the American supply wagons, looting, detaching American garrison artillery and the possibility of storms.

2 errata counters are included in C3i #27 (2013)
114530.name: Newtown

114531.description:
Children version of game Think: Memo Crime.
The players have to remember small details as a detectives and collect as many winning chips as possible if they story is correct.

Players roll the dice, move accordingly and draw two word cards from one of the stacks showed on the square they landed and tell a story must be both chronologically and substantively correct and if the words happen every time the word cards correctly.

Four stacks of incredible stories lie in the mysterious attic. Who remembers them best and be the most creative to retold these stories, wins the game.

Contents:

1 game board,
112 word cards,
1 dice,
40 chips profit,
one character
114531.name: Think: Kids – Memo-Krimi

114532.description:
The newest 2 Player PnP Dexterity, Strategy and Press your Luck Game

Goal of the Game: To score 10 cows points by tipping them over and avoiding tipping over bulls.

Players will draw tiles from the tile pool and strategically place them in their pasture or their opponents pasture. If you draw the tipper tile you get to try and knock over your opponents tiles to see how many cow points you get. Be careful, if you knock over a bull you will lose cow points!
114532.name: Cow Tipper

114533.description:
This expansion does exactly what it's title would imply and no more: it supplies the components necessary to make a Hamsterdam base set (which can only accommodate a max of 4 players) playable with 5 or 6 players. It does not include any new types of cards or components, new rules, or anything else that changes the game-play.

Hamsterdam is a primarily card-based game, where each player gets a set of 11 numbered "dam" cards, a set of 20 identical regular "hamster" cards and 2 "special" hamster cards drawn from a deck of 16 (which includes 2 each of 8 special types of hamsters).

The Hamsterdam 5-6 Player Expansion includes 2 additional sets of dam cards, 2 additional 20-card regular-hamster decks, and an 8-card specialty hamster deck including 1 of each type.

The expansion does not include other components needed to play the game (flood tokens, dice), thus it cannot be used as a stand-alone game.


Game-play of Hamsterdam when incorporating this expansion proceeds exactly as the base game does: Players create a "dam" made up of a line of cards numbered 2 through 12 and distribute their hamster cards (20 regular + 2 special) on top of the numbered cards. Players take turns rolling 2 d6 to see which spot in the dam is weakened. If a hamster is on top of that number, that hamster is used to plug to the hole and is placed to the side in a reserve pile to come back into play in the next round. If a hamster is not on that number, a flood token is placed there until the end of the round, at which time it can be removed by taking a hamster card permanently out of play. If a flood token is already located on a number that is rolled, another flood token is placed in a special pile of tokens belonging to that player which cannot be removed. As flood tokens pile up, your stock of hamster saviors dwindles, and flood tokens pile up all the faster. The game ends when any player accumulates 10 flood tokens (counting both those in the permanent pile and those currently on the dam). The winner is the player with the fewest flood tokens. In the case of a tie, the player with the most remaining hamster cards wins.
114533.name: Hamsterdam 5-6 Player Expansion

114534.name: Diamond Fever
114534.description:
Make vertical, horizontal and diagonal combinations. You can steer the diamonds as they descend using the arrow keys.

Source: The Game Website.

114535.name: Alchemy
114535.description:
Transmute the board from lead to gold by placing runes on every square. Every rune must be placed next to another that's on the board and has the same color or shape, or both.

Source: The Publisher Website.

114536.name: Heist
114536.description:
Grab as much loot as you can before the police arrive in Heist, a free online game featuring mahjong-style fun!

Source: The Game Website.

114538.name: Hi-Life!
114538.description:
The box advises "More Than a Game - An Excuse For a Party!
Gamble! Race! What a Pace! - Live Life to the Full With Father's Millions!"

This game is ideally played by equal numbers of opposite sexes. The game is played on the assumption that each player is the son or daughter of a very wealthy father. He sends them into the game of life with a gift of £10,000 and an allowance of £250 each time a circuit of the board is completed.
The winner is the player or marriage partnership that survives when other players have lost all their assets.

An abbreviated version of the game may be played where the first player or marriage partnership to reach £50,000 in cash and possessions is the winner, or the wealthiest player after an agreed time limit. The rules are the same for all versions.
How many games feature Boyfriends, Girlfriends, Marriage, Ascot, Casinoes, Auctions, Robberies and more?

Contents
1 Game Board.
Various Amounts of Money in Five Denominations.
33 Hi Life Cards(17 Blue/16 Pink).
12 Each of Boyfriend and Girlfriend Cards.
8 Married Cards.
16 Stock Cards.
24 Gift Cards(3 of 8 Different Types).
6 of Each - Car,Yacht and Cabin Cruiser Cards.
16 Investment Property Cards(4 of 4 Different Types).
8 Playing Pieces.
2 Dice.
1 Horse Marker.
1 Button Marker.
1 Set of Rules.

114539.name: Lancea Longini
114539.description:
From the back of the book:

Det är nådens år 1700. Det spanska imperiet håller på att falla sönder efter Carlos II:s död och ett världsomfattande krig står för dörren. Europas furstar är som gamar runt en döende buffel, redo att roffa åt sig vad de kan. Härar samlas och Europas spioner har mer än någonsin att göra.

Paris invånare märker dock inte mycket av detta. I denna kontrasternas stad blir rollpersonerna inhyrda för ett till synes oskyldigt uppdrag. De kastas snart handlöst in i en urgammal konflikt – en konflikt som kan få än mer förödande konsekvenser för Frankrike och Europa än till och med det stundande kriget.

Rough translation:

It is the year of our Lord 1700. The Spanish empire is falling apart after the death of Carlos II, and a war of global proportion is on the verge of breaking out. The lords of Europe are like vultures around a dying buffalo, ready to grab what they can. Armies are gathering and spies have more work to carry out than ever before.

The people of Paris doesn't see much of this. In this city of contrasts the characters are hired for a routine job. This soon draw them in to an age old conflict - a conflict with even more dire consequences for France and Europe than even the coming war.

114540.name: Jackpot
114540.description:
Jackpot is a family game in which players select a horse, or horses, and race them at selected odds, 2 circuits of the track, plus any handicap entailed by the odds chosen.
Each player bets on horses using the chips provided. The player with the most chips after the Jackpot race has been run is deemed to be the winner.
Game contents
1 x playing board
6 x plastic horses and riders in six different colours
120 x small plastic chips
6 x large plastic chips
1 x dice
1 x rules leaflet

114541.name: Barnarov
114541.description:
From the back of the book:

Långt upp i norr, långt bort från Versailles praktfulla palats och intrigerande ädlingar, ligger Ytterby – en by som under många sekel har haft fred. Det är en by som alltid har lyckats undgå krig, svält och olycka, fram tills nu ...

Det är nådens år 1676, och snapphanarna plågar Ytterbys befolkning. Samtidigt drabbas traktens barnfamiljer av en tragedi: någon stjäl deras barn. Är det snapphanarna som ligger bakom även detta? Kanske är det trollen, såsom det viskas om bland de vidskepliga invånarna? Eller är det helt enkelt en del av kronans planer för att smutskasta dansken?

Rough translation:

Far up in the north, far from the mighty halls and palaces of Versailles and the scheming nobles, lies Ytterby - a village in which it has been peace for centuries. It is a village spared from war, draught and mishaps, until now ...

It is the year of our Lord 1676, and the Snapphanes are a scourge for the people of Ytterby. Meanwhile the families with children have suffered a tragedy: someone is stealing the children. Are the Snapphanes behind this as well? Maybe it is the trolls, as the superstitious villagers are whispering among themselves? Or is it just part of the Swedish crown's plans for giving the Danish a bad name?

114542.name: Jim'll Fix It
114542.description:
Game based on a popular television show where Jimmy Saville (an eccentric disc jockey) fulfils viewer's ambitions. If you were lucky and picked for the show, you not only fulfilled your ambition, you were also awarded a Jim Fixed It For Me badge. This became a much sought after item.

The players are children, wanting to have an ambition accepted. A 'Jim' playing piece starts life on the board and is moved by a Jim spinner. The player moves by a normal die. The objective is to land exactly on the same square as Jim. If you do, you draw four cards. The cards say things like "I would like", "I wish" etc., and also the subject of a dream wish, something like water-skiing or flying. If you can make a legitimate statement out of the four cards, you win. But this is unlikely on the first attempt and you will need to meet Jim again. If you do, you add two cards to your original four and again try to form a legitimate statement. If you can't, you discard two cards and you will have to meet Jim again.

The first player to fulfil a request with their cards, wins.

rpgitemversion.140449: adame de Brasillachs hemlighet (Standard colour print)

114543.name: Madame de Brasillachs hemlighet
114543.description:
From the back of the book:

Intrigerna bland Paris ädlingar är på blodigt allvar. Hat och rivalitet leder ofta till armod, vanheder eller död. Frågan är hur man överlever och tar hämnd efter att ha förlorat allt?

Madame de Brasillachs hemlighet är en spännande detektivhistoria som utspelar sig i Paris runt år 1700. Äventyret är perfekt för nybörjare och oerfarna rollpersoner, men kan även ge de som är erfarna något att bita i.

Rough translation:

The political game played by the nobles of Paris is deadly. Hate and rivalry often leads to poverty, dishonour or death. The question is, how do you survive and get your revenge after losing everything?

Madame de Brasillach's secret is a thrilling detective story taking place in Paris around the year 1700. The adventure is perfect for beginners and characters with limited experience, but may also give the experienced something to chew on.

114544.name: Rubovia Around the Castle Game
114544.description:
Rubovia was a children's television series and this game relates to the characters in the show.

RULES:
1. Each player chooses a coloured pawn.
2. To decide who goes first each player turns the spinner. The highest scorer goes first, next one on the left and so on in a clockwise direction.
3. Each taking his turn, the players move along the track from the START by the number of spaces shown by the spinner.
4. When a player stops on a YELLOW or ORANGE square, he must obey the instructions in the panel beside the square.
5. If a player spins a number which takes him to a square already occupied by another player, that player must leave the square and go back three spaces.
6. The player to reach the FINISH first is the winner. He must spin the exact number needed to arrive and must keep spinning in his turn, until he does.

Information supplied by Telegoons

114545.name: En Garde! III spelledarskärm
114545.description:
From publisher's homepage:

En liten skärm i hårdpapp, med en stämningsfylld sjöslagsbild på framsidan. På baksidan finns de tabeller som behövs i spel. Skärmen är till för att underlätta för spelledaren. Här kan hon dölja anteckningar och tärningsslag, samt ha snabb tillgång till de tabeller och den information som ofta behövs under spel. Det enda spelarna ser är skärmens framsida. Skärmen är dessutom så pass låg och liten att den inte är ivägen eller skymmer spelarna för spelledaren.

Rough translation:

A small cardboard screen, with a painting of a naval battle at the front. The backside contains the tables needed for play. The screen is made to make the game master's work easier. She can hide notes and dice rolls, as well as giving her easy access to tables and informationen when needed. The players will only see the front part. The screen is also small and low enough to let the game master see the players with ease.

114546.name: Autofahrt für alle
114546.description:
Objective: be the first to pass finish line
- simple 'Roll & Move' game/moving by turn -
each player rolls the die an moves forward according number
landing on a marked area follow instructions cover inside

114547.name: Ys Seven
114547.description:
The kingdom of Altago is rebuilding around a newfound peace after years of war against the merciless armies of Romn. Battle-hardened adventurer, Adol (and his trusty wall-crushing companion, Dogi) arrive in the harbor of Altago City and quickly find themselves in a scuffle with the kingdom's military police body, the Dragon Knights. The result is jail time on a false espionage charge, which captures the attention of Altago's regent. One thing leads to another, and a chain of events is set in motion that ultimately guides Adol and Dogi on a quest across the land to learn more about its estranged local gods: the Five Great Dragons.

Join Adol, Dogi and their many new companions as they explore this borderline new country and undertake a journey to save it all from monsters, bandits, political saboteurs and - of course - long-forgotten ancient forces.

Welcome to Altago. Get ready for a wild ride.

Source: The Publisher Website.

114549.name: Impede
114549.description:
IMPEDE is a abstract strategy game in the spirit of Go or Checkers.

Goal: Position 4 of your pieces in a straight, connected row before your opponent.

Gameplay: Players take turns moving one of their pieces to an adjacent, unoccupied space in an attempt to get 4 pieces in a row before their opponent. Play is a balance of offense and defense, positioning pieces for later traps, blocks, and offensive pushes.

114550.name: Villains & Vigilantes Rulebook (2nd Edition)

rpgissuearticle.88869: Falling Damage in Villains and Vigilantes

114550.description:
From the front cover:
"Superhero Role-Playing Revised Rules by Jeff Dee and Jack Herman"

Select info from the back cover:
"You can combat the forces of evil!
...find their hidden enclaves with your super-senses...
...and bust your way in with powerful fists!!
Use your incredible agility or invulnerability to ward off their attacks as you blast away with energy bolts, or confront them with your martial arts or weapon skills!
Drag them squirming and cursing to prison, to be brought to justice!
Become a champion of truth and an idol of millions!"

114551.name: Ys: The Oath in Felghana
114551.description:
From the publisher's website:

When the adventuresome duo of Adol and Dogi make an unannounced visit to Dogi’s homeland of Felghana, it quickly becomes apparent that things have changed dramatically since Dogi departed on a journey of self-discovery eight years earlier. Hordes of violent monsters roam the outskirts of town, there's an unsettling rumor of a long-dormant volcano suddenly becoming active again, and the lord of the land has become more and more tyrannical with every passing day, most recently depriving the land's citizens of their right to mine for the precious ore known as "raval" - a staple of the economy for generations.

As Adol and Dogi begin their search for the source of Felghana’s recent tribulations, they find each clue leads them more and more towards the disturbing conclusion that these events are all somehow linked. The closer they get to the truth, the higher the stakes, as the consequences of their actions affect not just Felghana, but possibly the entire world.

114552.name: Books 1-3: The Basic Books
114552.description:
from the title page

This book is a compilation of the three basic game rules books for Traveller, the science-fiction role-playing game set in the far future.

The materials in this book were originally published by Game Designers' Workshop. Far Future Enterprises is the successor copyright holder for the materials in this book.

In addition to the rule books, this collection also includes "The Olympia Incident," an original short story set in the Traveller universe written by Martin J. Dougherty, Jr.

user somment
Unlike the other books in the series, this volume was a joint publication between Far Future Enterprises and QuikLink Interactive Inc.. It specifically states this on the title page.

114553.name: Squiddler
114553.description: Players draw two cards and discard one with the goal of forming one word of at least 7 letters and all other cards in hand (if any) forming a word or words of at least 3 letters each. Using the colorful alphabetical card deck published to play Quiddler ("The Short Word Game"), Squiddler is for players who enjoy a challenge with longer words. The name of the game is a portmanteau word combining "Seven" and "Quiddler."

114554.name: Spangle
114554.description:
Spangle is a deduction game for 4-10 players that can be played with a Shibumi set. It uses a 4×4 set of stacking spheres in 3 colors.

The players are members of a family who are decorating their new house. The winner is the player or players who have succeeded in decorating most of the house with the color of their choice.

Aim: At the end of the game, when the thirtieth ball is placed on top of the pyramid, count the balls left in the sack. The color that has the fewest balls left in the sack is the winning color and any player that chose this color at the beginning of the game wins. In case of a tie between colors, count the number of players that have chosen each color. The winning group is the one that has the fewest members. In case of another tie, both group win.

Setup: Place all 48 balls (16 of each color) in the bag. Each player looks in the bag and chooses one ball of any color he likes, which he keeps hidden at all times. This is the color of his preference and his aim is to use that color as much as possible in the house.
Find the veto number which will be used throughout the game by dividing the number of players by two, rounded up.
The youngest player plays first.

Play: When a player's turn comes, he points at a legal position to play a ball and proposes a color to place. He is allowed to describe why he thinks this is a good choice. Other players are free to discuss and question the suggestion.
After 1-2 minutes pass, the active player calls for a veto vote. Every player who doesn’t want this placement must raise their hand. If there are enough raised hands to reach the veto number then the placement is cancelled, otherwise the active player searches the bag for the appropriate color and places it in the suggested area. Either way play continues to the left.

Legal Plays: If there is no other ball of the same color in the desired level, then you can place the ball anywhere on the level. If there is at least one, then you must necessarily place the ball adjacent to an existing ball, whether horizontally or vertically. If the balls of the desired color are completely cut-off by balls of the other colors, you are free to enter the level again at another point.
To place a ball on the upper levels, you need to place them on top of at least 2 more balls of the chosen color, whether horizontally, vertically or diagonally. Rules for the same level placement are still applicable
In this game dropping is not allowed. You are only allowed to place

Veto: After a failed suggestion due to vetos, the next vote’s veto number is increased by one. That way, it gets harder and harder to stop placing balls. If at least one ball is placed the veto number resets to the starting value

Etiquette: When searching the bag for a ball of the color of your choice, you shouldn’t count the remaining balls, just grab the first ball you spot. Scrambling around the bag is forbidden.
It is perfectly legal to hold grudges, intentionally veto the player to your right so you can place a ball with a higher veto number, bluff to mislead other players from guessing your chosen color and use imaginary reasons for why each color looks better at the house.
When the game is over, what’s done is done and any grudges should be unmade, just as the pyramid is taken apart.
You can imagine different applications to each level: level 1 could be the carpets, level 2 the walls, level 3 the furniture and level 4 the lighting

114555.name: Devil May Cry HD Collection
114555.description:
Devil May Cry HD Collection brings the first three original Devil May Cry® titles; Devil May Cry®, Devil May Cry® 2, and Devil May Cry® 3: Dante's Awakening Special Edition together in one high definition package for the first time.

Source: Capcom Press Release

114557.description:
This fan expansion contains 21 Occupations, 23 Minor Improvements, 23 Disaster cards, 18 start cards, 10 new types of tiles, and 1 Fog Marker for Agricola.

This expansion introduces several new concepts. This expansion is kinda like two different expansions rolled into one. This expansion is designed to be played with Farmers of the Moor. If you are not playing with Farmers of the Moor, then do not include anything involving gravel tiles.

Gravel: Spaces with a gravel tile are considered used and you may not build other things in those spaces. However, you lose 1 point at the end of the game for every space with a gravel tile in your farm.

Water: You gain 1 additional food when you use the Fishing Action Space for each water tile on your farmyard.

Other New Tiles: Some of the new minor improvements have you add new tiles to your farmyard.

Disasters: Players may play a Disaster card whenever they could normally play a Minor Improvement instead of playing said Minor Improvement. Disasters cause all sorts of mayhem when they are played and a played Disaster is worth 1 point at the end of the game. Unplayed Disasters are worth -1 points at the end of the game.

New Start Cards: This expansion introduces 16 new start cards. You might now start with a clay hut, or a field, or a water tile, or some gravel.
114557.name: Improved Farming & Disasters (fan expansion for Agricola)

114558.name: Jak and Daxter Collection
114558.description:
We’ve been getting many, many requests asking about Jak and Daxter coming to PS3, and I’m happy to announce that the series will make its PS3 debut this February with the launch of the Jak and Daxter Collection.

The Jak and Daxter Collection features three of our favorite Jak and Daxter titles – Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy, Jak II, and Jak 3 – all remastered by Mass Media, working closely with our team at Naughty Dog. With the launch of Jak and Daxter Collection, you’ll be able to experience the adventures of Jak and his Daxter in 720p high definition with crisper visuals, smoother gameplay animation, and in full stereoscopic 3D. And, I’m sure all of you hardcore collectors will be happy to hear that each game in the trilogy features full PS3 trophy support.

Naughty Dog via Official US Playstation Blog

114559.name: Cypher
114559.description: An abstract game for two to four players. The game board has an inner area of 6x6 spaces with numbers 0,1,2,4,8,16 printed on them, and an outer ring with numbers from 1-31. Players take turns to place, move, or remove one of their 6 tokens on the board; only one token of a colour can be placed on the outer ring. None of the tokens placed may be on the same horizontal or vertical line as another of the same colour. The winner is the first player to place their six tokens on the board so that the sum of the five tokens on the inner board equals the number that the sixth token is placed on on the outer board.

114560.name: HyperSwipe
114560.description: From Publisher's website: HyperSwipe will put your reflexes to the test as you race against your opponents to collect the most image matches. Image cards pop out of the HyperSwiper as fast as you can grab them, so you’ll have to think or match fast and move at hyper-speed!

114561.name: See New York 'Round the Town Game
114561.description: Published by Transogram in 1964. This game is a roll (actually a Spin the Spinner) and move game where players take tours of Times Square, Central Park, The Lincoln Center, Chinatown, Rockerfeller Center, Greenwich Village and the 1964 Worlds Fair trying to make the most money.

114562.name: Hokito
114562.description: This page does not exist. You can edit this page to create it.

114563.name: The Adventures of Davy Crockett
114563.description:
The objective is to get your Davy Crockett playing piece to the Alamo.

Movement is by rolling a number on the spinner.
If you land on a white spot - Obey the printed instructions
If you land on a Green spot - Take another turn
If you land on a Red spot - If the spinner is pointing at that spot, lose your next turn
If you land on a Blue spot - Breathe a sigh of relief, you are safe

114564.name: Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance

videogamehonor.31932: 2012 Game Critics Best Action Game of the Year Nominee

114564.description:
METAL GEAR SOLID: RISING’s E3 2010 trailer won numerous “Best Trailer” awards and drew praise worldwide. At the 2011 VGAs, the game re-emerged as METAL GEAR RISING: REVENGEANCE with an all-new trailer.

METAL GEAR RISING: REVENGEANCE is being developed through a partnership with Platinum Games, known for hit titles like Bayonetta and Vanquish, and this new development structure promises to set all-new standards for the action genre.
The main character, Raiden, was once feared as the child soldier "Jack the Ripper" on the front lines of the First Liberian Civil War. Now, his combat mastery is channeled through a cyborg body as the strikes from his high-frequency blade slice even massive assault drones in two.

Raiden is contracted for VIP protection, military training and other duties by PMSCs (Private Military and Security Companies) in a developing country piecing itself back together after a bloody civil war. Little does he know that the stage is set for a clash with an enigmatic force of countless cyborgs.

Reborn at the hands of Platinum Games, METAL GEAR RISING: REVENGEANCE pits cyborg against cyborg in battle that blazes past every human limit!

Source: Konami.

114565.name: Striker League Champions
114565.description:
A spin-off board game from the company's table football game of Striker and Super Striker.

On the face of it, a roll and move game. Each player starts with a million pounds and two random player cards. The players are rated from 1 to 4 and the total of your ratings will decide how many shots you can take when you play a match.

When you have to play a match, you must use the plastic base in the middle of the board. Depending on their level of players, both sides will get a set number of attempts to score goals. A Striker footballer is used to take the kick whilst your opponent operates the goalkeeper. In effect, it is a penalty shoot-out. Then the opposition gets a kick whilst you operate the goalie. The winning side score points in the league. When a pre-set number of matches have been played, the player at the top of the league, wins.

114566.name: Caption It!
114566.description:
Party game where guests can use their wits (if they have any!!).

There are 12 different cartoons and the object of the game is to compose a humourous or witty caption for each picture.

The host can decide the funniest for each of the 12 cartoons and the player (or team) who get the most 'accepts', wins.

114567.name: Red, White and Blue
114567.description:
Contents
A wooden board with 12 indentations and coloured red, white or blue (four of each colour)
1 spinning top
12 balls

Each indentation has a point value ranging from 1 to 12. To start a turn, place the balls into the tray. In a player's turn, he selects one of the three colours and then spins the top. The top will make the balls scatter and some will find the indentations. The player scores the point value for each ball that has settled in the chosen colour's indentations.

The first player to reach 100 points or more, wins.

114568.name: Holly Dolly Dixi
114568.description:
This game uses the power of static electricity to ‘activate’ and move a small dart around a playing area under a plastic dome. The dart's position on the board at any one time allows players to claim cards to add to their scoring trays. The winner is the first player to get all 12 of their cards not only on the scoring tray, but in their correct positions on the tray.

Game contents
1 x ‘Holly Dolly’, a game board unit comprising a transparent plastic dome mounted over the playing area and containing a dart.
4 x sets of 12 numbered cards in four different colours
4 x ‘Dixi’ cards in four different colours
4 x plastic scoring trays
1 x game storage tray
1 x rules leaflet

This is a most unusual game. The rules suggest that players experiment with rubbing the top of the dome to see which method of activating the dart is best for them.
Apparently, the movement of the dart can be different for different people due to the varying static charge everyone carries with them.
This charge varies, mainly because of skin moisture or the type of clothing worn; wool, cotton, nylon etc, which can produce static electricity of different intensities.

114569.name: Alien Shooter 2: Vengeance
114569.description:
Alien Shooter 2 (Alien Shooter - Vengeance) is a large-scale sequel to the first part of Alien Shooter. This is the unique alloy of arcade action and RPG elements which combines well-established world of classical games and unmatched dynamics of the first part.

The player will find well-built plot line with several ways to pass, many additional quests, ability to choose and upgrade the character.
The most impressive technical innovations are:
- dynamic shadows and lighting;
- about 10 000 monsters on each map, showing up to 100 monsters simultaneously on one playing screen;
- natural phenomena (fog, rain, water);
- NPC characters;
You will also find:
- more than 50 types of weapons - now you can not just kill but also burn, freeze and even diminish the enemies;
- more than 20 types of useful gadgets - from flash lights, radars and medkits to battle drones;
- 3 game modes: Campaign, Survive and Network game;
And, to crown it all, dynamic music and sound effects.

Source: Sigma Team Website.

114570.name: Alien Shooter 2: Conscription
114570.description:
Alien Shooter Conscription is the continuation of cult Alien Shooter 2, which is a unique blend of two game genres- Action and RPG.

The Great War has begun! The world population capable of functioning is mobilized to serve in army. Hordes of monsters are destroying the cities and capturing new territories. The situation on the battlefront reached the critical emergency point and there's nobody to wait for help. Try to fight with the aliens as private soldier from regular army, who occurred to be in the very center of grand events. The outcome probably depends on you!

Game features:

- Huge crowds of enemies, more than 100 aliens on one map at a time.
- Ability to upgrade the main character's parameters.
- More than 60 weapon types, including sniper rifles.
- Lots of auxiliary devices, including radar and battle drones.
- Several types of vehicles to drive.
- Three game types: Campaign, Survive, Gun Stand.

Source: Sigma Team The Publisher Website.

114571.name: Alarums & Excursions (Issue 82 - Jun 1982)
114571.description:
Alarums & Excursions
Issue #82
June 1982

Cover art by Artemis Gail.

114572.name: Die Rache des Frosthexers
114572.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Im ersten Teil Schatten der Vergangenheit - von Autor Heinrich Glumpler - suchen die Abenteurer für den Baron von Deorstead ein magisches Zweihandschwert in einem verschütteten Gebirgskloster. Mit der Waffe besiegen sie einen Frostriesen, der das Land des Barons verwüstet. Doch später wird die Stadt erneut von Eismagie heimgesucht, geschickt vom Frosthexer. Um dessen Aufenthaltsort zu finden und ihn an seiner Rache zu hindern, begeben die Abenteurer sich nach Llansilin, nördlich von Deorstead. Das twyneddische Dorf - von Autor Richard Edwards - wird ausführlich beschrieben; Hinweise, die den Abenteurern den Weg zum Frosthexer weisen, sind eingearbeitet.


Translation:

In the first part Shadow of the past - by author Heinrich Glumpler - the adventurers are looking for a magical two-hand sword buried in a mountain monastery for the Baron of Deorstead . With the weapon they defeat a frost giant who ravaged the land of the Baron. But later the city is once again beset by ice magic, sent from the Frost Warlock. In order to find his whereabouts and to hinder him in his revenge, the adventurers go to Llansilin, north of Deorstead. The Twyneddian village - from author Richard Edwards - is described in detail, evidence that point the adventurers the way to the Frost Warlock are incorporated.


User Summary:

First part of a campaign about Njord, the Frosthexer (Frost Warlock), a legendary wizard from the icy north of Midgard.

The included description of the village Llansilin is based on the description of Oswestry in Towns of the Outlands.

114573.name: Bad Rats: The Rats' Revenge
114573.description:
When the Rats are in charge, cats are simply lost!

The Rats wants revenge against their historical enemies, the Cats, and with your help, in Bad Rats, this will happen. On this game you'll need to find solutions to the puzzles, and help the Rats to execute their annihilation plans.

Bad Rats is a physics puzzle game. The Objective changes every map, but it's basically to make an object (the key) to hit another (the target), using real physics principles, as the objects weights, building levers, paths and others.

The levels' themes are fully varied, but completing a map will always result on a different annihilation of a cat, with some cartoon violence, cartoon blood and some cartoon body pieces flying around.

There are countless solutions for each map. And you, Which solution can you invent?

Source:The Publisher Website.

114574.name: Im Reich des Frosthexers
114574.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Die Abenteurer haben erfahren, dass der Frosthexer im hohen Norden Waelands haust und segeln dorthin. Sie müssen sich den Weg zu ihm bahnen, vorbei an Wachen und Fallen, um zum Schluss zwischen dem Frosthexer und dem Baron von Deorstead zu vermitteln.


Translation:

The adventurers have learned that the Frost Warlock dwells in the far north of Waeland and sail there. They need to pave the way to him, past guards and traps, to mediate between the Frost Warlock and the Baron of Deorstead in the end.

114575.name: Hexenblut
114575.description:
User Summary:

This adventure book from the Spielwelt magazine contains three adventures:


Hexenblut (Witchblood)
Tumunzahar, die Zwergenbinge (Tumunzahar, the dwarven hold)
Der Pfeifer von Dawngate (The Piper of Dawngate)

114576.name: Des Zaubermeisters Erben
114576.description:
User Summary:

This adventure book for the 3rd Edition of Midgard contains 3 adventures:


Des Zaubermeisters Erben (The magicians heirs)
Vierzig Fässer Pfeifenkraut (fourty kegs of pipe-weed)
Hinter dem Spiegel (Behind the mirror)

114578.name: Chains
114578.description:
Chains is a puzzle game with a unique feel and distinctive vector graphics style. The object of the game is simple - to link adjacent bubbles of the same color into chains. As you progress through the physics-driven stages it becomes increasingly more challenging and your speed, strategy and skill will be put to the test.

Source: The Publisher Website.

114579.name: Spinnenliebe
114579.description:
User Summary:

The third adventure book published under the Spielwelt label contains three adventures:


Die Kehrseite der Medaille (The other side of the coin)
Myrkdag
Spinnenliebe (Spider love)

114580.name: Kurai-Anat: Das Schwarze Herz
114580.description:
From the back of the book:

KanThaiPan, das unbekannte Land im Fernen Osten: Quelle von Luxusgütern, nach denen die Reichen aller Länder gieren, und Quelle von grausigen Geschichten über finstere Zauberer, die im Dienste dunkler Mächte ihr eigenes Volk ausbluten lassen. Ihnen und Ihren Gefährten bietet sich die Möglichkeit, gegen eine Beteiligung am Gewinn einen neuen Handelsweg dorthin zu erkunden, und bei dieser Gelegenheit zu erfahren, was an den Berichten über die seltsamen Sitten der KanThai und ihrer finsteren Herren dran ist.

Schon auf dem langen Weg ins Reich der Schwarzen Adepten lassen rawindische Fürsten und ihre Launen, minangpahitische Praus voller blutrünstiger Piraten und verspielte Seejungfrauen so schnell keine Langeweile aufkommen. Am Ziel angekommen, dürfen Sie im Dienst der örtlichen Fürstenfamilie als Heiratsvermittler ins Landesinnere ziehen. Dafür können Sie mit deren Unterstützung beim Anknüpfen der gewünschten Handelsbeziehungen rechnen - vorausgesetzt, Sie überstehen die mörderischen Anschläge der KuroScha, die Todessehnsucht eines ehrenwerten SaMurais, die Intrigen feindlicher Adelshäuser und die Begegnung mit einem Schwarzen Adepten. Vielleicht landen Sie sogar in YenXuLu, der Höllenpforte, und vielleicht gelingt Ihnen eine glorreiche Flucht, die in die Sagen der KanThai eingehen wird.

Dieses Heft enthält ein umfangreiches Rollenspiel-Abenteuer im Fernen Osten Midgards, das Abenteurer mittleren Grades nach KanThaiPan führt und sie einige Geheimnisse des Reichs der Schwarzen Adepten enthüllen läßt.


Translation:

KanThaiPan, the unknown country in the Far East: source of luxury goods, for which the rich from all countries are hungry, and source of grisly tales of dark wizards that let bleed their own people in the service of darker powers. You and your companion are offered the possibility to explore a new traderoute there for a share of the profits, and take this opportunity to learn what is true in the reports about the strange customs of the Kanthal and their dark masters.

Even in the long journey into the realm of the Black Adepts rawindian princes and their moods, minangpahitian Praus full of bloodthirsty pirates and playful mermaids will make sure you aren't bored. Upon arrival, you must serve the local royal family move inland as a matchmaker. Therefore, you can expect their support in establishing the desired trade relations - assuming you survive the murderous attacks of KuroScha, the longing for death of an honorable SaMurai, the intrigues of hostile noble houses and an encounter with a black adept. You might even land in YenXuLu, the gates of hell, and maybe you manage a glorious flight, which will go down in the legends of Kanthal.

This booklet contains an extensive role-playing adventure in the Far East of Midgard, that leads midlevel adventurers to KanThaiPan and lets you reveal some secrets of the kingdom of the Black Adepts.

114581.name: Sturm über Mokattam
114581.description:
User Summary:

The boxed set Sturm über Mokattam (Storm over Mokattam) contains an adventure campaign of seven adventures for first to fifth level characters in the caliphate of Mokattam south of Eschar.

The box contained tow books:

Sturm über Mokattam: Buch 1: 1.-4. Abenteuer
Sturm über Mokattam: Buch 2: 5.-7. Abenteuer

114582.name: Aventurischer Bote (Issue 1 - 1985)
114582.description:
(User summary)

The very first issue of the Aventurischer Bote, which played an essential role in the development of Das Schwarze Auge and the world of Aventurien.

114584.name: Göttliches Spiel (Midgard 3rd Edition)
114584.description:
From the back of the book:

Aufruhr in Burg Alasdell! In der Nacht nach seiner Thronbesteigung wird dem jungen Syre ein wertvoller Edelstein, ein Familienerbstück, gestohlen. Der Verdacht fällt auf Laird Grimmond, einen der Gäste, aber warum hat er sich zu dieser Tat hinreißen lassen? Hat er etwa die alte Saga von dem waelischen Fürsten Wargar und seinem von Zauberjuwelen gekrönten Helm ernst genommen?

Sofort heften Sie sich an die fersen des Diebes. Doch die Reise führt viel weiter als gedacht: an die Südküste Waelands und dann immer weiter nach Norden bis in das ewige frostige Reich der Thursen. Unterwegs warten viele Gefahren auf Sie, wenn Sie den Umgang mit Trollen und Riesen, mit Moorgeistern und Quellnymphen, mit Vogelmönchen und der von ihnen verehrten Großen Krähe nicht scheuen. Nicht zuletzt wird die raue Herzlichkeit der Waelinger einen bleibenden Eindruck hinterlassen - und den Verdacht, daß die Jagd nach Laird Grimmond und dem gestohlenen Juwel das besondere Augenmerk der waelischen Götter findet.

Durch die sumpfige Landschaft der sommerlichen Tundra und die Ausläufer des Ewigen Eises erreichen Sie schließlich das Land der Schneeelfen und ihrer attraktiven Königin, wo Sie die Antworten auf alle Fragen finden. Eine wilde Jagd an Bord einer Schneeyacht führt Sie schließlich zu einem Grab im Ewigen Eis und der endgültigen Entscheidung, wer das Erbe des Helden Wargar antreten wird - Laird Grimmond oder Sie!
Dieses Heft enthält ein Rollenspiel-Abenteuer im hohen Norden Midgards, das Abenteurer mittleren Grades zu Figuren in einem Spiel der waelischen Götter werden und sie das Geheimnis um den Sagenhelden Wargar enträtseln läßt.


Translation:

Turmoil in Alasdell castle! The night after his accession the young Syre a precious gemstone, a family heirloom is stolen. Suspicion falls on Laird Grimmond, one of the guests, but why has he let himself be drawn to this fact? Has he taken the old saga of the waelian prince Wargar and helmet crowned with magic juwels seriously?

Now you attach yourself to the heesl of the thief. But the journey takes you much further than expected: onto the south coast of Waeland and then further north into the ever frigid realm of the Thursen. Many dangers await you on the road, if you are not afraid of dealing with trolls and giants, bog spirits and spring nymphs, with bird monks and the revered big crow. Not least the rough warmth of the Waelingians will leave a lasting impression - and the suspicion that the hunt for Laird Grimmond and the stolen jewel has gotten the special attention of the waelian gods.

Through the swampy landscape of tundra in summer and the reaches of the eternal ice, you finally reach the land of snow elves and their attractive queen, where you find the answers to all questions. A wild chase on board a snow yacht eventually leads you to a grave in the eternal ice and the final decision on who will take up the legacy of the hero Wargar - Laird Grimmond or you!

This booklet contains a role-playing adventure in the far north of Midgard, that turs midlevel adventurers into figures in a game of the waelian Gods, and lets you unravel the mystery surrounding the legendary hero Wargar.

114588.name: Aventurischer Bote (Issue 6 - 1986)
114588.description:
Issue #6 of the Aventurischer Bote.

3000 copies printed.

114589.name: Weißer Wolf und Seelenfresser
114589.description:
From the back of the book:

Ein Gerücht verbreitet sich wie ein Lauffeuer im Norden Midgards. Karawanenführer erzählen davon an ihren Lagerfeuern in der Steppe, Pelztierjäger tragen es nach Norden ins Läina-Land, und waelische Seeleute geraten ins Träumen, wenn die tobenden Wogen der Wyrdsee innehalten und ihnen eine Verschnaufpause gönnen:

Der Verwunschene Wald von Karmodin trägt seinen Namen wieder zu Recht. Baumnymphen und Lichtalwen, Sonnentänzer und Viljen und andere Naturgeister aus den moravischen Mythen sind zurück, nachdem ein Jahrhunderte alter Bann zerbrochen ist. Uraltes Wissen und märchenhafte Reichtümer warten auf den wagemutigen Abenteurer, der sich in ihr Reich wagt und der sich auch nicht an dem Wolfsgeheul stört, daß manchem Wanderer das Mark in den Knochen gefrieren läßt.

"Findet den wahren Kern des Gerüchts!" - so lautet Ihr Auftrag, der Sie in die moravischen Wäldern führt. Doch bevor Sie den Karmodin in seiner ganzen Feenpracht erleben können, müssen Sie sich erst in den Augen der Naturgeister als würdig erweisen. Aber seien Sie vorsichtig, und lassen Sie sich nicht unnötig in die Streitigkeiten hineinziehen, die die Mächtigen des Verwunschenen Waldes voneinander trennen: das Rabenvolk, den Weißen Wolf und den Seelenfresser.

Dieses Heft enthält ein Rollenspiel-Abenteuer, in dem die Welt der Naturgeister lebendig wird. Abenteurer mittleren Grades können miterleben, wie alte Legenden wahr werden, und ein jahrtausendealtes Zerwürfnis beenden - wenn sie sich für die richtige Partei entscheiden!


Translation:

A rumor is spreading like wildfire in the north of Midgard. Caravan leaders tell them at their campfires in the wilderness, fur hunters wear it north into the land of the Läina, and waelian sailors start to dream, when the raging waves of Wyrdsee pause and indulge them a breather:

The Enchanted Forest Karmodin bears his name again and rightly so. Tree nymphs and light alwen, sun dancer and Viljen and other nature spirits from the Moravian myths are back after a centuries-old spell is broken. Ancient knowledge and fabulous riches await the daring adventurer who ventures into their realm and doesn't let himself to be disturbed by the howling of wolves, that many a hiker can freeze the marrow in the bones.

"Find the truth to the rumor!" - that's your job to guide you in the Moravian forests. But before you can experience the Karmodin in all its Feenpracht, you must first prove yourself worthy in the eyes of nature spirits. But be careful, and do not be unnecessarily dragged into the disputes that divide the powers of the Enchanted Forest from each other: the raven people, the White Wolf and the Soul-Eater.

This booklet contains a role-playing adventure in which the world of nature spirits is alive. Midlevel adventurers can experience how old legends are true, and end a millennia-old rift - if they opt for the right party!

114591.name: Aventurischer Bote (Issue 8 - 1987)
114591.description:
Issue #8 of the Aventurischer Bote.

Print run: 3000 copies

114592.description:
Sandwich City is a game where players compete to make the best and biggest (which isn't always the best) sandwiches in town, using resource tokens such as Chicken, Fish, Carrots, Pigs, Sheep and the extremely rare token... Bricks. (to create the sandwich that is aptly titled, "Man Up".)

There is also fierce market made up of high price city shops and low end deals from street vendors. As food items are bought, others become cheaper, allowing players to have full control over the fluctuations of the ever changing market.

Players can make up to 52 different sandwiches, from "The Handout" (which is just a piece of chicken between two slices of bread) all the way to "The Kitchen Sink" (which is basically everything you can imagine).

Players will also manage their kitchen with a refrigerator, freezer and countertop. Items in the refrigerator get moldy over time, but the freezer lasts forever. Watch out though! Your opponent could sneak a "Freezer Fail" bonus up on you. It's very rare, but it's also very powerful.
114592.name: Sandwich City

114593.name: Aventurischer Bote (Issue 9 - 1987)
114593.description:
Issue #9 of the Aventurischer Bote.

Print run: 3000 copies

114594.name: Aventurischer Bote (Issue 10 - 1987)
114594.description:
Issue #10 of the Aventurischer Bote.

Print run: 3000 copies

114595.name: Die gefangene Zeit
114595.description:
From the back of the book:

Auf der Jagd nach einem frechen Dieb im Land der Träume und Wunder

Das haben Sie nun davon, wenn Sie während der Nachtwache einschlafen! Schnappt sich doch so ein dahergelaufener Kobold Ihre besten Zauberklingen und verschwindet in einer Höhle. Wer glaubt der denn, wen er vor sich hat? Natürlich rennen Sie ihm hinterher - und stürzen sich damit im wahrsten Sinn in ein traumhaftes Abenteuer.
Sie landen im Wunderland von Lewis Carroll, wo nichts so ist, wie es auf den ersten Blick aussieht. Wunschträume - oder sind es Alpträume - werden wahr. Ihr Abenteurer wird stärker, geschickter oder klüger, ihr Magier lernt neue wundersame Zauber, während Sie versuchen, den frechen Dieb und seine Hintermänner zu entlarven - und vor allem das Motiv für den Diebstahl zu ergründen. Aber Vorsicht: Verlieren Sie nicht den Kopf!


Translation:

On the hunt for a cheeky thief in the land of dreams and miracles

You now have it, if you fall asleep during the night watch! A Kobold coming along grabs your best magic swords and disappears into a cave. Who does he think he's dealing with? Of course, you run after him - and plunge yourself in the truest sense, into a fantastic adventure.

You land in Wonderland by Lewis Carroll, where nothing is quite as it seems at first glance. Dreams - or are they nightmares - come true. Your adventurer becomes stronger, more skilful or wiser, your magician learns new wondrous spells as you try to expose the brazen thief and his backers - and especially to investigate the motive for the theft. But be careful: Don't loose your head!

114596.name: Aventurischer Bote (Issue 11 - 1987)
114596.description:
(User summary)

Issue #11 of the Aventurischer Bote.

Print run: 3000 copies

114597.name: Aventurischer Bote (Issue 12 - 1987)
114597.description:
(User summary)

Issue #12 of the Aventurischer Bote.

Print run: 3000 copies

114598.name: Aventurischer Bote (Issue 13 - 1987)
114598.description:
(User summary)

Issue #13 of the Aventurischer Bote.

Print run: 3000 copies

114599.name: Aventurischer Bote (Issue 14 - 1988)
114599.description:
(User summary)

Issue #14 of the Aventurischer Bote.

Print run: 3000 copies

114600.name: Drei Wünsche frei
114600.description:
From the back of the book:

Der König von Nuristan sammelt Pferde, von Miniaturen aus Edelstein bis zu lebensgroßen Statuen aus Marmor und Metall. Doch ein Stück fehlt ihm in seiner Sammlung: das Weiße Pferd, der Schlüssel zu seinem Glück - und zum Glück derjenigen, die es ihm bringen.

Der König hat einen Wesir, der alles tun würde, um seinen Herrn glücklich zu machen. Er besitzt einen Hinweis auf den Aufenthaltsort des Weißen Pferdes, doch leider liegt er in einem wenige Tagesreisen entfernten Gebirge, das wahre Gläubige wegen eines alten Tabus nicht betreten dürfen. Zum Glück statten gerade ein paar Fremde dem kleinen Königreich am Rande der Wüste Gond einen Besuch ab ...

So werden Sie in ein Märchen wie aus 1001 Nacht verwickelt, mit listenreichen Dieben, gnadenlosen Sklavenjägern, schrecklichen Ungeheuern, einem untergegangenen Volk und einem Zwist der Götter. Und das Weiße Pferd ist lebendiger als erwartet und will erst einmal gefangen werden. Gelingt es Ihnen, dem König sein Pferd zu bringen und die alte Sage zu überprüfen, dass die Götter als Belohnung für diese Tat drei Wünsche erfüllen?


Translation:

The King of Nuristan collects horses, from miniatures of precious stone to life-size statues of marble and metal. But a piece is missing from his collection: the White Horse, the key to his happiness - and happiness of those who give it him.

The king had a vizier, who would do anything to make his master happy. He holds a clue to the whereabouts of the white horse, but unfortunately he resides in mountains a few days' journey away, which true believers are not allowed to enter because of an old taboos. Fortunately, a couple of strangers just pay the small kingdom on the edge of the desert Gond a visit ...

That's how you get involved in a fairy tale out of 1001 Nights, with cunning thieves, merciless slavers, terrible monsters, an extinct people, and a quarrel of the gods. And the White Horse is livelier than expected and will be caught only once. Are you able to bring the king his horse and to check the old legend that the gods as a reward for this act are to fulfill three wishes?

114602.name: Mord und Hexerei
114602.description:
User Summary:

This adventure book contains three adventures about murder and magic:


Die steinerne Hand - The stony hand
Hexerjagd - Witcher hunt
Das Todeslicht - The Death light

114604.name: WolfQuest
114604.description:
The player must survive as a dispersal gray wolf in Yellowstone National Park. To do so they must hunt elk, hares, chase off coyote, follow scent trails, and feed off elk carcasses. They must also avoid dangers from grizzly bears and the elk themselves. The player has the option to find a mate, who will follow and aid the them throughout the rest of the game. With their mates players can search for a den to raise pups. However, after finding a densite the player must scent mark the area around the den and keep the pups safe.

Players are free to choose the gender, fur coloration, stats, and name of their wolf.

Source: Wikipedia, "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WolfQuest,"; available under the CC-BY-SA License.

114608.description:
[From back of the box]
The 1st Marine and 81st Infantry Divisions were assigned to take the islands of Pelelieu and Angaur. One would be fairly easy and the other extremely hard. Pelelieu became a vortex that took way more Marines lives than it was worth. The Japanese had dug themselves into the Umurbrogal Mountain and forced the battle to be drawn out for 2 months, instead of 2 weeks.

[From the publishers website, http://www.grognardsims.com/v/PIC_Pelelieu.html]
This is the fourth in the PIC series of games that simulate island battles in the Pacific Ocean Area during WWII. The game is a blend of operational/tactical level combat and maneuver during the taking of the islands of Pelelieu and Angaur from the Japanese during the Second World War. The game is played in turns, each one divided into phases for amphibious landing, maneuver, and combat. The game system uses many of the seven Battlefield Operating Systems (BOS) to simulate actual combat and maneuver that both the US and Japanese players must use to fight the battle. Of the seven BOS's, this simulation concentrates on Maneuver, Fire Support, Mobility and Survivability, Air Defense, and Command and Control. The Japanese defenses are sophisticated and well manned with fanatical soldiers willing to die for their emperor. They fight so hard in fact that the Marines are stymied for much longer than planned and need to be releived by US Army troops from the 81st Division after they took Angaur. The fight is bloody and sharp. Victory in the game is measured against the time and casualties it took the US forces to actually accomplish the same mission.

The game features US Marine Corps, US Army, US Navy, and Imperial Japanese forces at the Battalion, Company, and Platoon level. Units are initially setup as Battalions and Companies, and can be broken down into their respective elements. The combat system utilizes a set of combat multipliers that players must use correctly to have the best effect. The Japanese player has the ability to conduct Banzai attacks at night and these cause considerable damage as the US player cannot fall back in front of these attacks and must take casualties.

The are a number of scenarios that simulate the battle on a smaller scale and allow for play for either island or both. There will be numerous options that can be used to even play between players and make the fight more interesting. These include additional Japanese forces that could have been there if they were not sunk by US submarines.

Game Design and Production by: Chris Fasulo

Map Artwork: Kyle Gebhardt
114608.name: Pacific Islands Campaign Pelelieu/Angaur

114609.name: Die Haut des Bruders
114609.description:
From the back of the book:

Ein riesiger schwarzer Drache hat sich zum Herrscher über den Karmodin, den moravischen Zauberwald, aufgeschwungen. Er unterdrückt die Naturgeister, und selbst der Herr der Wölfe und die Schmiedmeister wagen nicht, etwas gegen das Ungeheuer zu unternehmen. Ganz Moravod leidet unter ihm, denn der Verkehr auf den wichtigen Handelswegen, die den Karmodin berühren, ist zum erliegen gekommen. Eine wahrhaft fürstliche Belohnung wartet auf Sie, wenn es Ihnen gelingt, den Drachen zu vertreiben.

Um seinen schwachen Punkt herauszufinden, müssen Sie nur die Tierherren des Karmodin retten und das Geheimnis von Dunkelheim im Herzen des Waldes lüften, vor dem das Rabenvolk panische Angst hat und das wie ein finsterer Schatten auf der Vergangenheit der Elfen Midgards lastet. Vergessen Sie dabei aber nicht, nach der Haut des Bruders Ausschau zu halten, die alle haben wollen: der schwarze Drache, ein Erzmagier, ein uralter Vampir und das fahrende Volk, die Abanzzi.

Dieses Heft enthält ein Rollenspiel-Abenteuer, das Spielfiguren höheren Grades in wahrhaft legendäre Ereignisse verwickelt.


Translation:

A huge black dragon has made himself the ruler of the Karmodin, the Moravian enchanted forest. He suppressed the nature spirits, and even the Lord of the wolves and the master blacksmith not dare to do something about the monster. All of Moravod suffers from him, because traffic on the major trade routes, touching the Karmodin, has come to a complete stop. A truly princely reward is waiting for you, if you manage to drive away the dragon.

To find out his weak point, you just have to save the animal lords of Karmodin and solve the mystery of Dunkelheim in the heart of the forest, of which the raven people are terrified and that hangs like a dark shadow on the past of the elves of Midgard. But do not forget to keep looking for The Skin of the Brother, which everyone wants: the black dragon, an Archmage, an ancient vampire and the traveling folk, the Abanzzi.

This booklet contains a role-playing adventure that gets characters of higher levels involved in truly legendary events.

114610.name: Supernatural: The Hunt Begins
114610.description:
Taken from the back cover text.

Supernatural: The Hunt Begins introduces the Supernatural Role Playing Game. Take on the role of a Hunter in an original Supernatural adventure. All you need to play is this book, friends, dice, your imagination, and maybe some eerie lighting.

114611.name: Ein Hauch von Heiligkeit
114611.description:
Fromt the back of the book:

Wundersames hat sich in dem Ort Oktrea ereignet: die Leiche des Eremiten Sofeth verwest nicht, und die Dorfbewohner berichten von göttlichen Zeichen, die sich zu seinen Lebzeiten ereignet haben. In einem Konklave sollen Gesandte der drei chryseischen Hauptkulte prüfen, wie es um die Heiligkeit des Eremiten bestellt ist. Als Teil des Gefolges der frommen Männer und Frauen freuen Sie sich auf eine erholsame Reise mit gutem Essen und tiefen Einblicken in die Landessitten.

Doch bald überschlagen sich die Ereignisse: eine orgiastische Sekte sorgt für Unruhe, ein Einsiedler sieht den toten Sofeth bei Nacht umherwandeln, mehrere Vampirmorde versetzen die Dörfer in Panik. Und dann verschwinden die Gesandten, einer nach dem anderen. Sie folgen ihnen und stoßen auf eine fantastische Anlage der Seemeister aus der Zeit vor dem Krieg der Magier, gespickt mit tödlichen Fallen, magischen Wundern, tückischen Dämonenfürsten und wahrhaft sagenhaften Schätzen. Dort kommen sie auch dem Geheimnis des Sofeth auf die Spur, das eng mit einem vor Jahrzehnten begangenen Verbrechen verknüpft ist.

Dieses Heft enthält ein Rollenspiel-Abenteuer für Spielfiguren höheren Grades, das den Glauben Chryseias und die Zeit der Seemeister lebendig werden läßt.


Translation:

Miraculous has occurred in the town Oktrea: the corpse of the hermit Sofeth does not decay, and the villagers tell of divine signs, which occurred during his lifetime. In a conclave envoys of the three main chryseian cults are to examine, how it stands about the holiness of the hermit. As part of the attendance of holy men and women you look forward to a relaxing trip with good food and deep insights into local customs.

But soon hit on the events: an orgiastic sect causes unrest, a hermit sees the dead Sofeth wander at night, several vampire murders put the villages in panic. And then disappear the messengers, one after the other. You follow them and come across a fantastic system of the Seemeisters from before the war of the the magicians, full of deadly traps and magical wonders, treacherous demon lords and truly fabulous treasures. There you will also solve the mystery of Sofeth, which is closely related to a crime committed decades ago linked.

This booklet contains a role-playing adventure for characters of higher levels that makes the faith of Chryseia and the time of Seemeister come alive.

114612.name: Der Weiße Wurm
114612.description:
From the back of the book:

Frühling in Alba! Mit fröhlichen Festen begrüßt das Volk das Ende des Winters, und Sie können an vielen Orten albische Lieder, Tänze und Getränke genießen. So auch in dem Walddorf Worming, wo der neue Syre seinen ersten Drachenstich zum Gedenken an den Sieg seiner Vorfahren über den Weißen Wurm feiert.

Doch unter der heiteren Oberfläche des Ortes lauert ein Geheimnis aus alter Zeit. Erst wird ein Drachenschädel gestohlen, dann verschwindet auch das Haupt von Vanafred, der Schutzheiligen des Klosters von Worming. Ist das Diebesgut in der großen Kulthöhle versteckt, in der früher die twyneddischen Barbaren ihre Blutrituale abhielten? Warum gibt sich der Abt des Kloster so verschwiegen, und was weiß die schöne Lady aus dem Süden, die den jungen Syre umgarnt? Dorfbewohner, mit denen Sie sich angefreundet haben, benehmen sich auf einmal seltsam oder verschwinden einfach. Das Schicksal Wormings liegt in Ihren Händen, oder haben Sie Angst vor dem Weißen Wurm?

Dieses Heft enthält ein Rollenspiel-Abenteuer, das Spielerfiguren mittleren Grades mit einer dämonischen Bedrohung konfrontiert.


Translation:

Spring in Alba! With joyous celebrations the people are greeting of the end of winter, and you can enjoy albian songs, dances and drinks in many places. So also in the forest village Worming, where the new Syre celebrates his first dragon strike to commemorate the victory of his ancestors over the White Worm.

But beneath the serene surface of the place a secret of old is lurking. At first a dragon skull is stolen, then also the head of Vanafred disappears, the patron saint of the monastery of worming. If the stolen property hidden in the great sacred cave, in which the twyneddian barbarians did their blood rituals in the past? Why is the abbot of the monastery so secretive, and what does the beautiful white lady from the South know, which ensnares the young Syre? Villagers with whom you have befriended, behave strangely or suddenly disappear. The fate of Worming lies in your hands, or are you afraid of the White Worm?

This booklet contains a role-playing adventure that confronts midlevel player characters with a demonic threat.

114613.name: Die Kinder des Träumers
114613.description:
From the back of the book:

Die Vraidosgemeinde der albischen Küstenstadt Deorstead versammelt sich in ihrem Glaubenshaus Aelfrodstor zur Weihe von drei neuen Priestern, die hinausziehen sollen, die Lehren und Mysterien ihres weisen Gottes zu verbreiten. Gerade beginnt die heilige Zeremonie, da erleidet der alte Vorbeter einen Herzschlag. Auf dem Sterbebett übergibt er seinem Neffen Rangard die Schlüssel von Aelfrodstor und warnt ihn vor bevorstehenden Gefahren. Rangard flüchtet verwirrt und taumelt durch die Gassen von Deorstead - geradewegs vor Ihre Füße -, als ihn auch schon ein grimmiger Schwertkämpfer wütend angreift.

So beginnt ein Abenteuer um das Geheimnis, das der alte Vorbeter des Vraidoskultes mit ins Grab genommen hat. Ein Geheimnis zu dem der Schlüssel von Aelfrodstor nur die ersten Pforten öffnen, denn die Mysterien des träumenden Gottes sind umfassender und realer, als so mancher denkt!

Dieses Heft enthält ein Rollenspiel-Abenteuer für Spielfiguren mittlerer Grade um die Mysterien des albischen Gottes Vraidos.


Translation:

The Vraidos community of the albian coastal city Deorstead gathered in its house of faith Aelfrodstor for the consecration of three new priests, who should go forth to spread the teachings and mysteries of their wise god. Just as the sacred ceremony begins, the old liturgist suffers a heart attack. On his deathbed he hands over the keys of Aelfrodstor to his nephew Rangard and warns him of impending danger. Rangard flees confused and stumbling through the streets of Deorstead - straight in front of your feet - at the moment he is attacked by a furious swordsman.

So an adventure starts aboutt the mystery the old liturgist of Vraidos cult has taken to his grave. A secret to which the key of Aelfrodstor only opens the first gates, because the mysteries of the dreaming god are more comprehensive and real than many think!

This booklet contains a role-playing adventure for characters of midlevel about the mysteries of the albin god Vraidos.

114614.name: Legion der Verdammten
114614.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Eine geheimnisvolle Legion zieht die Abenteurer in den Bann und hin zum untergegangenen Schlupfwinkel eines Seemeisters, wo sich schließlich eine lang geplante Rache vollzieht. Die Abenteurer hören zum ersten Mal von Myrkgard, der Sphäre der dunklen Seemeister. Im Anhang finden sich knappe Regeln zum Altern von Spielerfiguren.


Translation:

A mysterious Legion attracts the adventurers and points them towards the ruined hideout of a Seemeister where finally a long-planned revenge is accomplished. The adventurers first hear of Myrkgard, the sphere of dark Seemeister. The annex contains concise rules about the aging of player characters.

114615.name: Des Pfeifers Klagelied
114615.description:
User Summary:

This adventure book contains three adventures for Midgard that had previously been released under the Spielwelt label:


Der Pfeifer von Daongaed - The Piper of Daongaed
Die Kehrseite der Medaille - The other side of the coin
Spinnenliebe - Spider love

114616.name: Das große Abenteuer der kleinen Halblinge
114616.description:
User Summary:

This adventure book contains two adventures that had originally been written for conventions:

Das große Abenteuer der kleinen Halblinge - The big adventure of the little Halflings
Kopfjagd - oder: Die Rückkehr der Zaubermeister - Bounty hunt - or: The Return of the Magicians




The players are either playing a group of first level halflings (in Das große Abenteuer ...) or a group of experienced mages of levels 9 to 12 (in Kopfjagd).

Accompanied are the two adventure by a text about how to plan a role-play tourney written by Dr. Rainer Nagel.

114617.name: Das Graue Konzil
114617.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Myrkgard, die Sphäre der dunklen Seemeister, bedroht ihre Schwesterwelt Midgard, und die Abenteurer sind das Verbindungsglied. Ein sagenhaftes Gefährt, das durch den magischen Raum reisen kann, ist in einer vergessenen Dunkelzwergen-Kolonie verborgen und soll die Abenteurer nach Myrkgard bringen. Wer immer schon wissen wollte, was das legendäre Fluggrab des Tancredis ist (erwähnt in Der Geflügelte Ring), wird auf alle Fragen Antworten bekommen.
